title: Acrobat Star Show - Show 'em what you got!
description:
Congrats, girl! You’ve been accepted to the hottest talent show on TV - Acrobat Star Show! Show off your amazing acrobatic moves and impress the judges! Twist, flip & spin like never before! Wow the crowd with your unique routine. Get a brand-new makeup & hair look at the backstage salon!

You’ve been watching Acrobat Star Show forever, and now your dream has come true: you get to be a part of it!!! Millions of people around the world are watching you. You think you’re the girl who can win their hearts? Not only do you get to compete against the best up-and-coming girl and guy acrobats around, but you even get to choreograph your own acrobatic routines! And get your hair and makeup done at the backstage salon! Will you make it to the finals? And maybe even… win?!

Features:
> Compete against other contestants. Prove that no one can twist & flip as well as you!
> Behind the scenes can be almost as fun as the actual performance. Get ready for the show backstage!
> Look fab - the whole world’s watching you! Get your hair and makeup done at the backstage salon and choose the perfect performance leotard fit for a star girl. 
> Amaze the judges and the audience with your incredible twist, cyr wheel and trapeze moves!
> Create your very own star routine. 
> Wanna get more likes? Let your new makeup & hair salon look shine - take selfies with the audience and with the judges. Get photographed doing your marvelous acrobatic twist and trapeze moves!
> Being an acrobat star girl can be dangerous. Get your injuries treated at the doctor. 
> Play a super-fun mini-game! If you copy the acrobatic moves perfectly, you score extra points!


About Coco Play
Coco Play is China-based developer of creative and unique apps for kids and the whole family. Founded in 2013, Coco Play provides rich 3D simulation-based games for the whole family. Coco Play is a subsidiary of TabTale, a leading, global creator of innovative games, interactive books and educational apps.

title: R8 Super Car: Speed Drifter
description:
Welcome to drift simulator audi r8 sports car racing game and Build the best and most beautiful drifting in this  sports car racing game Audi R8, This game has designed for race and drift passionate people. Drive and drift your own Audi R8 whose mid-engine supercar handles like a dream, sounds great, and is the ultimate daily-driver supercar. Race with your Audi R8, Audi A6 or Audi A4, park your Audi R8, R8 LMS GT4 or Audi A4 at parking lots. Drifting, racing, modifying. In this drift simulator audi r8 sports car racing game your handling skill will be challenged as you drive your way through tricky obstacles and into the designated parking spots in many multiple levels.

Start your mission by Taking control of some amazingly real drift cars! Forests, canyons, hills and mountains! Experience real drift in fast and agile real sports and racing cars in one of the car drifting simulators. Drive fast and drift hard on 14 amazing different tracks and cities with your Audi R8 drift simulator. Paint the cars and play this extreme audi r8 sports car racing simulation game. You can make your choice between city cars, offroad cars, and speed cars and also customize them and change tire, wheel, smoke, colors, and more..Drift in a whole city with realistic and intense traffic game play mode simulator that increase your interest, and try 14 tracks to pull off drift simulator audi r8 sports car racing in this drifting simulator game.

Features:
High quality vehicles with Dynamic camera angles
Collect drift points and earn money, coins, stars and upgrading levels
Customization and change tire, wheel, smoke and colors
Four Realistic environments: mountain, snowy, green valleys and desert
Drift whole city with realistic and intense traffic
Completely FREE for drift lovers of simulator audi r8 sports car racing game
Two Different Game controls (touch and sensor) with intense traffic
Ultimate daily-driver supercar simulator
Two modern cities. Choose the city however you want with Auto and manuel gear.
Race with Audi A4, park your Audi R8, R8 LMS GT4 or Audi A4
Drift simulator audi r8 sports car racing game for android
Forest, mountain, hill maps, Rainy and snowy weathers, Night and day mods.



.

title: Barbie Dreamhouse Adventures
description:
Create your very own Barbie Dreamhouse experience! You can design every room. Meet my BFFs and puppies! Join us for a bunch of fun activities: baking, dancing or epic pool parties! Plus, dress me and my friends up in fashion-forward looks to get picture ready! Follow us on exciting adventures in the Dreamhouse where anything is possible!

LET’S MOVE IN
Help me design every room with wonderful wallpapers and dazzling decorations. Make it your own Dreamhouse! Ready, set, style! 

THE COOLEST FRIENDS
Meet my best friends: Renee, a sports fanatic; Daisy, a talented DJ; Teresa, a science-lover; Nikki, an aspiring fashion designer and the one-and-only Ken. Plus, my super-smart sister Skipper who is into everything tech! 

NEW DRESS ALERT
I just got this new dress and I’m so excited to wear it at tonight’s party. I need your fabulous fashion tips to pick the perfect look! 

SELFIE, ANYONE?
Get your funny poses ready in the photobooth with Nikki and Teresa!

SUMMER TIME
Wait, what?! Ken is hosting one of his legendary pool parties! Let’s change into summer attire to make a splash entrance! 

FOODIES
I love cooking! Why don’t you join me in my awesome kitchen? 

ROCK OUT
Grab your favorite instrument to rock out in our band! Even the puppies can sing! 

DANCE, DANCE
Did someone say dance-off? Time to show our best moves on the dancefloor with Daisy! 

STAIRS OR SLIDE?
We’ve got this awesome idea: why not turn stairs into a slide? Just push the button to slide your way down in the ball pit! 

CUTE PUPPIES
Hours of fun guaranteed with our puppies! Need I say more?

PRIVACY & ADVERTISING
Budge Studios takes children's privacy seriously and ensures that its apps are compliant with privacy laws, including the Child Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA), a privacy legislation in the United States of America. This application has received the “ESRB (Entertainment Software Rating Board) Privacy Certified Kids’ Privacy Seal”. If you would like to learn more on what information we collect and how we use it, please visit our privacy policy at: https://budgestudios.com/en/legal/privacy-policy/. If you have any questions, email our Privacy Officer at : privacy@budgestudios.ca

Before you download this app, please note that it is free to play, but additional content may be available via in-app purchases. This app may contain contextual advertising from Budge Studios regarding other apps we publish, from our partners and social media links that are only accessible behind a parental gate. Budge Studios does not permit any behavioral advertising or retargeting in this app.

TERMS OF USE / END-USER LICENSE AGREEMENT
This application is subject to an End-User License Agreement available through the following link: http://www.budgestudios.com/en/legal/eula/.

ABOUT BUDGE STUDIOS
Budge Studios was founded in 2010 with the mission to entertain and educate children around the world, through innovation, creativity and fun. Budge Studios maintains the highest standards of safety and age-appropriateness, and has become a global leader in children’s apps for smartphones and tablets.

descriptionHTML:
Create your very own Barbie Dreamhouse experience! You can design every room. Meet my BFFs and puppies! Join us for a bunch of fun activities: baking, dancing or epic pool parties! Plus, dress me and my friends up in fashion-forward looks to get picture ready! Follow us on exciting adventures in the Dreamhouse where anything is possible!

LET’S MOVE IN
Help me design every room with wonderful wallpapers and dazzling decorations. Make it your own Dreamhouse! Ready, set, style!

THE COOLEST FRIENDS
Meet my best friends: Renee, a sports fanatic; Daisy, a talented DJ; Teresa, a science-lover; Nikki, an aspiring fashion designer and the one-and-only Ken. Plus, my super-smart sister Skipper who is into everything tech!

NEW DRESS ALERT
I just got this new dress and I’m so excited to wear it at tonight’s party. I need your fabulous fashion tips to pick the perfect look!

SELFIE, ANYONE?
Get your funny poses ready in the photobooth with Nikki and Teresa!

SUMMER TIME
Wait, what?! Ken is hosting one of his legendary pool parties! Let’s change into summer attire to make a splash entrance!

FOODIES
I love cooking! Why don’t you join me in my awesome kitchen?

ROCK OUT
Grab your favorite instrument to rock out in our band! Even the puppies can sing!

DANCE, DANCE
Did someone say dance-off? Time to show our best moves on the dancefloor with Daisy!

STAIRS OR SLIDE?
We’ve got this awesome idea: why not turn stairs into a slide? Just push the button to slide your way down in the ball pit!

CUTE PUPPIES
Hours of fun guaranteed with our puppies! Need I say more?

PRIVACY & ADVERTISING
Budge Studios takes children's privacy seriously and ensures that its apps are compliant with privacy laws, including the Child Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA), a privacy legislation in the United States of America. This application has received the “ESRB (Entertainment Software Rating Board) Privacy Certified Kids’ Privacy Seal”. If you would like to learn more on what information we collect and how we use it, please visit our privacy policy at: https://budgestudios.com/en/legal/privacy-policy/. If you have any questions, email our Privacy Officer at : privacy@budgestudios.ca

Before you download this app, please note that it is free to play, but additional content may be available via in-app purchases. This app may contain contextual advertising from Budge Studios regarding other apps we publish, from our partners and social media links that are only accessible behind a parental gate. Budge Studios does not permit any behavioral advertising or retargeting in this app.

TERMS OF USE / END-USER LICENSE AGREEMENT
This application is subject to an End-User License Agreement available through the following link: http://www.budgestudios.com/en/legal/eula/.

ABOUT BUDGE STUDIOS
Budge Studios was founded in 2010 with the mission to entertain and educate children around the world, through innovation, creativity and fun. Budge Studios maintains the highest standards of safety and age-appropriateness, and has become a global leader in children’s apps for smartphones and tablets.

Visit us: www.budgestudios.com
Like us: facebook.com/budgestudios

title: Bigfoot Hunting
description:
Bigfoot Hunting in Forest is FPS horror survival a brave hunter who looks for a mysterious monster beast deep in the northern forest! You have heard the rumors that a lot of people got lost in the forest and later found dead. The newspapers Jasper published message about the disappearance of a group of tourists in the national park. Police believe it was just an accident, because the band went to raft on the river. But your team sure that this definitely involves one of the most elusive creatures that are called Bigfoot or Sasquatch. You decide to get to the truth.

Bigfoot Hunting in Forest Feature:
-> Marvelous & Amazing 3D Hill Mountain Survival Environment
-> Easy & Smooth Controls to Freely move & Hunt the Bigfoot 
-> Use Bow and shotgun to Hunt the bigfoot monster
-> Use sniper rifle to hunt down yeti beast

Start hunting for FREE! and become the brave big foot hunter!

title: Snow Town - Ice Village World Winter Age
description:
City building game “Snow Town” is the ultimate challenge for ambitious mayors and creative city designers. Indulge yourself in all aspects associated with the job and life of a city manager. Organise employees for the companies in your city by taking good care of housing facilities, and make sure your citizens are happy by providing the best community services and education possible. Don’t forget to include a fire station and police station, but also the best library that money can buy. A proper balance is the essence for growth, but growing a beautiful city is just as attractive for your citizens as it is for you - as the designer of it all. A dazzling megapolis is the ultimate reward for you to show off with!

Your city in the snowy world of Snow Town is despite the strong cold wind and the icy temperatures anything but a boring or unattractive place, or an ice age village. Your citizens are happy to show themselves and let themselves be heard. Happy citizens go hand in hand with growth and prosperity, and all their happiness and joy is the reward for you--their mayor--for all your hard work and clever planning in this prosperous city.. But then, it doesn’t come for free. First you need to get your hands dirty and the job done! Tap and build away!

In Snow Town there is a huge collection of buildings and decorations that you can build. Your own imagination is the limit of what you can achieve, and you will continue to push your boundaries during play. Use the multitude of game options to build your dream city in your own pace, and don’t forget to enhance it with an efficient road network and some slippery footpaths.

It doesn’t matter what type of player you are. Maybe you prefer to play several short sessions a day, or maybe you are the kind of mayor that likes to get your teeth into the challenge and play for hours in a row? Snow Town offers enough variety and options to play the way you like it, when you like it. Fast or slow, short or long, relaxed or fanatical, it’s all there for you to enjoy!

Is your Snow Town city going to be your personal masterpiece? Nothing will be in your way once you start building in this game brought to you by the true masters of the genre. Tens of millions of players have preceded you in the mobile city building games by Sparkling Society, the absolute number 1 of the world!

- Choose from over 100 different buildings, parks and decorations.
- A fun and rewarding challenge to balance citizens, work and community facilities.
- Beautiful images, a city in snow was never more visually stunning.
- Many hours of gameplay, free of charge.
- Play it your way, your style, you decide. Flexibility is key.
- Millions of people around the globe play the city building games from Sparkling Society.

title: Clicker Knight: Incremental Idle RPG
description:
Clicker Knight: Incremental Idle RPG

Travel through the wilderness, slaying monsters and collecting epic loot in this Idle RPG! Tap to cast spells, upgrade your hero with unique abilities and craft potions to defeat your enemies! Assign your stat points and click to win in Clicker Knight and epic incremental idle RPG! 

This is an unique RPG clicker game. You’ll have to battle monsters, sell equipment, upgrade your skills, craft potions and cast spells to defeat tough enemies. Tap furiously to find hidden treasure in tons of different zones, making sure your tap hero has enough gear, health and items to keep progressing in this incremental RPG!

Clicker Knight: Incremental Idle RPG Features:

Explore!
- Use your tap powers for epic loot!
- Each zone is packed with tough monsters.
- Craft unique gear and craft potions in an epic clicker!

Battle Monsters
- Battle for rare loot!
- Tap any monster that comes your way.

Collect Loot
- Your idle hero needs epic loot to survive!
- Find hidden loot and customize your hero.

Incremental Clicker Action
- Play as much or as little as you like!
- Your hero keep leveling up even when you are offline
- Return to collect the loot and riches your hero collected while you were offline!

Lovers of RPG games and incremental clickers won’t be able to put down this idle monster battling RPG. Go on an epic tap quest, explore zones to battle monsters and defeat the tough dungeon bosses. You never know what could creep up on your hero- keep your tapping reflexes sharp in Clicker Knight!

title: Possession of a Good Fortune
description:
Manage your family in Jane Austen's Regency England, where the ultimate goal is your social status! Climb the ranks of society through generations of your family, using education, careers, investments, fashion, parties, and most importantly, marriage. Beware, if you neglect your children, they may elope with a stranger, destroying your family's reputation. Make sure each of your children is well-dressed, educated in decorum and the domestic arts, and has a healthy dowry to attract the best suitors. Use your influence to attend parties, where you might get a chance to dance with your suitors and elevate your status.

Art credits: Svetlana Kushnariova (Cabbit) , diamonddmgirl, & Jordan Irwin (AntumDeluge) (characters)
Freepik from www.flaticon.com (icons)
Illustrations are within the public domain

title: Ambulance Rescue 911 USA Crime City simulator 2018
description:
Ambulance Rescue 911 USA Crime City simulator 2018 is basically Ambulance Rescue 911 New York City simulation game and if your are  fan of the rescue driving game or other simulation games then we petty sure  that you're crazy about rescue injured people as well as ambulance rescue van  driving game. so be ready, this ambulance game beat all other ambulance rescue duty game ! Turn on the sirens and try to become an Ambulance rescue hero in one of the best 2018 ambulance simulator.

Ambulance Rescue New York City simulator 2018 Game "Ambulance Rescue 911 USA Crime City simulator 2018 "teach you that how to drive an ambulance truck, and park it in front of a big city parking 3D hospital to help out the doctors to save patient life.

Game Play of Ambulance Rescue 911 USA Crime City simulator 2018 Game:

The GamePlay of this Paramadic Rescue Games is very simple like other ambulance simulation game .You are an ambulance rescue hero. And you are provided with special different rescue missions like Rescue the Helicopter Crash People,Save the Road accident peoples etc. You are the best ambulance driver Super hero of 2018. Fulfill your rescue duty in the big city " New york" .New York city is in thrill and accident and you have to safely drive your city ambulance Van and take injured people to the nearest hospital. There is a lot city traffic and you have to drive through different routes to reach your desired destination. Beat the traffic and show the public that you are the best ambulance driver hero. There are 10 levels of games and a person can unlock them by completing the previous level,Not only 10 levels you have also a chance to unlock you desire ambulance Vehicle.Now let's see how good do you complete your city ambulance rescue duty games. Save lives of people with your city ambulance. Take the patients to hospital so fast to Save them.Drive Fast does not mean you have to harm others to save one life. 911 ambulance rescue service 2018 are much fun than any other.

This New Free Ambulance Game 2018 also learn you that how you  help the doctors by giving them the patients in time. Drive your favorite color ambulance vehicle in the big New York city and show your Driving skills and Ambulance Car parking skills while you stay stress resistance. The different parking situations are based on time limited situations, you need to get the patient to the doctors as fast as possible and become the Ambulance rescue Super hero. 

Features of Ambulance Rescue 911 USA Crime City simulator 2018 Game:

MiniMap for Destination Guideness.
Scale in and out the Minimap by clicking on minimap.
Different ambulance controlls like Tilt,steering and buttons.
Gear System for manage the ambulance reverse and forward transformation.
Siren button to turn on and off the siren and Ambulance Emergency Lights.
Different Ambulance Models.
Ten Different Rescue Missions.
Different Camera's View during picking and dropping the Patients.

Press the Install button and go through all danger situations. 911 ambulance rescue service 2018 game is not easy as much as you think because as a ambulance rescue Driver hero ,The main challenge that a ambulance drive face is Time so it is also your duty to reach the patient on their destination as soon as possible. The different and modern parking situations are really based on time with limited situations and places, you may need to get the hurt patient to the medic or doctors in real quick time as fast as possible. The 911 ambulance simulator while driving, remain alert, and to drive fastest furious Ambulance through the big city ambulance simulator.

Just download this new and amazing ambulance rescue service hero game and enjoy unlimited fun not only fun but fun with learning in this best of all Ambulance Rescue Mission Games.

GIVE YOUR REVIEW AND PLEASE SHARE YOUR THOUGHTS AND SUGGEST ANY IMPROVEMENT FOR OUR GAME "Ambulance Rescue 911 USA Crime City simulator 2018 Game".

title: Truck Loads Simulator 3D : GoEuro Truck Driver USA
description:
Love Truck Simulator USA, Offroad Drive,Heavy Transport, Hot Wheels Simulator, 18 Wheeler Trucks,Offroad Outlaws Drive?
Here is the Game Truck Loads Simulator 3D : GoEuro Truck Driver USA that is All Perfect for You.

Truck Loads Simulator 3D : GoEuro Truck Driver USA The newest Trucking empire experience!
Truck Loads Simulator 3D : GoEuro Truck Driver USA isn’t a traditional foot to the floor 3D driving game! Unlike most 3D driving games, this Truck simulation 3D game does not put you in high speed racing wheel to wheel action with rival racers. Instead you must carefully navigate your way through a semi realistic version of the United States of America! Picking up and delivering cargo with the different types of trucks you can own in Truck Loads Simulator 3D : GoEuro Truck Driver USA . Feel compelled to drive at maximum big-rig speeds with Hot Wheels Truck and bend a few rules here and there in this Offroad Outlaws Simulator Game. So you ensure that your payloads cargo truck arrives at a timely fashion. So are you up for some hard core trucking truck driver? Then pick up your device and install the game right away.


If you have an affinity for trucking Truck Loads Simulator 3D : GoEuro Truck Driver USA is the game for you!
If you manage to make your delivery you’ll use the resulting paycheck to increase your bank account. Effect necessary to do repairs, full up your gas tank, and improve your trucks. With better trucks you’ll be offered more profitable cargo trucking jobs. With more profitable cargo trucking jobs. You’ll gradually improve and upgrade your big rig american trucks, or you can use the hard earned 3D truck simulator money to buy some new rigs. title: Hard Business free - game business simulator
description:
The most realistic life simulator with a huge range of features! Create your business from scratch and prove to everyone that you are the best!
The best business game, financial simulator and the largest life simulator at your service!

GAME FEATURES:

▶ Unique game mechanics, with complete freedom of action!
▶ Full control of the character!
▶ The latest system of your own family!
▶ The largest opportunities for dealing with banking services!
▶ Huge entertainment system for you and your character!
▶ More than 120 different UNIQUE professions, from actor or scientist to builder or bank director!
▶ 7 types of real estate! 50 kinds of motor transport! 10 types of motor transport, 9 types of air transport and 9 types of water!
▶ A bunch of helpers, such as a butler, cook, cleaners, nannies, etc!
▶ A huge education system - 12 and 12 institutes, which really need to learn!
▶ A system for reporting and helping the player!
▶ Several leader tables,
where you can compete for the title of the most successful businessman!
▶ The most extensive and diverse system for creating your own business! You will choose a tax system, a place to build an enterprise, personnel, area, marketing, and much, much more! There are 5 types of enterprises in the game:
- shopping (shops, stalls,
shopping centers)
- entertaining (restaurants, bars, etc.)
- services (beauty salons, gas stations, etc.)
- production (factories, factories, construction companies, etc.)
- extraction (mines, oil production, etc.)

And many other things! More than 300 events that can happen to your character (each unique and affects the character), a lottery,
characteristics of the character and so on!

Enjoy :)

Help Peter Pan find his shadow! Come with him, where dreams are born, and time is never planned. Just think of happy things, and your heart will fly on wings, forever, in Never Never Land! Play one of the most fantastic search and find games 2018 – download Peter Pan Hidden Objects – Adventure In Neverland for free and have fun for hours! Fight against captain Hook and his Neverland pirates! Let Tinker Bell help you seek for hidden objects  and find  the way through this magic world.


More than a 1000 hidden objects!
Translated into 15 world languages!
Peter Pan game with multiple levels!

HOW TO PLAY Peter Pan Hidden Objects – Adventure In Neverland Games?

Find hidden objects in the pictures of Neverland! Click on the “light bulb” when you get stuck. Find hidden figures when you are given a picture or a silhouette and search for missing items hidden in anagrams. There is a special level as a time limit game, where the timer brings a dramatic moment to this search and find hidden objects game. Play other mini games for brain that will entertain you, like logic games, brain teasers, memory games with cards and hidden object puzzle games. All that in this fantastic Peter Pan Hidden Objects – Adventure In Neverland Game free download!

Find hidden objects games for adults are finally here!

If you want the magic to happen you have to believe! With your happy thoughts you will be able to fly all over the magic land and have fun all day. You will find hidden objects in pictures without problems and solve the most complicated mosaic puzzles in a couple of seconds. “Peter Pan Hidden Objects – Adventure In Neverland”  is here to take you to the world of imagination and make you feel forever young. Help the boy who wouldn’t grow up to find missing items and defeat captain Hook and notorious pirates.

Get ready to enjoy hidden objects 24/7! This is the most addictive hidden mystery game!

Free unlimited hidden object games for adults who never want to grow up are perfect for training your concentration and challenging your object finding skills. Play hidden games and enjoy the amazing adventures in Neverland . You finally have an opportunity to visit this amazing world and find missing objects to help Peter and Wendy. All you need is faith, trust and a little bit of pixie dust in order to find hidden objects and enjoy one of the greatest adventures in  your life!

The best hidden object adventure games are finally here!

The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease for ever to be able to do it. Hidden objects adventure games will remind you to stay forever young and  keep on believing that everything is possible. title: Motorbike Medieval Drive 3D
description:
Welcome to Motorbike Medieval Drive 3D - amazing motorcycle simulator game :)
Drive fast through medieval offroad landscapes, perform incredible stunts on the ramps and jump above castle walls or towers :)
If you like simulation games, motorbikes and medieval times then you will love Motorbike Medieval Drive 3D.
You can select from 2 types of bikes: motocross bike or superbike.

[Features]
- Realistic motorbike physics engine
- Beautiful medieval castle and offroad environments
- Stunning motorcycle driving experience
- Various camera views
- Awesome stunt ramps to jump off
- Atmospheric medieval music

Stay tuned for updates :)
Have fun!

title: Monthly Idol
description:
Monthly Idol: KPOP IDOL MAKER

▶ Grow your small entertainment agency into a global TOP agency!
You are the BOSS who will choose a girl group or boy group to grow own agency.

▶The basic contract period with IDOLs is five years. Please make them into TOP IDOLs.
Of course, you can renew your contract after five years.

▶Make a recording through PRODUCING! If you choose a favorite theme for the public, 
the number of records sales, music streaming and YouTube views will increase! 
Of course, there may be a lot of album purchases among fans.

▶Get popular through the SCHEDULE! As you become more popular, 
you will receive a variety of schedule exceptions!

title: Car Crash Test NIVA
description:
Before you a new simulator of the destruction of cars Car Crash Test NIVA. In this simulator, a new NIVA machine is introduced. Choose the car you like in the garage and do whatever you want with it. Do not only test the machine but also test the dummy. In the simulator Car Crash Test NIVA, a variety of driving modes and crash crashes are available. You can choose a crash test and after it you will know what were the chances of surviving the crash test of the dummy, whether the car survived and many other things. Break up the brick walls at high speed and destroy the 3D NIVA machine, break the machines completely and try to leave the dummy intact. Arrange the car for a crash test and other tests or just have fun driving. Customize NIVA and other cars, make them more comfortable for you and your race. Change colors, wheels and much more, so that you like the car more. Pass all the tests of the NIVA crash test with the dummy.

 We often update our simulators, and almost always respond to your feedback and comments, and if you have any suggestions, we will be happy to see them, our games are based on your feedback and suggestions. Thanks to you in the simulator Car Crash Test NIVA introduced a new system of damage to machines. For those with whom the game is possible to slow down - reduce the quality of graphics in the settings of the game ("Settings" -> "Graphic").


 The main provisions of the game:

 - various locations
 - 3 high-quality 3D models of machines and NIVA
 - Various settings for customizing the machine (the color of the car, etc., the wheels and casting, the body repair, the convergence, the air suspension)
 - a large number of settings for managing the style of driving a car
 - Different modes of crash-test and driving cars
 - live ragdoll crash test dummy
 - realistic graphics and damage to machines (depending on the phone model - "Settings" -> "Graphic")
 - a new system of machine destruction


 For your suggestions, ideas and criticism, you can write either in the comments to our simulator, or on the mail: insanegameprod@gmail.com

title: Predator: Helmet Thermal Vision & Plasma Cannon
description:
Imagine that you are wearing the helmet of the predator and you are going to do extermination of all xenomorphs!

Predators are the ancient aliens called yautja that are hunting across the universe and in interstellar space, seeking of creatures, humans and xenomorphs skull as a trophy. In their arsenal there is a lot of different technologies, like wrist gauntlet, laser alien blaster. Also predator helmet with several kinds of visions, including night and thermal vision. The basis of their weapons is plasma cannon on the shoulder, laser pointer that helps aim enemies. Visor, active invisible camouflage and lots of other things also help them. Their presence is an excellent occasion for the augmented reality game in the universe of avp and prometheus.

Make the real alien invasion, let the great hunt begin!

Use your phone to begin alien hunter as a berserker, crucified and ancient predator in the style of a great franchise. You can also feel yourself as jungle hunter or city hunter. Imagine that on your way there will be many dangerous creatures, such as the predalien, alien queen. This will be their requiem.

Play in the predator thermal and night vision mode. Feel the full spectre of xeno abilities that imitates predators in augmented reality game:

- Infrared vision of yautja
- Xeno predation
- Thermal imager
- Hunting simulator
- Realistic laser pointer
- Powerful plasmacaster
- Wrist gauntlet with the laser auto - aim of the plasma shots
- Visor with long range
- Play as berserker, crucified and ancient predator
- Laser pointer imitates aim of plasma cannon

Predator xeno Infrared vision is like thermal camera on helmet! You can find your prey even in the darkest corners with the help of this ar game! Find all the xenomorphs in your area and provide extermination before they make you a predalien! One alien or predalien, 2, and maybe a lot will be against you, predators, but no one will prevail vs. you. Plasma cannon, the same Plasmaclaster and alien blaster will do his job, he will send your enemies back to their ancestors. Pew pew and it's all over, the plasma energy has a pervasive bursting power. After such jungle hunter and city hunter will be proud of you.
Remember! Yautja is a real machine of death that collects skull! Do not mess with them or they will track you with their wrist gauntlet device that can track not only human, also aliens can be the target of predation.

Write your comments and wishes and we will make this game better!

title: Quad Bike Off-road Racing Mania 3D Game
description:
Let this modern quad bike off-road racing mania 3d game help you explore your passion for bike racing games. Perform some amazing quad bike stunts without any fear. Explore the area and become the instant biker and take jump to cross the rivers and mountains that are set on your way in quad bike off-road mania. This Quad bike Off-road Mania game show your precision driving and set race with your opponent in quad bike and drag all the other quad bikes and win quad bike game contest on the dangerous rode.

As distinct from the other four wheeler games, this off-road quad bike 3D simulation game 2018 is embellished with extreme impossible tracks, driving trials and awesome new ATV quad bikes to drive. Drive your favorite quad bike on muddy streams, mountains, off-road tracks, snow mountain tracks, zig zag tracks, pitches and other tracks that are challenging thing for you to accomplish and win quad bike off road mania race. You have to perform best of the best to cross these huddles and put your name in the list of champions. Enjoy the off-road racing and city racing 3d in this quad bike 2018 3d free game and tackle the most dangerous obstacles on the impossible racing tracks in this driving simulator game.

Just run this quad bike off-road racing mania 3d game and select your favorite ATV quad bike and take it to the hills, mountains where you can slip your quad bike and can be crashed. This game will provide you the experience to drive a quad bike on immersive ATV quad mania environment with the appealing and high definition animation and smooth gameplay control with stunning and slippery off-road quad bike mania tracks. This game will help you to accomplish your endless ATV tasks then get rating stars according to your performance and skills in this quad bike off-road racing mania. We will give you a screen button control and tilt control to race your ATV quad bike without doing any single mistake in this endless driving simulation game. We will also give you the multi-angle camera view and multiple game play environments in this quad bike off-road racing mania 2018.

Along the dangerous tracks, the main challenge is to win against other opponents with maximum security of you and your quad bike. There are mud, spinning and icy tracks which will cause you to lose control of your quad bike. I good bike can achieve the huddles if you just slow down the speed of your ATV bike and focus on the track. There are few challenges where you need to drive faster to dodge the impossible driving tracks.
This quad bike off-road racing mania 3d game features amazing 3d graphics, drive multiple super bikes on risky mountains off roads, changing levels for biker, simple controls and smooth game play, awesome off-road tracks in amazing hilly environment and realistic physics controls for stunt driving and racking. The game also features the responsive interface, off-road quad bike racing missions, challenging environments, eye pleasing landscapes, amazing sound, visual effects and dozens of quad ATV bikes.

Put your skills into work and drive your ATV over rough and slipy tracks and join the ultimate off-road rush as you compete with other crazy drivers. Drive quad bike on the most beautiful bike racing tracks and enjoy quad stunts of quad bike with fantastic hill road environment.

title: Bacteria Evolution - Merge and Create Germs
description:
Behind the scenes, Earth has always been controlled by mysterious, invisible beings: the bacteria!

Merge many different mutant bacteria species until you create the most unbeatable superbug in the universe!

Why worry about a little germ or plague virus when you can join them in wiping humans from the planet and recolonizing the world?

It’s already begun, and there’s no resisting this infection. Spread the origin story of today’s super bacteria and help them evolve!

BACTERIAL FEATURES

👾Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
👾Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the bacteria

HOW TO PLAY

👾Drag and drop similar bacteria to create new mutant creatures that can infect anyone
👾Use bacteria eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money with pandemic income rates!
👾Alternatively, fiercely tap a bacteria to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS

👾Different stages and many bacteria species to discover
👾A mind-blowing story with sick twists!
👾The unexpected mix of evolution dynamics and incremental clicker games
👾Doodle-like illustrations
👾Open-ended gameplay: enjoy epidemic freedom!
👾No bacteria were harmed in the making of this game, only developers

You might not be into bacteria yet, but one thing’s for sure: they’re really into you.

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

title: Junkyard Tycoon - Business Game
description:
Want to start your own Salvage yard business? If you love vehicles and automobiles, you will love this virtual business game of cars. It is unique and extremely entertaining.
Junkyard Tycoon is a game where you start your own garbage garage, buy vehicles or vehicle parts, detach vehicle parts, sell them and make profit. While you slowly make good business out of junk vehicle parts, you become a junkyard tycoon.Just keep buying and selling car or car parts. The twist of the game is that you can make profit while selling different vehicle parts. You can buy Car, Truck, Motorbike, Boats  at scrapyard prices and you will be able to sell automobile parts individually to make good money. It is a perfect way to test your business and money making skills.

 “Junkyard Tycoon” is the best time management game for unlimited fun and salvage yard business.

The game is all about right set of Wreckers business skills needed at the right time.! Get ready for the most amazing car business game where you can buy junk cars, trucks, vans, or any other moving parts of vehicles and test your business skills to become a real Magnate. Focus and play carefully! This is an amazing business strategy game.
Decide on your business strategy to balance out your income and expenses. The Wrecking Yard economy game is really fun with thrilling sound effects and beautiful game graphics. Download the game and start your own Scrapheap Challenge.

************************
SAY HELLO
************************
We are constantly working hard on making the “Junkyard Tycoon” game better and more entertaining for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the game, do not forget to rate us on play store and share among your friends.

title: Blood Pressure Diary
description:
This log diary records your pulse & blood pressure. You can check & analyze the results of your records from the diary at anytime. Create a profile & save your data with date & time. Detailed information about blood pressure is available. Minimum blood pressure & minimum blood pressure values. 

Features:

*  Record your blood pressure & pulse.
*  Monitor your blood pressure results.
*  Save & Record unlimited bp & pulse readings.
*  Compare the results of your Blood Pressure & pulse at various days, minutes, months & years.

Disclaimer:
This app does not measure blood pressure & pulse rate. It is just a diary to record blood pressure bp readings data which you can obtain from a real blood pressure device.

title: Time Bomb Disposal Squad
description:
This is your time to prove yourself that you are the ultimate survival hero of the bomb disposal squad. Play this thrilling exciting bomb blast game as the US army disposal officer. Download this anti terrorist bomb disposal game and become the part of the US military officer. You are here to serve and defend the country from the criminals and terrorists. You are in the survival mission and you have been assigned the most dangerous mission.
Terrorists are invaded in the country and they have planted bombs in different areas of the country. They want to conquer the country. You need to take control of the situation now as you are the real survival hero in the explosive bomb disposal squad. The lives of the innocent civilians are at stake. Don’t let the terrorist destroy your country. You are the trained US police anti terrorist force who needs to take action against the criminals. Get the proper guidance from the US Military intelligence force about the location of the bomb plant.
Save the lives of the civilians by diffusing the bomb now. You don’t have enough time for the bomb diffusal. Join with the team of the extreme bomb disposal squad to reach to the exact location. Just follow the map direction and reach there with the anti terrorist force. Time is running out. Follow the instruction given by the US military intelligence. You can take the car or helicopter whichever vehicle is available near you to reach to the bomb plant location as soon as possible.
Show your bomb diffusal skills to all the anti terrorist force to set an example and become the elite survival hero. You are now part of this police force bomb disposal squad. Diffuse it before the bomb blast happened and take all the lives with it. Be careful as you are doing the most difficult task of the survival bomb disposal police force.
*****HOW TO PLAY*****
Start the game of survival
Choose the level to start the bomb disposal mission
Reach to the bomb plant location through the map directions
Diffuse it through different techniques
Keep track on the time to avoid the explosion
*****FEATURES*****
Action filled challenging levels
Bomb disposal location simulator
Different techniques for the bomb diffusal
Time based survival missions
Realistic explosive background sound effects

title: Blood Pressure Information
description:
With this Blood Pressure Information App you have important information about blood pressure on your smartphone. You can look up what systolic and diastolic means. Additionally you can learn to distinguish between systolic and diastolic blood pressure. Also you can find information about different blood pressure levels (high blood pressure, ideal blood pressure and so on). Use this app to get a better understanding of blood pressure. 

Disclaimer:
This Blood Pressure Information App is created to give you information about blood pressure and does not measure your blood pressure and pulse. All result values are random generated and only an example.

title: Tropic Empire - Idle Builder Adventure
description:
Build, explore and tap tap tap! Do it all in this unique idle builder game with a fantastic evolving storyline. Fun and interesting characters combined with idle tycoon gameplay! Join Iffy, Jenny, Captain Worraps and the other survivors on their adventure now! 

Features
🏚 Unlock, build and upgrade buildings
🐟 Get idle resources even when you're not playing
🕺 Find and level up survivors to boost production
💐 Beautiful 3D graphics
⚙ Automate & optimize production
🗺 Explore new islands
🏆 Complete missions
🎁 Collect chests
🌴 Get Tropical!
💰 Get Rich!
⛵ Escape!

After waking up on the desert island - lost and completely alone - with nothing but a talking seagull as company, Irvine ”Iffy” Wisegust has only one choice – survival. Help him survive in style and become the richest survivor on the planet by gathering different resources. Even when not playing. Use the resources to build lumber mills, watchtowers, harbors, quarries, huts and more. Upgrade them for bigger profits! 

Search for other survivors to help you build an even bigger empire. Level up the survivors, explore the island and travel to other areas to unlock and max out everything! Discover the epic story behind each survivor and what caused the tragic plane crash in a fun builder type idle adventure tycoon game you have never seen before!

⭐ Join Iffy & his friends on this amazing idle builder adventure now! ⭐

*************************************

👩 Be sure to join our Tropic Empire community on Facebook and be the first to hear about updates and exciting news about the game!
https://facebook.com/tropicempire

✔ Any problems? We'll be happy to help!
support@empires.games

🌍 Check out our website too!
https://empires.games

title: Log Truck Simulator 3D: Trailer Parking
description:
Welcome to Log Truck Simulator 3D: Trailer Parking!
In this Trailer Parking edition of Log Truck Simulator 3D you'll learn how to park logging trailers loaded with wood. In 15 levels you'll face realistic situations where you have to park the trailers on different locations. You need good driving skills in order to complete all levels. You need to drive reverse into tight spots with your log trailer and truck for example. 

To finish a level you first have to attach the first trailer, to do that follow the red arrows. After you've attached the first trailer you have to park the first trailer, to do that follow the yellow arrows. After that you need to attach the second trailer, to do that follow the green arrows, and follow the blue arrows to park the second trailer.

Log Truck Simulator 3D: Trailer Parking features:
- Farm/forest environment
- 15 levels
- Google Play Games
- Cab-view with side mirrors
- Easy truck driving controls

When you enjoyed Log Truck Simulator 3D: Trailer Parking please support us by following us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/JansenGames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/JansenGames

title: Digital Tape Measure Distance Meter Laser App
description:
With Height Digital Tape Measure Distance Meter Laser App you have a strong device to measure the distance and height to objects around you. You can easily detect the distance to an object or the height of the object. No special skills or knowledge is required to use this app! Measure now the distance of your room and get the result in meters, centimeters, inches or feet. 

This app will turn your device into a strong distance laser meter! Surprise your friends and family with this app! Use the distance meter to measure the height of a building or to measure the distance to it!

Please note: This app will give you an estimation of the distance or the height! The results depend on the correctness of your sensors and can have a deviation up to 20 %.

title: Circular Defense
description:
They are coming closer towards the core!
Tower defence with a flat design.

◆How to play-
✓ Enemies come attacking from all four directions towards the core in the centre.
✓ Homing? Piercing bullets? Choose a circle from 6 kinds of variations as you wish and make your own defence line!
✓ Choose a circle and arrange by swiping, tap to make turrets-they are all easy to operate!
✓ Use resources by attacking enemies and strengthen the circle! Make it stronger! It becomes easier to capture the stages! 

◆Features
✓ You can play so smoothly, whenever you have some spare time!
✓ Use strategy? Try to be funny? You can arrange any way you like.
✓ Timing of arranging the circle and timing of using turret are important factor of the battle.
✓ There are more than 50 stages waiting for you from easy ones to quite difficult ones.

◆recommended for...
✓ Those who are fans of tower defence or defending games 
✓ Those who like strategy games that are very strategic 
✓ Those who enjoy a smartphone games that bring training elements.
✓ Those who want an efficient app to kill time while commuting.
✓ Those who want to enjoy a game with simple rules.
✓ Those that are looking for casual games for free.

Please give us your opinions and requests here.

title: Angry Shark Attack – Hungry Shark Simulator 2018
description:
Get ready to become the biggest sea predator of 2018. Become the biggest predator alive in the world. You play as a hungry shark and eat visitors swimming in the sea, for your biggest hungry shark appetite eats fishes and other sea animals. About Hungry Shark Game
You are the hungry shark in the big ocean, survive yourself by killing and eating swimmers and other fishes in your way to keep yourself alive. As a hungry shark you will get humans, big fishes, crocodiles as starters. You must dive deep down in the sea to get deliciously scuba divers, killer whales and sweet dolphins as a desert in your dinner. In this hungry shark world you will get swimmers on the surface of the ocean they don’t know what’s coming in their way, eat them in one bite in this amazing hungry shark world game. Your one shark bite is enough to eat females swimming in the ocean and be careful from the scuba divers they will hurt you and you will lose your health, keep watching your health if you don’t eat for long time you will lose your health and will die in the middle of the sea. Download this Angry Shark Attack Hungry Shark Simulator 2018. Get ready for the shark week is live now.
Your hungry shark is out for hunting it will attack everything comes in its way. You will get the boost button once it is filled use it for boosting your hungry shark and get enough things to eat in one run. Jump to the surface on the ocean and scare the day lights out of innocent sunbathers,  jet skiers, boaters and swimmers, in these warm water and chase your pray, grab them in your might jaws to kill and eat instantly. When shark becomes hungry it becomes angry don’t let your hungry shark strive or you will lose the game.

title: Kung Fu Clicker
description:
Restore a dojo to its former glory and become a martial arts master with Kung Fu Clicker!

The Shadow Fang gang are wreaking havoc on the neighborhood dojo. It’s up to you to fight them and defend your dojo from their attacks! Tap to invest in your dojo and let your idle profits grow. Then keep tapping to build bigger and better rooms for training students in the arts of kung fu and karate, and to recruit martial arts masters. Fight to restore your dojo to its former glory by competing against other kung fu clans, climbing the leaderboards, and earning a prestigious black belt.

Train your students to become heroes with Kung Fu Clicker, the incremental fighting game!

Kung Fu Clicker is free to play but offers some game items for purchase with real money.

Terms of Service: http://pikpok.com/terms-of-use/

title: Real Car Driving Simulator
description:
Drive fast sports cars and perform stunts, drifts, and tricks in no limits drive action from one of the best car driving simulator games! Drift real cars in the huge open driving world; explore city streets and corners, take a detour on the vast expanse and find stunts to jump off to do amazing stunts. 

Walk around your own personal car garage, select any real sports car, customize and upgrade how you like and go on the open road for the best drive in the all-new open world car driving simulator!

Real Car Driving Simulator is the latest, no limits drive sensation and one of the best car driving simulators!

Fully customize your own sports car to have its own unique style and driving sensation to how you like. Upgrade your car with paint jobs, decals, wheel rims, spoilers and more! Walk around and witness the high quality of each unique vehicle before you get in an drive in the open city streets.

Experience realistic car driving like no other simulation game; speed past city vehicles, drift around city streets, flip and wreck your car with real-time vehicle damage, see each scratch and dent with each car crash. Stop and rewind time at any point to get the perfect drift with the ALL-NEW time rewind and slow-motion game features!

Enjoy the driving sensation that brings you the best real drifting and driving, pulling off super long drifts, stunt jumps, and a whole load more to explore and do in one of the best car driving games!

Features:
- Massive open driving world with tons of areas to explore!
- Miles of roads to drift and drive on
- Full customization for sports cars
- Personal garage to walk around and explore
- Unlock and upgrade with easy to earn in-game coins
- Authentic and real sports car vehicles
- Exciting game features Slow-Mo, Nitro Boosts and Time Rewind
- Realistic car driving game physics
- Intelligent city A.I traffic driving 
- Multiple dynamic HD camera angles
- Hundreds of AI cars throughout the cities

Show off amazing drifting skills and pro driver talent in the exciting no limits drive action. Perform awesome car stunts in one of the best free car driving simulators available!

This game offers the massive open world for the best car driving simulator game experience! Race, drift, crash, jump, and flip around huge detailed open city, perform tricks and stunts, and have fun! Unlock, upgrade, and tune your sports car to be the best drifting machine on the road.

The most realistic and extreme car drifting game you'll ever experience, Real Car Driving Simulator!

title: Classic Train Simulator: Britain
description:
☆☆☆☆☆ Please rate and review the game. ☆☆☆☆☆

Classic Train Sim is the first of its kind high-quality, feature-rich railroad simulation games exclusively dedicated to the golden steam engine era. It features some of the most iconic British and American steam locomotives. Its intuitive, easy to use interface lets users play Career Mode to accomplish varied scenarios and unlock new trains and routes. 

Classic Train Sim is the first mobile train simulator to feature authentic trains from British train operators. The locomotives have been accurately recreated with maximum attention to detail.

☆ Original Steam engines ☆
Features stations from Britain and trains including the world famous Flying Scotsman.

☆ Authentic British Stations ☆
London's King's Cross, Peterborough, Doncaster, York and Huntingdon

☆ Permit System ☆
Access to every feature, train and location in the game is through a dedicated Permit System. Purchase newer permits using the in-game Credits and Gems. 

☆ Career Mode ☆ 
Dedicated career mode with Objectives that are required to be completed for maximum reward. Career accomplishments are featured on a leaderboard.

☆ Functional Driver Cabin ☆
A detailed Driver Cab Control view shows fully functional levers and switches. The needles and gauges work depending on the condition of the train. 

☆ Weather System ☆
Hyper-realistic dynamic weather system with incredible night detail and shadow. 

☆ Payloads ☆
Exclusive payload for various freight compartments. Coal Wagon, Cattle Wagon Etc

☆ Schedule Board ☆
Schedule for arrival and departure lets users follow a time table like real world. 

☆ Camera Angles ☆
Many camera angles shows the game from every view imaginable. 

☆ Passenger Area ☆
Passenger seating area with first class, second class, executive cabin. Also view of restaurant, bar and restroom will be added soon.

☆ Train Controls ☆
Throttle, braking, cab light and headlights, whistle are available to the driver and are required to be operated for certain objectives in Career Mode.

☆ Door Operation ☆
Door control system to let the passengers into the train. 

☆ Drive Mode ☆
A quick mode that lets you choose the train, route, source and destination stations, weather and the time of the day for the simulation.

☆ Multi Language Translations ☆
- The Game already support English, French, Indonesian and German. More languages like Italian, Spanish, Czech, Portuguese will be added in the future. 

☆ Signal System and AI trains☆
The Signals system are accurate and keep a large number of AI trains in control without any traffic. Follows the British world-war era semaphore signalling. 

☆ Contacts Permission is required by Google Play Games and is not necessary for playing the game. Feel free to refuse that permission if you do not want Google Play Games leaderboard.  


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


☆ Hope you enjoy playing Classic Train Sim. Future updates will add more train operators from America and routes as well. More updates are coming soon. 

So what are you waiting for? Become a Train Driver today and drive Steam Locomotives all across Britain. 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EuroTrainSim/

It features some of the most iconic British and American steam locomotives. Its intuitive, easy to use interface lets users play Career Mode to accomplish varied scenarios and unlock new trains and routes.

Classic Train Sim is the first mobile train simulator to feature authentic trains from British train operators. The locomotives have been accurately recreated with maximum attention to detail.

☆ Original Steam engines ☆
Features stations from Britain and trains including the world famous Flying Scotsman.

☆ Authentic British Stations ☆
London's King's Cross, Peterborough, Doncaster, York and Huntingdon

☆ Permit System ☆
Access to every feature, train and location in the game is through a dedicated Permit System. Purchase newer permits using the in-game Credits and Gems.

☆ Career Mode ☆
Dedicated career mode with Objectives that are required to be completed for maximum reward. Career accomplishments are featured on a leaderboard.

☆ Functional Driver Cabin ☆
A detailed Driver Cab Control view shows fully functional levers and switches. The needles and gauges work depending on the condition of the train.

☆ Weather System ☆
Hyper-realistic dynamic weather system with incredible night detail and shadow.

☆ Payloads ☆
Exclusive payload for various freight compartments. Coal Wagon, Cattle Wagon Etc

☆ Schedule Board ☆
Schedule for arrival and departure lets users follow a time table like real world.

☆ Camera Angles ☆
Many camera angles shows the game from every view imaginable.

☆ Passenger Area ☆
Passenger seating area with first class, second class, executive cabin. Also view of restaurant, bar and restroom will be added soon.

☆ Train Controls ☆
Throttle, braking, cab light and headlights, whistle are available to the driver and are required to be operated for certain objectives in Career Mode.

☆ Door Operation ☆
Door control system to let the passengers into the train.

☆ Drive Mode ☆
A quick mode that lets you choose the train, route, source and destination stations, weather and the time of the day for the simulation.

☆ Multi Language Translations ☆
- The Game already support English, French, Indonesian and German. More languages like Italian, Spanish, Czech, Portuguese will be added in the future.

☆ Signal System and AI trains☆
The Signals system are accurate and keep a large number of AI trains in control without any traffic. Follows the British world-war era semaphore signalling.

☆ Contacts Permission is required by Google Play Games and is not necessary for playing the game. Feel free to refuse that permission if you do not want Google Play Games leaderboard.


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


☆ Hope you enjoy playing Classic Train Sim. Future updates will add more train operators from America and routes as well. More updates are coming soon.

So what are you waiting for? Become a Train Driver today and drive Steam Locomotives all across Britain.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/EuroTrainSim/
summary: Classic steam era locomotives from Britain. Authentic routes and stations.

title: Camper Van Driving Truck 2018-Virtual Family Games
description:
The best Camper Van Driving Simulator Game is here!

Get ready for the craziest camping trip ever, packed with adventurous activities and camper van ride in virtual family games. Start most awaited summer offroad adventure while driving camping car in beach resort and enjoy summer camp holidays in the best way possible. Play Camper Van Driving Truck 2018 along with the entertaining gameplay of Virtual Family Games. Start your camper van truck driving and go out for summer camping fun with virtual mom and virtual dad in happy family games. Drive summer holiday car, attach with camper truck trailer and complete camping car parking missions at beach resort.

Summer vacation is almost here! It's time for a fun-filled day with tons of RV caravan driving and beach resort activities! Embark on an exciting adventure of summer holidays happy family life with the help of virtual mom and virtual dad. Experience the thrill of driving offroad camper truck on smooth roads around sunny beach resort to be an offroad driver. Select your favorite monster truck or cruiser car, attach with camper truck trailer, and drive with your happy family around tropical beaches. Caper the magnificent view of blue sea as you drive through vertigo-inducing oceanside routes. Grab your beach bag, rub in your sunscreen, & let's get going! There's no better way to spend a hot summer day in family camping games.

CAMPING CRAZINESS!
Meet the Browns - Johnson Family & Anderson Family! These virtual families want you to join them on their camping trip. This summer season, help virtual happy family in this summer camp trip and enjoy craziness and fun activities more than any typical family trip. Discover the mesmerizing events in this camping adventure and made your day by driving holiday car, pitch tent and enjoy bbq along with campfire. The game features beautiful sunny offroad driving adventure spots which make camper truck driving and virtual life summer camp activities a true pleasure. So pack a bag and buckle up,it's sure to be an unforgettable adventure!

CAMPFIRE!
Gather ‘round the campfire! Help virtual families collect sticks and stones to build a campfire along with virtual mom and dad. Enjoy roasted marshmallows - a delicious camping treat in this summer camp games.

TENT TIME!
Hurrah, it’s time to pitch a tent! Your tent is the perfect place to camp out in nature with your favorite virtual families. Start your road trip weekend adventure and explore the nature while offroad truck driving, build a tent, make a campfire and much more!

Camper Van Driving Truck Simulator Game Features:
Drive multiple vehicles: camping car, RV caravan, camper truck
Detailed camper trailer models with real time physics
Happy family activities with virtual mom & virtual dad
Exciting gameplay in car trailer truck parking missions
Dynamic traffic to drive ahead in outdoor environment
Advanced turbo engine designed for trailer truck vehicles
Realistic 3D graphics with amazing sound effects

Drive offroad truck and camper van trailer through rv caravans around crowded campsites and hilly areas to become offroad driver in latest Camper Van Driving Truck Simulator.

title: Big Craft 2 Prime : Pocket Edition
description:
Big Craft 3 Prime Pocket Edition and Exploration is a game where you can put together a world to your liking. The only limit is your own creativity!
In this sandbox game you can explore the world, discovering amazing places and reassembling the cubes that form it however you wish.

Sandbox exploration, survival & creative mode moved to another level in miner crafting game. Mine, Craft & Build. This lite app (Pocket edition), inspired by the epic Pocket Edition & cube pixel games, gives you opportunity to transform realistic HD terrain in 3D environment, and build a perfect realistic looking cube pixel world! Play in a creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the cube pixel world. Here every world is unique. Explore randomly generated realistic cube worlds, build and create amazing & perfect real-life things from the simplest of homes to the grandest of cube fortresses and castles! Become an adventurer with shelter: Craft & Exploration! Remember Infiniminer? No ‘Don’t Starve mode’, no dragon, no survival mode. Just cube pixel terrarian world, exploration and your infinite creativity! From the floating islands in the sky to the deepest levels of underworld. Build perfect structures step by step, create awesome castles! Beware of wolf, milk the cow, chase the chicken and hunt the deer! Terraria Animals are here! Very quick and easy exploration lite mode. 

Features:

- Building game: Build your own constructions. Who will have the best building?
- Fun game: Play with villagers and animals it is so fun!
- Cool game: Find a hidden cave with your friends, multiplayer mode is cool!
- Perfect game for the family: boys and girls will love it.
- One of the best simulation games: start constructing your house and meet your neighbors.

Thank You !

title: Car Crash Test UAZ BUHANKA
description:
Before you a new simulator of destruction of cars Car Crash Test UAZ BUHANKA. In this simulator is presented a new car UAZ BUHANKA. Choose the car you like in the garage and do whatever you want with it. Do not only test the machine but also test the dummy. In the simulator of the Car Crash Test UAZ BUHANKA, a variety of driving modes and crash crashes are available. You can choose a crash test and after it you will know what were the chances of surviving the crash test of the dummy, whether the car survived and many other things. Break the brick walls at high speed and destroy the 3D machine UAZ BUHANKA, break the machines completely and try to leave the dummy intact. Arrange the car for a crash test and other tests or just have fun driving. Customize UAZ BUHANKA and other cars, make them more comfortable for you and your race. Change colors, wheels and much more, so that you like the car more. Pass all the tests of the crash test UAZ BUHANKA with the dummy.

 We often update our simulators, and almost always respond to your feedback and comments, and if you have any suggestions, we will be happy to see them, our games are based on your feedback and suggestions. Thanks to you in the simulator Car Crash Test UAZ BUHANKA introduced a new system of machine damage. For those with whom the game is possible to slow down - reduce the quality of graphics in the settings of the game ("Settings" -> "Graphic").


 The main provisions of the game:

 - various locations
 - 3 high-quality 3D models of cars and UAZ BUHANKA
 - Various settings for customizing the machine (the color of the car, etc., the wheels and casting, the body repair, the convergence, the air suspension)
 - a large number of settings for managing the style of driving a car
 - Different modes of crash-test and driving cars
 - live ragdoll crash test dummy
 - realistic graphics and damage to machines (depending on the phone model - "Settings" -> "Graphic")
 - a new system of machine destruction


 For your suggestions, ideas and criticism, you can write either in the comments to our simulator, or on the mail: insanegameprod@gmail.com

title: Apocalypse idle miner
description:
Earth in the year 20xx, Hades Comet  crashed directly into the Earth's atmosphere. Due to intense friction with the atmosphere, comets explode and fragments everywhere , the debris plunged into the ground, destroying almost  the life there . It’s not worst thing, comet debris contains a number of strange minerals that emit a powerful radiation that instantly turned the people into Zombies 

The Earth Union meets and decides to dig deep into the earth to collect all debris from the comet and return it to the universe. With positive contributions and maximum trust, you are elected as the leader of the zombies people, you make the zombie victims to dig and collect debris in the hope of rescuing survivors of the world.

How to play 
- Tap into zombie to make them work
- Hire manager to do your work
- Upgrade your mine 
- Expand your mine
- Make profit while saving the world

Features:
★ Manage your own factories and make zombies work to get more idle cash
★ Zombies continue to work, even when you are offline from the game 💤
★ Invest your idle cash and boost your income 🤑
★ Hire managers to motivate the workstations 😍💪
★ Use trophies and prestige your factories to increase productivity! ⭐🏆
★ No internet connection needed 📶
★ In-App purchases available

Apocalypse zombie idle: one of the best apocalypse idle games.
Become a tycoon in the apocalypse world

title: Offroad Cruiser Simulator
description:
Offroad Cruiser Car Simulator is a real physics engine racing game and simulator (+ multiplayer mode).

This business and popular luxury driving simulator ensures realistic car damage and accurate driving physics. A free app lets you drive an super vehicle and even drift. 

Set up a race according to your own rules! Turn on the music and let's go!!!! 

There are four different game modes to choose from: 
1. CITY (free ride). In the CITY mode you are participant of the city traffic. 
2. CITY (online). Multiplayer mode in city. 
3. DESERT (online). This is a multiplayer race in the desert. 
4. PORT (online). This is a multiplayer race in the port. 
5. DESERT 2 (online). This is a multiplayer freeride in the desert. 
6. DESERT 2 (free ride). Freeride mode in desert. 

*** GAME FEATURES *** 
- This exciting and dynamic game is sure to bring you hours of fun.
- Richly detailed off-road car. 
- You get realistic acceleration. 
- First-person and third-person modes. 
- Many of the components inside the car are interactive.

title: Moon Landing
description:
No percent or virtual units! Only real kilograms, meters, seconds ... Only real physics!
By adjusting the thrust of the engine, land the lunar module on the moon, the speed at the contact with the surface should not exceed 5 m / s (soft landing). The engine mode is determined by the amount of fuel and the time for which this fuel is fired. If the acceleration exceeds the allowable value, the control is switched off for a time proportional to the acceleration.
Also added a simpler game mode with continuous control, where you need to adjust only the fuel consumption to the engine.

title: Mighty Dice
description:
Simulate a D20, D12, D10, D8, D6, or D4 dice roll at any moments notice. After making a roll, add or subtract a modifier and quickly share a screenshot of the result with a single tap - perfect for texting your D&D group. Pick out your favorite dice skin and get rolling!

Features:

- Add a skill modifier +/- after each roll.
- Share a screenshot of the result with a single tap.
- Quick roll mode: turn this on in the settings panel to skip throw physics if you're in a hurry.
- Option to disable sounds and/or haptic feedback.
- Choose from 19 dice skins.

Advertisements:

After choosing a new dice skin, a video ad will automatically play, which you can immediately skip. This is the only time you will be presented with an ad inside the app. This allows us to keep the app free for everyone and support future development of the app. Thank you!

title: Fake News Inc. - News Conspiracy Idle Clicker
description:
Create, manipulate, dominate!

Tap on the viral power of fake news, rise from social media obscurity and build your own fake media empire!

Come up with explosive conspiracy theories, spread memes on social networks, tarnish reputations and climb the shady media ladder until your news are indistinguishable from the truth!

With just a tiny pinch of truth, you can make any story seem believable on the internet! Just pick a popular controversial topic to tap on, choose heroes and villains and spread the news as much as you can: that’s how fake media tycoons are self-made in current times!

HIGHLIGHTS

📰 MANIPULATE facts, feed conspiracy theorists, tap on the power of controversy and dominate the fake news business like an “alternative” media tycoon!

📰SPREAD sensational news through any means you can! Social networks, blogs, respectable-looking news sites and, eventually, your very own fake media empire!

📰GATHER more and more resources to tap on with classic idle clicker gameplay and fuel your fake news hobbie!

📰HIRE managers to help you spread your stories and garner a fast-growing audience that will give your carefully crafted hoaxes the impact they need!

📰CONTROL public opinion and steer it to whatever side suits your noble interests!

Making your fake news go viral is no easy feat, but now you can spread them as much as you want: just tap, sit idle for a bit,  and then tap again and again!

The times have changed, and small details like a respected credibility track record and verified sources are no longer requirements to succeed in the news-biz!

A sensational story always trumps a true story when it comes to viral potential, and fake news disguised as memes can outshine even award-winning journalism!

And someday, who knows, YOU might be at the center of your own fake news scandal!

Download now and start creating the truth!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

title: Scary Nun - AR Ghost Detector
description:
Hello, do you want to get scared? Then this is a game for you!

We know that you love to play horror games and watch horror films. That is why we made this AR game for you.

You probably watched scary horror films where the main character gets chased by a ghost or some curse in a dark and mystic area with scary sounds and paranormal activity. In some films happen even stranger things like a demon granny or devil nun. Lots of different evil things happen in these movies. But where are the most scary and mystic things? They all are collected within this game!

You are walking among the sleep? Ghost is already around you! Our detector can help you find them, after all, they are really everywhere! AR and VR adventures wait in front.

Gameplay process: Scary Nun - AR Ghost detector is a VR app that can show you the walking dead demon or evil grin with the help of the radar on the screen.

Special augmented reality is:

- Really supernatural sounds and music
- Lots of different horror modes
- Augmented functional of reality games
- Real scary stories
- Creepy atmosphere

Do you want virtual reality to show you the real dead spirits within your neighborhood?

Pretend that the evil spirit is your neighbor.

You can see in the virtual reality curse bearers that are called evil demon.

Dark spirit, creepy witch, cursed ghost and nightmare are waiting for you. Each one of them has come from completely different stories.  Within soul you can feel the fear. Fear is normal for such stranger situations. Do 2 things. Snap out of it! Make your thoughts free. People say that even if you see a witch, an ancient evil, terror granny or something supernatural, the sacred cross will always help you.

Attention! This is just one of reality games that was made for entertainment and jokes, do not worry it will not show you the real ghosts that can harm you.

Exorcism will not be needed!

Open the world of paranoid madness for yourself in this game!

title: Hacko: Outdoor Hacking Simulator
description:
Make hiking fun with this new geolocation-based game.

Network nodes appear on your neighborhood's map, approach them by feet to connect to them... and ultimately to hack them !

As a hacker, you'll have to plan your operations. Compile some viruses using various components (add some exploits to target more more or some stealth features to make sure your virus will stay uncovered for longer).

With the viruses ready, go outside, choose a target node - bank, research lab or FBI office - launch your cyber attacks and infect network nodes making them parts of your  botnet.

Hacking is not easy. Nodes have valuable assets protected by encryption. Even when you infected a node, you still need to hack the encryption to steal the assets. This is where your botnet power comes in handy.

Use the assets from hacked nodes and script pieces collected in the street to build more powerful viruses with advanced exploits to hack more advanced nodes - and the whole network will soon be yours. 

Hey, hacker ! Connect your uplink, turn on GPS and go for a hike-and-hack! 🚶 !
Start enjoying hiking with this hacking simulator (and recall that 👟 walking is highly beneficial for your health 💓).

title: Ants Colony - Simulator
description:
Ant Colony, this is a fairly detailed simulator of ants, based on their real behavior. Build huge anthill and protect it with strong warriors! Get food and explore new territories!
In Ant Colony u can create 4 types of ants:

Scout
- The fastest ant
- Looking for food
- Can go far from an anthill

Loader:
- The strongest ant (Can carry more items at once)
- Looking for food close to an anthill
- Waiting for Scouts to get info about food location

Warrior:
- The highest damage and the heaviest armor
- Defending ants

Worker:
- Works inside of an anthill
- Feeding the ant queen (helps to spawn new ants)
- Building new parts of an anthill

In upcoming updates, we will increase the amount of buildings, size of a map, we will add new enemies, locations and new resources. Don't miss it up!
