title: Oil Tanker: City Oil Transport Simulation Game
description:
You are hired as heavy duty Oil Tanker: City Truck Transport Game driver.in Oil Tanker: OffRoad Oil Tanker Transportation You have to prove your heave Oil tanker drive skill by completing the Oil Tanker Truck test challenges. Oil tanker city transport simulation game have challenging and dramatics levels where you have to drive Oil tanker and transport the Petrol to the city petrol stations. Start The Oil Tanker Engine and Drive the powerful engine of heavy Cargo Off-road Oil Truck Transporter. Enjoy the Oil Cargo Truck Driving simulation experience with in heavy City Traffic. Avoid the oil tanker truck crashes while crossing and don't drive your truck above speed limit. Off-road oil tanker transport driver sim is one of the best liquid fuel cargo transporter truck game with an ultimate adventure of city oil tanker parking and city oil tanker driving experience. 
Join the oil transportation tycoon and play the real uphill oil tanker game and show your real oil tanker driving skills to drive the heavy duty trailer on off-road tracks. Your main job is to make sure the continuity of oil to off-road gas stations and city petrol pumps. You have to make sure to transport the oil tanker to the city petrol station on time so that the oil transportation continuity remain. City Oil Tanker driving simulation challenges need full attention to complete the levels without crushes and full focus and control over the oil tanker driving.
Driving the big Oil truck in the exciting environment. Oil Tanker City Transporter Simulator game may not be easy as it looks! You must be an EXPERT in parking trucks to deliver oil tanks to the right locations. Drive from on the heavy traffic roads from one city to another. Drive your loaded truck in the beautiful countryside, cities, over dangerous mountains and hilly environment and along green farms. Be sure there is no leakage in your tanker truck, or else oil will spill out and fine will be charged from you according to the quantity wasted. Oil Tanker: City Oil Truck Simulation Game is petrol transportation game to the petrol stations

title: Super Illusion Hypnotizer
description:
Welcome to Super Illusions Hypnotize game, Use this application to look, how it possible to deceive the eyes. The game of optical illusions that will make hypnotize people. You can also use this hypnosis app to hypnotize people. Many people are liable to hypnosis, so you can try to hypnotize your friends or family using the optical illusions. Watch their reactions and what is most important – have fun!. You can also entertain yourself playing the funny hypnotize game and you see the world around you with other eyes.  Super illusions uses strobe images, if you are sensitive to flickering lights it is not advisable to use this application.  

Instructions: Open your game, choose the animation of the visual effect you like, look at the center of the optical illusion for 30 seconds, Try not to look away. After 30 seconds turn the view on any object or fix your eyes on some object and hallucinate with what will happen. The object you are looking at will begin to deform, it will dynamically change its morphology, you will see how it expands or contracts, you will see how it moves even though it is really still. The hypnotic simulation effect will last you a few seconds, after that time everyone will return to normal. Each illusion creates a different hypnotizing effect for a few seconds. Some effects give the sensation of being floating, as of weightlessness.  Technical Characteristics - The application is translated internally in 93 languages, depending on the language you have activated in the operating system of your device. - 50 different hallucinations you can get - Includes environmental, peaceful sleep music sounds within each simulated hypnotizing effect. - Compatible with phones and tablets.   Thanks for downloading Super Illusions, the fhree game that will make you see the world around you in different ways for a few seconds. share game with your friends and family, rate us. You can write comments and suggestions to help us expand and improve this game.

description:
Chat with Surprise Lol Dolls
Surprise Lol Dolls are cute and adorable babies wrapped in a bag of seven layers of surprises. Feed the babies and water them with balloons and water guns. See them change colors and cry, surprise. Chat With Surprise Lol Dolls .These are the fun things you can have.
If you are a great fan of these surprise dolls then the app is built for you and especially available for the users who want to chat with LOL Surprise dolls in real environment. Chat With Surprise Lol Dolls .The app allows users to send and receive messages. You will get instant but funny response from the chatbot. The application is a prank application and is not real chat app. It makes your friends and family members think that you are talking to the Lol Surprise Dolls in front of them.
Here are the standing features of the app:
Attractive layout:
The app has an attractive layout so that one will not get bored using the app. it is designed in a way to engage the users with the app.
User friendly:
This app is user-friendly as it is designed by one of the industry standard designers. The app has a great design just like other chat apps available in the Play Store. All you need to do is just open the app by clicking the app icon and a start chat with Surprise Lol Dolls with the Start Chat button.
Easy to share:
The app is easy to share with friends and if you like it, make sure to share it on social media so that others can prank their friends and family too.
Chat without wi-fi:
The app works even without wi-fi and it doesn’t need any internet connection. You can chat without any connection and the app works just fine. The app will still be able to reply you. You can still pull pranks on your friends and family members.
Instant message reply:
Chat With Surprise Lol Dolls
The application supports instant messages and hence it feels like that Surprise Lol Dolls are chatting to you. Whenever you want to text, just send a text and a text will be on your phone that will make you laugh.

Just like other apps, this app can be installed and uninstalled easily. To install the app, just search on the Google Play Store and find install button on the app page. The app will be installed on your phone. To uninstall the page, you can either do it directly from that install page or go to settings and find uninstall app settings and search for the uninstall button. There you go. It is so easy to get this app and remove from your phone.
Warning:
Remember that the app is just a prank app for your friends and family members. It doesn’t harm anyone in any way. So, it’s safe for everyone. 
Download the app and share with others if you like it.

title: Empire Revolution:Age of Glory
description:
Adventure and conquer the chaos world in Empire Revolution:Age of Glory - an online survival-themed strategy game which you can construct your empire to defend other lords’ scout and invasion. Conquer and create your own age!

Blood and glory, war and dawn, there are countless battles, invasion and revenge, and you can experience legendary battles in this empire! Build the unique kingdom which is under your reign, team up with ally to defend others’ scout and invasion, raid competing kingdoms for their good loots! What are you waiting for? Joining us and download Empire Revolution: Age of Glory now!!

Game Features

*Choose Splendid Civilization*
Choose one of 7 splendid civilizations and start your adventure through time. No matter the self-determined Germans or the free and democratic French. Each empire has its special soldiers that help you reign the kingdom and develop quickly. You can create your own history through different civilizations.

*Build Legendary Empire*
Lead a village from the early age to a legendary kingdom where you can construction historic wonders like Forbidden City or Terra Cotta Warriors. Farming hunting, research armies, training troops, upgrade heroes and so on. Defend your empire by forge the strongest army, cross the frontier, the world is under your reign!

* Recruit Famous Heroes *
Recruit and upgrade all of the famous heroes with unique skills! The Great Alexander, gorgeous Cleopatra, Great hero Cao Cao, heroic Napoleon, five-star general Macarthur, all of them will lead your kingdom to glory. 

* Fight in World War*
Establish alliances with other empires to participate in World War! Experience the thrill of real-time war as civilizations clash, strike down your opponent in the MMO strategy game.

*Be the Strongest King*
Lead the powerful empire legion to compete with other competitors, victory can get higher rankings. Write your own legend in Empire Revolution!

Download the 2018 free  multiplayer strategy game, to be the kingdom's lord and create the strongest empire, start your history to conquer the world!

title: Military Capitalist: Idle Incremental Game
description:
Do you dream of running a successful business empire and becoming rich beyond your dreams? Become a Capitalist and go on an money making adventure in this idle clicker incremental game. Start by making Dog Tags for military to making Gas Masks. As your money grows spend it to expand business and unlock upgrades.

Develop your military bases to become stronger than other Business Capitalists and acquire more military contracts. Build barracks, hangers, shipyards, research labs. Buy tanks, jets, submarines and gain more military strength.

Hire managers to run you business for you and Sit idle & see you money increase or be a swift clicker to manufacture products on you own.

Upgrade bank to hold your money in your absence and safe from you corrupt managers.

Show them patriot investors you capitalist skills and let them join you in your venture.

title: NewYork Firefighter Emergency Truck: Rescue Hero
description:
Fire! Behave as brave fireman take risk his life to save the city from the flames.
In this fire fighter game the mission of fireman is extinguish the fire of burning city! Ready, Press play button and move your firetruck from FireFighter Academy/Headquater. Choose your control setting from setting menu i.e. Steering, Buttons and Tilt etc. Drive realistic american fire truck carefully, follow the traffic rules and signals,be-ware roadblocks and road slumps are ahead!.Use firefighter alarm signals and rescue siren to alarm newyork city people about rescue emergency.

It is your chance to bring peace and prosperity in this city by starting driving a rescue fire truck, but you must know how to park fire truck and how to drive emergency truck, be the good truck driver. You are not the only firefighter in this Real Rescue Drive, to make a team and work in team is good for you and for your rescue operation. Start with learning from this game and take the lessons about fire rescue and get yourself job in the fire brigade department with the permission of fire department. 

So here is the challenge to rescue the citizen and extinguish the fire from the frie truck. Look for buildings on fire and highway roads accidents and help the people in danger. Test your driving skills in one of the best simulator free game. Grab fire hose, race your fire truck to save lives and display courage of a real emergency firefighter rescue. Extinguish the fire by fireman expertise and save the innocent lives.

Features:
 3D graphics and detailed environment
 Realistic animated people
 Thrilling mission to complete
 Realistic truck driving
 Intuitive truck controls
 Addictive offline gameplay
 Exciting sound of fire truck sirens
 Smooth gameplay
 Simple controls
 The whole fire department in action
 Exceptional emotions

description:
Prepare yourself as fish catcher for the Fishing Mania where you are fisherman and catch the different fish species using Fishing Hook. Here you got the best fish catcher! Fun in summer season at beach is quality time for all fishing game lovers. Get ready to play Fishing Transport and become a real fishing champion in beach fishing game.

Enjoy the beach area and caught the different fish species you do have in open world environment. Fishing Transport is realistic fishing game with different quests to complete and sell fishes to the market. This game has the most advance 3D sand land environment with a lot of sea creatures or sea animals which you have never seen in other fish transport games.

Gameplay:

Fishing Transport Mania is adventurous game with interesting gameplay where you will fun with fishing in beach environment and see beautiful nature around. If you like fishing as hobby then this simulator is perfect for you. You do have all equipment’s like fish rod and fishing bait for fish catching. Start fishing adventure! You will find the rare fish species to catch. Use fishing rod & other equipment in this fish hunting game. Drive the big delivery truck and rush on heavy traffic roads to transport fishes to different supermarkets like food factory and stores. This ultimate driver and fishing simulator game is fun and adventure with eventual challenges of driving in the highway traffic. Manage to complete your task on time otherwise the mission will fail. Action and adventure game is ready to blast the game in fishing gaming world with the help of realistic fisherman skills and sand land environment.

•	Play as fisherman and catch the fishes for selling
•	Use fish rod and fishing bait for fish catching
•	Drive the big truck to transport fishes 
•	Catch the best fish species and sell in the supermarket

Enjoy this beautiful fish transporting game with awesome gameplay which is full of fishing adventure in this Fishing Transport Mania. You will use the fishing hook to catch fishes in the beautiful beach water. Take advantage of your fishing hobby and catch the best fish species while exploring in fishing mania game.

title: School bus driver 3d 2018
description:
Want to become School bus driver? Here is school bus driver job for you. Download FREE magic school bus driving 3d game.  Transport students to school and fulfill school bus driver requirements to get school driver pay on bus driver appreciation day.

School driving is a difficult job you need to strictly follow school bus schedule complete all magic school bus driver requirements and take school driver test to become a professional school driver. In school driving games 2018 new the school driver will pickup students from different points in the city and will driver the yellow school bus through the city to transport students to the school in required time. This school bus simulator game is 1 stop driving school where you learn school driving 2018 new.  School bus driving games enhances bus driving skills of school driver while pick & drop children following school bus schedule using bus driving and parking skills in school car driving games simulator 2018.

In this school bus driving simulator 2018 new the school bus driver drive school bus yellow, magic school bus red with good gvwr rating. These multifunction school activity buses have exterior warning lights and multiple safety devices to ensure student safety while pick & drop students from home to school on strict school bus schedule. Take you magic bus from school bus garage follow school bus routs in the city to pick children of pre school and high school and drop them in school’s parking area. Having multiple devices for children’s safety the multi-function school activity bus flips a stop sign when it has to pick and drop children which make the traffic stop while picking and dropping children of school. Thanks to school district for taking security measures in transit style school buses for maximum student care of school children.

title: RPG Tycoon Simulator 2018
description:
Welcome to RPG Tycoon!

RPG Tycoon is an RPG-style simulation game that allows you to become immensely powerful by forging new equipment and fighting monsters! Craft and forge exciting new weapons to defeat enemies!

There's a bunch of fun stuff to do, and hours upon hours of awesome content!

Everything is a mini-game,  so there's no boring sitting around and waiting for things to get done.

The crafting and forging mechanics are at the core of the game. Crafting and upgrading awesome weapons and armor is the best way to overcome challenges! Every time you level up, you benefit greatly from crafting new equipment. If you like crafting games, you'll love this!

Of course, you need ore to craft equipment, so you have to mine it in the form of the mining mini-game.

Once you craft your equipment, you can make it even more powerful by enchanting it and upgrading it! Upgrading weapons and armor is incredible important, so make sure to do it as soon as you can!

You upgrade equipment the same way you craft it, and you have to do it just right to get the most out of an upgrade!

Enchants are powerful spells that you can use to attack enemies. You have to gather materials dropped by enemies in order to enchant spells onto weapons!

The battling is done in stages. After you craft and upgrade your gear, you can head into battle. You must defeat 9 enemies and a boss to progress to the next stage. You'll only earn experience on the stage equal to your level, so make sure you do that if you want to level up! Fighting can be done automatically. No complicated or confusing mechanics here. Just sit back, relax, and have some fun defeating enemies! You can turn off automatic combat if you want more of a challenge, or want to time your attacks just right.

You earn coins and enchant materials by slaying enemies, which you can use to upgrade your equipment to make it much stronger!

There are many RPG elements to this game, including leveling up, experience, equipment gathering and crafting, and battling enemies.

Please direct any urgent questions to support@protopiagames.com.

Have fun! I hope you enjoy it!

Leave a good review if you like the game!

title: Christmas Slacking
description:
Ho ho ho! The Christmas season is upon us and that means Santa will need help from the Elves in his workshop to get all Christmas presents ready...but one naughty little Elf called Sarah would sooner slack. It's Christmas after all! Can Sarah pull up her stockings and help Santa get all presents ready in time or will she get wrapped up in tinsel and her own Merry Christmas?

Use your finger to complete activities, Help Sarah slack off at Santa's workshop. But If have a signal Santa walks over and looks, close all activities to get back to work!

title: Epic Creatures: Battle Monster Warrior- Action RPG
description:
The battle between epic creatures and battle monsters on both sides is about to start. Ride the crest of the Idle RPG wave with Epic Creatures! 

Prepare your best warriors for the fight. Start an epic action journey of enchantment to explore the Magic Ladder and the secrets contained deep within. Lead your war troops into the light and overcome all battle challenges that lay before you to emerge victorious in an epic war! The world's destiny is in your hands!

In this epic game you will be able to create a troop of warriors, battle with your favourite monster heroes, and get the best experience of the whole journey. If you like battle games, you will love Epic Creatures. Choose your favourite monster hero and start winning battles.

ENGAGING ACTION RPG GAMEPLAY
Your epic creatures heroes can’t wait to fight auto-battles against the enemy on your behalf! Create and gain experience with every powerful monster troops and epic legendary heroes in the rpg battle of this idle game!
Awesome equipment and legendary summoner heroes in a warrior troops challenge is waiting for you!

ENDLESS SKILLFUL AND STRATEGIC FUN
Plan your battle troops fight tactics and maneuver with your legendary powerful war hero to secure victory, it's your free action RPG destiny!
Collect, upgrade and use your rewards wisely to show off your strength as leader on an legendary epic adventure game!
Simple, yet effective strategy combat allows you to enjoy this magic RPG at home or on the go! Plan your characters tactics and war troops maneuver and dominate the battlefield to defeat every war hero and enemy warriors adventure troops! The war destiny is on the battlefield!

A HIGH QUALITY VISUAL AND AUDIO FEAST
Exquisite legendary heroes' aesthetics and creatures artwork in this free action RPG challenge adventure full of fighting!
Jaw dropping epic combat and maneuver animations in the battlefield arena and awe inspiring action battle challenge effects!

COMMING SOON:
Worldwide Multiplayer Arena
Fight alongside your friends and players everywhere in a war for control of the floating continent.

Start now this epic combat adventure with your best legendary tactics war hero and epic warriors action in a fantasy adventure with different creatures and battlegrounds in a non-stop free RPG! Your destiny is to lead your magic creatures legendary heroes guild army and war troops in a free battle adventure to the death!

title: Snow Heavy Excavator Crane Rescue
description:
The perpetual Winter season has started over New York, San Francisco and winter snowfall is piling up on roads. The eminent ice rocks Glaciers are sliding down and blocked traffic jam between mountains. Here, the need of snow plow rescue operation has occurred for survival mission at grand city. Get started with latest Snow Heavy Excavator Crane Rescue  mission to fulfill rescue duty by utilizing heavy loader truck. Drive through extreme winter snow fall with Dump Truck Bulldozer for demolishing huge pile of snowpack at highways. This Rescue crane simulator lets you play as professional heavy snow excavator truck driver. Drill and crack Glaciers rocks to clear roads with digging machine operator and move stuck citizens in streetcar.

This Snow Heavy Excavator Crane Rescue mission is all new city survival digging machine adventure. The futuristic heavy loader truck with advanced snow excavator abilities is designed uniquely to provide you finish line experience. Operate this snow plow rescue operation bulldozer to drill extreme glacier rocks. Drive snow billazard to cut down the cracked rocks with blade cutter and load it into your dump truck heavy machine. Sit behind giant crane digger and take control over snow blower steering wheels to excavate extreme winter snow fall. Drive rescue excavator crane to find out key locations of traffic jam for timely rescue duty at snowpack survival city. 

Winter is almost everywhere, the highways and city roads of NYc, San Francisco have traffic jam due to huge pile of snow plow. Operate Snow Heavy Excavator Crane Rescue to Cut Rocks block and shift into loader truck.  Initiate your giant crane operator and ride like snow blower rescue hero to move injured people. Maneuver with snow excavator robot truck through mountains and clear road blockage to provide city survival duty. Strive hard to escape from sliding glaciers, snowpack wrecking ball as many rescue city operation awaits for you. Unlike other bulldozer, snow billazard, sand simulator games, this loader truck make you feel like a rescue crane robot excavator hero to save citizens from narrow streets distress.

Eradicate all winter snow traffic jam or deadly snowpack wrecking ball blockage from city roads. Cut down heavy ice Rocks block by using rescue crane robot excavator. Drive vigilant crane digger heavy machine to provide rescue duty as soon as possible like snow billazard. To drive in extreme snow plow, narrow streets is no longer easy task, Move heavy truck loader immediately to avoid crashing with ice glacier. This city rescue robot simulator offers you all road construction, winter snow fall dump truck excavation task, Operate crane digger efficiently to accomplish rescue mission successfully. Be careful to ride with heavy snow excavator in extreme winter snowfall to perform rescue city duty.

You might have played many dump truck sand rescue mission but this time experience some real rescue city bulldozer driving and move towards finish line. Download Snow Heavy Excavator Crane Rescue and be a professional crane operator while fulfil city survival duty. Movearound New York streets with digging machine operator to drill the glacier rock blocks. Take your chance as amazing heavy snow removal loader truck driver and enjoy the fun of multiple robot rescue crane simulator with all in one extreme snowfall game.

Game Features:

▶  Astounding 3d Graphics & animations 
▶  Realistic winter snowfall Environment 
▶  Heavy excavator  machine operator
▶  Highly engaging City Survival Missions 
▶  Heavy Snow removal excavate simulator 
▶  Amazing game-play & Multiple camera views
▶  City Rescue crane Robot Excavator

title: Beach Crocodile Attack - Animal Hunting 3D
description:
The seashore is calm and cool, enact as a keen, wild and furious crocodile in this beach attack simulator and look for a delicious feast. Attack the picnickers and be a dangerous alligator simulator and hunt for the prey. Tear off the scaly skin of one of the most dangerous predators in wild, angry and hungry crocodile alligator, attack your prey and fulfill your hunger, keep it cool and keep an eye at prey through the terrifying and keen eyes of a crocodile. 
Feel the thrill of attacking in Beach Crocodile Attack Animal Hunting 3D , attack the oblivious prey and hunt down the humans and animals whatever comes in your way, tear them apart. Take control of most wild Predator’s reptile swamp monster, all animals in beach are afraid of the bloodthirsty hungry eyes, sharp teeth, roar of the wildlife simulator alligator rampage.
In Beach Crocodile Attack Simulator, play crocodile games for free and attack humans enjoying on the crazy beach where the bikers are all around showing stunts on fulfilled beach bikes, stay away from flog shark games and crocodile swap pool with megalodon killing spree be vigilant in the waters as killer sharks are also on the rampage and attacking its predator for meal, you can attack and eat crunch everything and keep the killing spree going, you can hunt the swimmers, scuba divers, can attack killer angry whales and sharks, dolphins, life underwater. 
As a furious wild beach crocodile and hungry angry alligator attack, you can spread danger, rampage, chaos, terror, gore, blood all across the sunny beach and be the deadly reptiles with wild hunting skills of crocodile crocs that ever lived in the shoal of megalodon. Feed your vicious, ruthless, ferocious, brutal alligator, because he has a very strong appetite and wants to attack frequently. The wild beach crocodile is hungry and very furious and is on the rampage and is in attacking mode, this ravenous huge wild beach crocodile lurches upon its crazy prey, coming out from the deep blue sea waters, swimming, crouching, targeting its prey. 
The  Beach Crocodile Attack - Animal Hunting 3D  is dangerous with extreme and killer razor sharp teeth and strong jaws; the wild crocodile chews and chomp the flesh of its prey. The wild beach crocodile silently swims towards the beach and seashore and appears suddenly from the sea waters, crawl your way onto the shore of the crazy beach, hunt and keep spreading fright for the unaware humans and animals simultaneously. 
In Wild Crocodile Beach Attack Simulator, take control over these giant deadly and hungry crocs-crocodiles in this action packed free crocodile game with alligator simulator. Keep your rippling eyes open, swim though the waters and attack the people and animals, it’s time to hunt a bloodthirsty wild crocodile. Play as wetland carnivorous reptile and move towards people and animals to attack them in this crocodile simulation game. Swim and Crawl! Hunt and Attack!
 In Beach Crocodile Attack - Animal Hunting 3D , you can attack and chomp and crunch everything and keep the killing spree going, you can hunt the swimmers, scuba divers, can attack killer deadly whales and sharks, dolphins, underwater creatures. As a killer and wild crocodile and hungry alligator attack, you can spread thrill, rampage, chaos, terror, gore, blood all across the sunny beach and be the furious reptiles with wild hunting skills of crocodile crocs that ever lived in the shoal of megalodon. Feed the your vicious, deadly, ferocious, brutal alligator, because he has a very big appetite and wants to attack a lot. 
Beach Crocodile Attack - Animal Hunting 3D  is an action and fun filled simulation game with anger and thriller, showing the wild rampage and anger of the beach crocodile with great pride, enjoy this angry swamp crocodile realistic simulator with never-ending fun and thrill.

title: 남자 지옥
description:
카카오페이지 웹소설 '남자 지옥'이 모바일 게임으로 탄생!
'황제의 외동딸' 윤슬 작가, '학생회 그놈들', '위험한 그놈들' 루시드림이 선사하는 유쾌발랄 로맨틱 판타지

:: 스토리

눈을 떠 보니,
내가 쓴 소설 속이었다?

좋아. 기왕 빙의한 몸인데 예쁘지, 똑똑하지, 귀족가의 외동딸이기까지 하니 말 다했지!
게다가 주위에는 온통 꽃미남들 뿐인데…

……그런데 잠깐만, 나 BL소설 작가 아니었던가?!

천국보다도 달콤한 지옥,
남자지옥


::게임소개

카카오스토리 웹 소설 '남자 지옥'을 원작으로 한 비주얼 노벨 형식의 여성향 연애 시뮬레이션 게임입니다.

- 소설 속의 등장인물이 되어 다양한 인물들과 관계를 만들어 보세요!
- 매력적인 일러스트와 몰입감을 높여주는 BGM으로 더욱 몰입감있는 스토리!
- 각양각색의 의상을 조합해 다양한 스타일링을 즐겨보세요.
- 선택지를 통해 즐기는 유쾌한 텍스트 어드벤처! 조건을 달성하면 확인할 수 있는 특별한 엔딩까지?!


호감도를 높여 남자지옥에서 탈출하자!


루시드림 사이트: http://lucydream.kr/
루시드림 트위터: https://twitter.com/lucydreamgame
루시드림 페이스북: https://www.facebook.com/lucydreamgames/
----

02-2083-8352

Are you ready to experience prado 4x4 offroad jeep hill climb on mountain tracks drive? If yes then drive the offroad  jeep on mountain tracks to become a modern expert driver. In this off road racing games free trucks jeep and car possible your dreams true right adventure on Greenland Mountains and city offroads.

Have more fun with this extreme drift offroad jeep driving 3d land cruiser jeep prado car. Climb high on the hilly, high paths. All you have to do is cross high challenges.

title: Underwater Train Simulator: Pro Train Driving
description:
Have you ever dreamed to control an unusual underwater pro train Driving? Now you have a chance to do this fantastic thing. Get ready for the new Underwater Train Simulator: Pro Train Driving game and power your train driving skills up riding through the ocean depths. This is a unique 3D simulator train that drive undersea train with passengers. Enjoy this extraordinary underwater type of travelling and have fun.

Mind that it’s not so easy to control such a heavy vehicle as a train without any crashes, so it’s a real chance for you to power all your driving and parking skills up to perfection level surrounded by beautiful oceanic nature. You will experience a real engine driving skills and improve your train driving techniques while playing this underwater driving game. Thrilling and entertaining missions are ready to blast the game in gaming world with the help of super-fast underwater train controls and enjoy ocean location.

Gameplay:

Underwater Train Simulator: Pro Train Driving is entertaining game with interesting gameplay where you will play as train driver and pick n drop passengers as well as collect checkpoints carefully in underwater environment. In this underwater train game you have to clear all train station which are the located in beautiful deep-sea atmosphere. Ride through the fantastic underwater surroundings; pass through the checkpoints and stations taking different swimming passengers like divers to deliver them to their right destination in given time. Enjoy the salty water and wonderfully blue expanses of the ocean riding by various coral reefs, beautiful leaps of fish and huge stony rocks. Drive this interesting way to improve your driving and parking skills. In emergency, you can stop the train before you enter the danger zone and decrease your train speed with the help of smooth controls. Earn points for successfully delivered people and power your train’s characteristics up to become faster and more maneuverable.

Key Features:

•	Play as Train Driver and drive carefully in underwater
•	Lovely ocean environment with smooth train controls
•	Beat your lap time record with super-fast train
•	Collect all the check points and pick n drop duty
•	Realistic and beautiful oceanic surroundings conditions

Become an operator of the large train and explore beautiful ocean depths delivering passengers right to their destination points in this Underwater Train Simulator: Pro Train Driving. Control your super-fast train and collect the checkpoints which are engaged in different thrilling places in this Train driving game. Experience the most thrilling underwater train ride of your life and feel like a best train driver.

Pull the passenger train for distance, pull the sled for accuracy or pit power against power in all out tug of war tractor pulling.

Rev up the tractor, truck, diesel, semi, hot rod... to get your turbo boost spun and engine warm then slowly, but quickly, drop the clutch and let it rip.

Get cash to buy more tractors, while upgrading your tractor or diesel puller to win events. 

Challenge friends from your contacts to some truck pulling .

Enjoy heavy tractor  pulling simulator or real tractor cargo  simulator game with transport and drive offroad.

title: Cooking Shop? No!🔮
description:
You’ve managed restaurants, hospitals and fashion stores. But can you manage the supernatural?

Dash your way through the bustling day to day shenanigans of a mysterious store of mystical wares, proving you can be supernaturally efficient when it comes to covering your customer’s every order!

Dish out great service and work faster the your competition to win the hearts of even the most impatient clients! Customize your strategy to every situation to ensure your customer’s whimsical needs are catered for!

Serve the best kind of mystical madness, win a truck-load of money and watch your shop grow at a fever pace!

HIGHLIGHTS

🔮DASH to provide every customer with supernaturally efficient service in many thrilling time management levels! Your mystical shop is no restaurant or cafe, but that doesn’t mean clients won’t be hungry to buy their stuff in time for diner!

🔮WATCH your clients expressions closely and manage their happiness levels to keep them coming back! They’re not interested in pizza, burgers, hot dogs or any other food: they crave only your undivided attention on the matters of the mystical arts!

🔮UPGRADE your mage shop in order to fulfill the needs of more clients and marvel at your shop’s incredible progress!

🔮PROVE your managing skills with fun mini games in a bespelling shop simulator experience!

It’s time to let people know about all the incredible wares you’ve cooked up and open your shop!

Let all your clients in on the delicious madness of the mystical arts and give them every reason to spread the word about your unique products and excellent service!

Every single person in the realm with supernatural needs will want to stop by your shop, foodtrucks will fight for the chance to park in front of your business and even famous chefs will line up to fetch some esoteric spices from your racks!

Tidy up your shop and start selling now!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

title: Hungry Fish 2018
description:
Begin your water journey with your big fish eating small fishes around you in the ocean full of fishes from big fish games, your fish must have to survive for becoming a long big giant shark. Your hungry shark fish lives deep down in the ocean, crazy to eat smaller fishes but avoid the bigger ones and poisonous which can cause you die before your age and will cause damage to you from big fish games. Your aim is to make your fish the biggest fish in the ocean as we can say it is hungry shark evolution! Eat your fish food placed in the ocean for strength and health and create your big shark but be attentive and focus on your aim and goal for a fun hungry shark game.

 Go on with this crazy adventure and eat small fishes around you! enjoy  catching  as many small fishes as u can in the shortest period of time to  won the maximum number of points and get rewarded with multiple fun oriented hungry shark world bonuses  . Look out for jellyfish and eat them, go fish eat different fishes and other edibles before they can attack you and make you their fish food. Give your maximum, kill these bloodthirsty fishes around you by your killing power. This shark fish game is pretty easy and unique for refreshment as a fishing games no. 1 fish game available.

So swipe right or left avoid eating poisonous fishes and make your big fish game’s shark hunger controlled and eat more food to enjoy a collection of edibles in your fish belly. Start playing your fish game and go for hunting and becoming the part of hungry shark evolution. Play with different unique Sharks in upcoming levels after unlocking them by your crazy loving play. A huge open world with 3D Graphics and environments are in front of you to explore and enjoy this angry shark game. You must dive down into the dense ocean for getting some delicious scuba divers, killer whales starfishes and dolphins like a desert water. In this hungry shark world, you will get swimmer with your fish on the surface of the ocean collecting coins and food coming on your way, taste them and survive in this multilevel gameplay for further unique fishes and delicious food in this hungry shark world. Then your one shark bite is enough for eating big and dangerous water animals in this ocean. Scuba divers want to kill and eat you but kill them before they kill and complete you.

Features of Hungry Fish Shark Game
Different unique challenging levels
Beautiful 3D environment.
Smooth and easy controls
HD Graphics and Attractive sound effects 
3D Multilevel gameplay

title: Eat Buildings.io: Hungry Blackhole
description:
Eat the huge buildings in this buildings.io game with the super hungry blackhole which has not eaten anything from months. And now this shrinking blackhole is in your hands and you have to control it rightly. Fulfill his increasing hunger with continuous feeding of every kind of objects.
Eat anything you like, eat whatever you want, eat whatever is in your path. Eat cars, signals, poles, benches, trees, and even humans. This void hole is a very hungry blackhole, feed it with different objects. More the eating of objects, more the bigger size of a black hole.
Create the biggest hole by eating all the objects in the blackhole super city. The grand city is full of different objects and items to eat anytime. This world game has to feature many things to eat like cars, buildings, trees, small objects, and many other different items.
This is a competitive blackhole game to play with AI Blackhole players. Eat the bigger things to increase the size of your black hole. Eating bigger things also increase your eating capacity along with your black hole size. Defeat your enemies by pulling the things towards your hungry black hole.
This is a live multiplayer blackhole game to eat things and have competitions on the black hole battlegrounds. Play this classic blackhole battle game to enjoy the blackhole battles with your friends and families. Also play offline with your family and the AI Blackhole players too.
The black hole becomes bigger with the eating of different things. This is the best circle controlling the game and you have to control the blackhole smoothly. This is the most addictive blackhole game for enjoying the eating and all.

Hungry Blackhole
Eat everything, Eat People, Eat Cars
Eat Tall Big Buildings
Live Multiplayer Blackhole Game

Swallow Everything in your path
Larger Black Hole

title: ATV Lifeguard Rescue Team: Coast Guard Beach Life
description:
Hello and welcome to the yet another fantastic game by Simulation Universe Game Studio "ATV Lifeguard Rescue Team: Coast Guard Beach Life". This game is all about the swimming survival skills and driving the ATV on the off-road side of the beach. Become the part of the Lifeguard Rescue Team on the Coast Guard Beach and rescue the people drowning in the sea in the boat rescue team. ATV ambulance duty with boat rescue team on the summer beach to rescue the drowning people. Young Boys and Girls come to summer beach for a beach picnic and beach girl is enjoying the swimming in the sea water. Point Guard have eyes on them to make sure that nothing gonna happen bad in the sea water. Beach Rescue Duty team have all rescue equipment and rescue shuttle. ATV ambulance is standing at beach coast to provide the first aid and rescue duties before 911 Driving school team arrives at the seaside. Coastguard rescue team have the best swimming survival skills to become the police hero rescue.

Beach girl is drowning in the sea, you have to rescue her as acting like a lifeguard on the seashore. Call 911 Driving school for vice city ambulance to arrange the emergency services on the seashore of beach club. You are coast lifeguard on the beach and it is your duty to search and rescue and save the beach girl. Mountain coast and air ambulance simulator is also provided in this ATV Lifeguard Rescue Team: Coast Guard Beach Life game where you fly the rescue helicopter over the sea and to search the boat accident from above in the air. Air Ambulance simulator act as lifesaver activity for the coastguard rescue team. Binoculars are used to search and rescue from the beach club in the city rescue mission. Boat rescue team will arrive the accident spot after air ambulance simulator confirmation. Boat Rescue team will pick up the causalities and load them in rescue boats in their bathing suits. Helicopter flying over them and will be known as air ambulance simulator. ATV Lifeguard Rescue Team: Coast Guard Beach Life game will provide you with the rescue simulation and quad ATV simulator game.

This rescue simulation game will give you extraordinary realistic graphics of the beach life and beach picnic spots. If you are so crazy for the swimming survival skills then this game is just for you. beach club and Coast lifeguard beach help the boat rescue team in the beach life ATV quad bike. Boat accident took place in the sea of vice city, call 911 driving school in an emergency. Coast lifeguard beach and coastguard rescue team activate the emergency alarm to rescue the drowning people. Took the people to the emergency hospital in the ATV Quad bike and rescue emergency ambulance.

Make your swimming survival skills to next level in this amazing coastguard rescue team game. Police hero rescue will rescue the boat accident persons and point guard will become the police hero rescue. Coast Guard Beach and Coastguard rescue team will join hands together in the beach club of the vice city. ATV Quad bike rescue team and ambulance rescue team make sure they will provide rescue to the offroad emergency. Air Ambulance simulator and police hero rescue with coast lifeguard beach make sure that water splash on the bathing suits makes them really cool in summer heat. Download the best rescue duty game and complete the rescue challenges in the city rescue mission as boat rescue team.

Features of the Coastguard Rescue Team and Lifeguard Rescue Team Game:
1- Coast Guard Beach with Excellent Beach Life
2- Best swimming survival skills animations in the game
3- Excellent Camera Rolling around the Accident Take Place,
4- Drive ATV Quad Bike and Ambulance
5- Provide Medical First Aid to the injured Persons.

title: 夢幻甜品屋
description:
香港自家開發遊戲「夢幻甜品屋」正式上線！創建屬於自己的甜品屋，製作精美甜品，吸引遊戲世界內的各種客人。

【遊戲特色】
玩法簡單，當甜品大師無難度
- 只需簡單步驟購入食材，製作甜品，安排員工上班就能開始經營！隨著甜品屋的發展，可製作的甜品越多！

甜品自動賣出，輕鬆經營
- 製作出美味的甜品後，員工便會直接為客人送餐，送餐完成直接獲得金幣收益！

特色主題員工，增加店鋪收益
- 設有不同特色主題員工！食物主題，或是夢幻主題特色員工都非常漂亮！還能助你增加甜品屋收益，增強甜品屋生氣！快集他們也是重點之一！

與好友一起經營吧！
- 幫好友減少煮食速度，打掃甜品屋，互相幫助吧！獲得的好友點數可以換到不錯的東西喔！

裝飾甜品屋，擴大業務
- 夢幻的裝飾物讓你的甜品屋更吸引！打造出讓別人嘩然的甜品屋吧！

title: Royal Battles : Warship Simulator
description:
Warship Simulator : Royal Navy is warship battle simulator game where you will be a captain of a real ship with different artillery weapons. Game introduces team battle mode and open world warship simulation in massive world. 

First, select your battleship:
⚓ Royal Warrior - your first warship for short distance naval battles
⚓ Black Shark - maneuverable and fast old pirate ship
⚓ Golden King - legendary ship from the age of colonization
⚓ Bloody Razor - nightmare of your opponents
⚓ Kraken - historical warship brought from Caribbean sea
⚓ Red Queen - historical English battleship from royal naval fleet

Battleships are possible to upgrade. So you earn money from sailing, destroying opponents and from team naval warship battles, and then use your money for upgrades. You can make controls better, more strength, increase speed and armory.

In warship battle simulator mode you can select count of allies and also enemies. There are different scenes for battles, select one and start! Be quick, work on strategy and shoot exact! It is like a real naval battle, allies fight against enemies, and you take part as commander, leading your team to the victory.

title: Bus Company Simulator Assistant for OMSI 2
description:
-- Bus Company Simulator for OMSI 2 account is required to use the app! --

The Bus Company Simulator Assistant for Android and iOS accompanies you on your journey in OMSI, so that you have all important information such as speed, temperature, time and delay in view and offers you the possibility to control the doors, the IBIS and ticket sales comfortably via the app.

For the Bus Company Simulator Multiplayer, the app offers additional functions to control many things on the go. You can cancel shifts spontaneously, chat with other players in the company or send messages via the mailbox, view your account statements and pay bills, as well as take a look at the notice board.

As a bonus you will receive new personal statistics such as the number of driving hours or the most used buses and maps as well as global live statistics about the number of buses currently in use and their average delay.


Features:
- Information during the trip
- Door and IBIS control
- Ticket sale
- Cancel shifts
- Chat & mails
- Statistics
- Notice board

title: Robotic Family Fun Simulator
description:
Welcome to the futuristic family of robots that lives in the human territory in Robotic Family Fun Simulator. 

Play the role of virtual robots in human area and adopt the way of human living in Robotic Family Fun Simulator. Fabulous task to play in this virtual robotic game like, invite human neighbors for the lunch using your smart phone. Cook delicious food for the guests. Help the road cleaner by picking up the van with your robotic power so that he can easily clean the area. 

Interesting task and exciting game play made this Robotic Family Fun Simulator addictive. Receive your guests and give them a warm welcome like the humans. Search the purse of your virtual robot wife that is lost somewhere in the house. Celebrate the birthday party of your robot kid, and give him a lovely gift. Drive your luxury van and drop your virtual robot girl to the City School. 

Take your robot kids to the park and walk in the park as well. Drive your van towards the shopping mall for shopping. Complete all the things that are listed on the shopping list like, water bottles, chips, chocolates and fruits etc. Pick up your robot girl from the school on time otherwise you will lose the game. Move towards home and give toys to your robot kid for playing. Go outside of the robot home and watering the plants. Recharge the battery of your wife and much more task to play.

Robotic Family Fun Simulator Key Features:

•	Play the role of robot family in human territory.
•	Manage the house hold tasks of robot family home.
•	Interesting and exciting tasks to play.

title: Growth Demo
description: Grow plants, harvest fruit, and sell or dry them for their seed. Plants have a chance to give improved fruits when harvested. Growth will calculate the time when you're not playing so your plants are always growing and improving! You will eventually unlock more space to grow more plants, and occasionally new seed types will be sold from the action window increasing in price after each purchase. Harvesting a tier 9 plant grants a badge for that plant type; gain 9 badges to win!

description:
Enjoy the best City Rickshaw Driver - Tuk Tuk Driving Simulator game that includes parking, speed driving, pick and drop service in the modern city. Tuk Tuk Auto Rickshaw is all set to drive on the main roads of the modern city and city rickshaw driver will enjoy the real rickshaw drive. Pick the passengers from the streets of the modern city and drop them at their respective areas. There would be students who want to drop at school and college, also the possibility of doctors and engineers to drop at their working place. Let's play the City Rickshaw Driver - Tuk Tuk Driving Simulator game with experience city rickshaw driver in picking and dropping the passengers from one destination to another destination. This game is about people will forget the taxi and use the auto rickshaw. Autorickshaw and Tuk Tuk Rickshaw will not park itself you need auto rickshaw driver to park the tuktuk rickshaw.

Are you fond of tuk tuk games and want to ride in the ching chi rickshaw then you should try this real tuk tuk auto rickshaw driver game. Want to travel in the tuk tuk rickshaw then this is the best game for you to experience the offroad auto rickshaw ride. Chingchi rickshaw in the amazing off-road drive, Auto Rickshaw simulator game will give you chance to drive tuk tuk rickshaw that is different then the public transport, regular bus, car, truck, taxi, bikes, boats, aeroplane, etc. 3D Rickshaw drive will test your skills of steering, driving, acceleration, and parking of the auto rickshaw driver. Drive Ching chi rickshaw as fast as you can and complete the missions before time is out. With passing each level the tuk tuk rickshaw game will be more challenging. The ways and roads become narrower with traffic and people, auto rickshaw driver needs to control the rickshaw and drive through the traffic carefully. Drop the passengers safe and fast without hitting the auto rickshaw into street lights and cars.

Driving tuk tuk auto rickshaw is real rickshaw drive by the auto rickshaw driver on the roads of the modern city. It is better than the self drive car on the speedway derby and on demolition racing area. City rickshaw drive on the real tuk tuk ride is just like a ride on the Pakistani chingchi rikshaw. Use the minimap in the game based on GPS system and drive your ching chi rickshaw to the desired location where the passenger is waiting for you. Pick the passenger and ask him the location where they want to drop-off. Set your GPS system and drive carefully the rickshaw. Drop-off the passenger at his location and earn the money and cash. Use this cash to unlock different realistic tuk tuk rickshaw. Tuk Tuk Driving is all about your driving skills on the road while driving tuk tuk rickshaw. Get behind the wheels and control the rickshaw while seating on the driving seat of the rickshaw.

Indian Rickshaw and Pakistani Rickshaw are famous throughout the world. People love to ride on the auto rickshaw and chingchi rickshaw. If you really want to enjoy the rickshaw ride then this is real rickshaw drive game is for you. Auto rickshaw drive is one of the best driving tuk tuk auto rickshaws. Enjoy the real rickshaw drive by switching camera controls in the game. This is the best tuk tuk driving and rickshaw driver game of 2018. All you need to download this rickshaw driving game and drive the city rickshaw in full speed and control.

Offroad games Studio brings all-in-one game Bus Games - Hill Climb. Off-road bus drive game is perfect combination of racing and simulation games. Offroad Sames Studio developing very realistic and unique games for you. It would be incredible and most amazing coach bus simulation game 2018, you could have ever played.
This game is that where your skills are put to test! It is best platform of bus driving academy to perform your racing, driving and parking skills. It is best real bus driving simulation game on long highways surrounded with mountains and jungle.
Being an obligation driver you have to drop passengers in stipulated time and earn cash to buy new more advanced buses. Enjoy this high quality off-road bus drive game and don’t let the time run out. Drive carefully on curvy and steeper paths to a avoid crash. It is available in Indonesia, India, China, Kerala, turkey, Romania , jawa, Jakarta, japan.  
Give the bet pick and drop service to travelers and visitors like a pro driver and experience the real thrill of real racing simulation game. There are many options in game are provided to improve your driving experience, like headlight, indicators , windscreen cleaner, steering and gear manual, horn and many more. You can adjust camera angles according to your own comfort. Keep playing the most awaiting Bus Games - Hill Climb.
If you drop passengers at right place and right time , you will complete the mission and go to next level. There are 15 amazing levels of game and every next one is more tricky and challenging than previous one. There is no map for destiny , you have to find it by your own. Do not hit the animals like cow on the road.
Gameplay is very simple race and brake button on right side , use them to move forward or to reverse. And to move around gear and steering both options are available. 
Features:
•	Offline play 
•	Detailed coach buses
•	Smooth controls
•	Top quality fun
•	Different camera angles
•	Amazing environment
•	Quality graphics
•	Free of cost

Offoad bus drive is best game for kids and girls who love long drive games. You will surely love this game due to its unique features. Don’t forget to rate and review. Best of luck!

title: Sleep Paralysis
description:
You're awake but for some reason you can't move. All you can do is watch as your nightmares seep into reality! 
Sleep Paralysis is a terrifying reality that many people face, where they awaken in the midst of their sleep cycle, paralysed and frightened as they start to hallucinate in the very real world around them. 
Within this game investigate a room with frightening surprises and try not to slip back into your nightmares or you may awaken to something much more terrifying....
(Tip: Look at the lamp to keep the lights on and if you do fall back into a nightmare then find the lamps again to reopen your eyes)
This is a second year Computer Game Arts project by Yasmin Curren, Tiffany Derbyshire and Tabitha Beresford-Owen.

title: US Advance City Parking Simulator
description:
US Advance City Parking is the most realistic car simulator in Google Play.
This is a indian luxury driving car parking game like you’ve never seen before! Learn how to navigate a realistic parking environment. Steer the car meticulously and catch the bridge in time to lift your car onto the next storey. Use the varying gears and shifts to wiggle into the parking spot.
US Crazy 3d Prado Car Parking Game  driving game enthusiasts, get your crazy driving skills honed like the blade of a knife in Car Parking Game 3D. Avoid cones along the roadside that are within your view and position the cars inside the checkpoints. After racing the sweet cars, from domestic to exotic, you are the king of the road! For the most lucrative parking, exercise patience, check your mirror angles, check the clearance, keep one foot on the gas pedal and the other over the brake
High quality cars.
• Right-left steering wheel option.
• Different camera option.
• New city.
• Best parking game in store.
• Support to driving schools with realictic parking experience.
• Play hours with low cpu use.
• Just 28 MB space need.

title: Tuk Tuk Rickshaw Game Indian Auto Driver 2018
description:
TukTuk Rickshaw Game Indian Auto Driver 2018
Enjoy the best modern tuktuk offroad auto rickshaw driving that has parking, pick and drop service in the mountain city with top speed driving. Tuktuk offroad a driver is now ready to drive on off road mountain roads. It’s time for fun prove your driving skills with auto rickshaw in mountains area.
Drive the mountain rickshaw in your leisure time and enjoy the autorickshaw driver in the hilly areas on the off road. Rickshaw gives you the realistic drive to enjoy in the mountains rather than a 4X4 drive. TukTuk rickshaw is a freewheeler drive. It is new experience for the 4X4 off-road drivers. Now you are the driver of the rickshaw. Keep an eye on your speed meter. Don’t go too fast. Accept challenges, it’s really difficult to drive in these areas. You can fall off from the mountains. Drive passengers, pick up your passengers from one stop and drive them to their next stop. It is really fun to drive the rickshaw loaded with passengers.

For real feel of hill climber mountain rickshaw driver heavy traffic with busses and trucks are installed on turns your real modern tuktuk offroad auto rickshaw driver skills will be tested. Three wheel vehicles as an auto rickshaw in this amazing parking simulator game. Tuktuk rickshaw driver could not be an auto park. You will enjoy this new and latest new modern tuktuk offroad auto rickshaw drive simulator game 3D.

Tuk tuk rickshaw is a two-person space vehicle for picking the passengers from different points and to drop them to their destinations. Rickshaw is mostly used for transporting people, luggage and goods as well within the city or small area.

Let’s play modern tuktuk offroad auto rickshaw drive simulator game with experience of picking and dropping passengers from one destination to final destination. This simulator game provides new auto rickshaw driver taxi service to passengers. To make this auto rickshaw taxi simulation game interesting the time and fuel is limited to pick and drop passengers.

The amazing modern tuk tuk offroad auto rickshaw drive simulator games provide you the chance to drive something different than the regular vehicles like bus, Prado, truck, car taxi driving, bikes rides, etc. It is a test of your top driving skills like acceleration, steering wheel and turning controls. It is very challenging to ride modern rickshaw taxi on off road tuk tuk rickshaw and hill climber tracks. You can enjoy modern tuk tuk rickshaw drifting on off road tracks with top speed on the speedometer. Complete the given task to complete the level. Off-Road tracks will become more challenging after every level of the game. Complete missions to unlock next missions. In this tuk tuk rickshaw hill climbing game a lot of challenge, hurdle, and stone in your way and heavy city traffic and on the way of offroad heavy duty traffic but your grip on the rickshaw is much better you will enjoy different mountain environment and enjoy different weather like adventitious mountain hill climbing real rainy whether also snowy weather is making the game realistic and real enjoyment now its first time you will enjoy the mountain riding on the auto tuk tuk rickshaw offroad driving.

Off Road Challenging Auto Rickshaw taxi Driving Game Features:
A real tuk tuk auto rickshaw
Tuk Tuk Driving with Sharp Turns 
Interesting game for everyone
Realistic Hill Station Environment in 3D
Free to drive and transport passengers
Pick and Drop passengers from to their Destinations
Multiple Camera Angles
Realistic gameplay.

title: Army Training School - US Military Course
description:
Enroll yourself to US army training School, follow the command and engage to your platoon, army course that will surely leads you to clear physical and mental army training school.


Follow drill sergeant’s instructions as they play the crucial part in transforming recruits into Soldiers in Basic Combat Training; conquer all obstacles course to pass the first entry training in this US commando Training.


As a Military training course recruit, you are now in military school, once your training camp is completed in this commando training squad. Join the US army academy to pass initial training in US military School. 


Training game enables as these military personnel are trained in this military academy to handle dangerous missions that require not just bravery, but a high degree of skills, trained in these army boot camp the who undertake these perilous missions subject themselves to some of the toughest, and most intensive US military course. 


Be the best platoon commander and command the world of US military training course, clear the course and training with dignity, feel the adventure of the commando shooting camp and be the best US army boot camp school recruit.


It’s not easy to become soldier of US army or National Guard. Clear obstacle course across different army posts terrain like dense forest, arctic snow and hot desert field. Perform actions like, high jumps, crouching, swimming, hurdle crossing and complete all the courses like, Special Forces training, jumpmaster and air assault training.

title: Wild Dino Attack 3D City Rampage
description:
Wild Dino Attack 3D City Rampage is an action filled raging dinosaur attack game. Play as carnivore dinosaur In this game, this Jurassic dinosaur ultimate purpose is destruction. Choose among Tyrannosaur dinosaur or Carnotaurus dinosaur and more to destroy city, hunt wild life animals like elephant, deer, lion and more. Dinosaur smash buildings as you like destroy cars or hunt animals in the forest the choice is yours.

title: Multi Cars Parking Challenge-Frenzy Driving Game🚖
description:
Multi Cars Parking Challenge is the perfect game to learn the different parking techniques and trained you to handle the difficult situations. There are multiple cars and you are going to pick the car of your choice. Challenge is given according to the selection of the car and parked it in the appropriate place where the light is blinking. Driving skills are failed if you are unable to park the car. This 3D game helps to guide the correct parking tricks. 

The best thing about this game is different cars are offered to experience the real adventure and offered cars are Audi, BMW, Toyota Corolla, Honda Accord, Civic, Camry. Different challenging situations is given as in the parking area a number of vehicles are parked side by side and you have to park your choosen car without smashing the other cars. It contains the different cars with accurate physics that add attraction to the different levels of the game. Multi-lane highways are specially designed to give the challenge to the driver. He may find it hard but once he gets the grip, he’ll learn the most powerful tricks to park the car in such a critical situation. Take care of the side mirror and rear mirror while parking the car. Avoid the collision with the other cars on the way.  Control the handbrake once you have parked the car. 

Drifting of the sports car on the highway is one of the most challenging tasks as to park the car. It gives you the challenge to reach in the parking place before the time ends and it also helps the driver to learn the time value to place the car in the parking slot. This game contains the different car parking situations like to park the car in the backyard, busy street lanes, along with the roadside and public transport place. Don’t be in fury as it is not a race but you have to park the car with efficiency while taking care of the brake, accelerator, and paddle. 

It also contains the 3D graphics and realistic sound for each car that give the pleasure-full experience. You can also use the gears and reverse the car while parking. Multiple story parking areas are designed. Your main aim is to park the car in the appropriate place before someone else occupy the place. So, you have to drive faster and take care of the road obstacles. Different levels are designed with the certain checkpoints and there is some ramps up-down the roadside. Parked in the parallel tracks along with the other cars. 

It is one of the best car simulator game that trained you as an experienced parking car driver. Turning the tyre to the different sides while parking also gives you a strong grip. This is one of the most addictive game you have ever played.  This is the free game where you can learn different parking expertise and efficient techniques. 

 

🚙 Game Features: 

      ✪  Mutiple cars to park at specific parking place 

      ✪  Different exciting levels with various story line 

      ✪  More cameras to see the view of game scenes 

      ✪  Catchy graphics with animations and effects

title: Euro Trucks Simulator 2018 Excavation Simulator
description:
Featuring many features of European trucks, this truck simulator offers an exciting driving experience that will give you the feeling of real truck driving.
Visit many countries in Europe, visit Berlin, Prague, Madrid, Rome and many other great places!
Play the truck simulator in career mode, earn money, get new trucks and updates, explore the trucking world!
Challenge your friends in online chatter mode, show everyone your personalized truck! Become King of Roads by playing Euro Truck Driver!


Features:
• 7 European truck brands (4x2 and 6x4 Axles)
• More than 20 realistic cities
• Driving on village roads and on the highway
• Easy controls (inclination, keys or touch steering)
• Realistic weather conditions and day / night cycle
• Visual damage to trucks
• Detailed interior design of each truck brand
• Superb engine sounds
• Improved AI traffic system
• Multi-player in Convoy mode or Online with Servers
• Achievements and Leaderboard
• Ask for new trucks or features in our Social Pages!

Emergency City Hospital Ambulance Rescue is exciting game with interesting gameplay where you play as Specialist Doctor, cute nurse as well as amazing driver and spend your life for humanity. In this ambulance rescue game you have to give Emergency first aid services to the person who can slightly injured and transfer the city hospital which are suffering in serious injuries. Drive the hospital ambulance to the specific location to take the patient to your hospital for treatments. You can also play as a beautiful nurse to do some first aid treatment to the patients. You feel like a real city hero by playing this ambulance service game. Show that you can handle any problem that comes in your way.

•	Play as specialist doctor, nurse
•	Drive the hospital ambulance

•	Provide first aid to the patients with perfections
•	Perform your duty as a true rescuer

In this Emergency City Hospital Ambulance Rescue you have been given the role of a skilled ambulance driver in the realistic city environment. Be careful, ambulance duty driver on grand city roads is dangerous but you have to show your best driving skills.

title: Police Chase Car - Crime Cop Robber Chase
description:
Cop Car Chase - Crime Police Robber Chase Simulator is all about 3d pursuing criminals which are on their car. Get right into the action of driving fast police cars in an all-new thrilling driving simulator! Race around city streets at top speeds, unlock new faster police cop cars like 4x4 jeeps and pursuit vehicles to drive and stop crazy city traffic in the all new open world car driving simulator! 
These games included villain, gangsters are running away and we have to catch them as soon as possible. So buckle up and ready for chaotic chasing of your life. These are street racers and are very quick more you can think of. In these police pursuit racing games capture all the gang. Theft Gangsters one by one by increasing levels on this simulator racing game. 

It would be more difficult to play as level up of Cop Car Chase - Crime Police Robber Chase Simulator. 
Drive, dodge, and pull over busy city traffic who are causing stress to other drivers Race other police cars, taxi's, ice cream trucks, and angry traffic as you unlock new faster authentic police cars with unique designs!. Take dangerous turns smartly without any crash or to hit anyone else. So it’s time to show your driving skills to the world of most dangerous driver’s simulator racing.

Speed past vehicles, drift around tight city corners, Pullover, flip and wreck your car with real time vehicle damage, see each scratch and dent with each car crash. Why not totally wreck your police interceptor and smash into other cars to get some serious car crashes!

12 ranked badge available!.

title: Civilization Clicker
description:
Welcome to Civilization Clicker. You have the opportunity to choose your own path of development of your civilization and lead it to victory or fall. Develop the economy, industry, science and others. At your choice depends the strength of the empire and its fate. In this game you can do a lot, including the development of politics, tourism, hiring of great people. The development of civilization from scratch, this is your goal in the game.

Your skills influence how fast the power will rise and become powerful. Crush all who prevent you from doing it.

So what awaits you, rise or fall?

title: Real Truck Simulator Driving In Europe 3D
description:
The game, which offers an unparalleled driving experience of camions and doesn’t set any age or gender limits, has become one of the most popular European truck driving simulators recently. 
The totally realistic missions and the experience of truck simulation is waiting for you. In this game, you need to convoy the goods to the specified location intactly. Do not release your clutch even if the ground is erosive by the rain. In this dim weather, you need towing the goods carefully to complete the task. When the weather is clear, you can pick up the rewards for the minted mission and start a new journey with hauling a new cargo. When you’re on the road, you’ll see the canter Anza is having a tata in the plaza, the barbershop “SCS” on the corner, the insane dog Tesla barking in the backyard and a similar truck driver named Bis is steering on the street. Don’t forget to slow down when you’re passing a toll station which with a camcam pro.
Run your business to ensure that it continues to grow, even more being a payment method when you complete the delivery of your goods. Make money, purchase new 18 Wheeler American Pro Trucks and semi trailers,select your job and deliver your cargo in an open world! Just stick with the game and you’ll be ahead of your competitor Macha pronto. Become the King of the road by playing this big 3D truck simulation game. 
Features of Real Truck Simulator Driving In Europe 3D
- Amazing trucks (next generation trucks)
- Interiors of USA style hang inside of each lorry
- Real truck driving experience
- Drive across the whole Europe outback
- Real transportation systems
- Be impressed by the trucking
- Real weather
- Damage and fuel consume
- More than 60 challenging levels (amazing scenes to explore)
- Drive through country roads, city roads and autobahns
- Various camera angles (internal CAM, front, external CAM and more)
- Amazing graphics
- Realistic engine sounds
- Achievements and leaderboards
- Easy to control (tilt, button or steering wheel)
- Over 25 languages available
- Excellent HD graphics and performance
A fully realistic truck simulator, a hooked game. 
How to play
- Drive your truck by using the button.
- Fasten your seat belt.
- The screen on the right brings up the "D" position.
- Control your truck by using the breakout and acceleration buttons.
The driving manual
- You can choose how to control your truck.
- When the mission is in the evening, you can turn on the headlights to use the headlights button.
- When the mission is in the raining day, you can turn on the wipers to transmission the road condition to you once again. 
- When your truck runs out of gas, you can buy gas from the garage by touching the gas button.
- If you follow traffic rules, you'll make more money during the game.
- If you get things done faster, you'll make more money.
Note: Please safe driving and obey traffic rules in real life.

- Realistic engine sounds
- Achievements and leaderboards
- Easy to control (tilt, button or steering wheel)
- Over 25 languages available
- Excellent HD graphics and performance
A fully realistic truck simulator, a hooked game.
How to play
- Drive your truck by using the button.
- Fasten your seat belt.
- The screen on the right brings up the "D" position.
- Control your truck by using the breakout and acceleration buttons.
The driving manual
- You can choose how to control your truck.
- When the mission is in the evening, you can turn on the headlights to use the headlights button.
- When the mission is in the raining day, you can turn on the wipers to transmission the road condition to you once again.
- When your truck runs out of gas, you can buy gas from the garage by touching the gas button.
- If you follow traffic rules, you'll make more money during the game.
- If you get things done faster, you'll make more money.
Note: Please safe driving and obey traffic rules in real life.

title: Aviator Simulator
description:
In Aviator Simulator, experience the thrill and fun of feeling the wind rush past you and get to enjoy the realism of sky paragliding. Put on your wing-suit to fly and perform paragliding but don't collide with any other objects. You'll be witnessing extreme and scary conditions as you dive down to the ground with only your parachute to save you. 

Fly over the valleys, hills and feel the wind to have fun in the sky-line with this simulation game! Start from being a rookie, learn the maneuvers and tactics of handling a para-glider, to the fun of jumping from the mountain.

Most of the people have desire for sky adventures but they can not fulfill their desire because they can not afford that. But this simulation game brings you the realistic diving experience.

1. Customise cool characters and amazing suits as you wish to fly.
2. Easy to learn, difficult to master. 
3. Extraordinary challenging levels to explore the sky.
4. Upgrade most beautiful and strongest suits to dive.

title: Blocky Cars Rush Drive
description:
Race your fast racing blocky cars across the busy and endless journey. Enjoy driving fast and overtaking without crashing your car in to busy traffic.  Highway traffic drive is not an easy traffic to overtake so be careful while driving because hit and run is not the option in this game, once you hit another vehicle  your mission in this game is failed.  Drive the vehicle smoothly between Heavy traffic. If you want to increase the speed of vehicle just press the speed paddle and drive your speedy vehicle as fast as you can, horn your way if traffic is stuck in all lanes. You got point or score if vehicle is passed to another vehicle without hitting the vehicle. You can select different track. Be a passionate driver of racing car and make your way on highway busy traffic by using clever skills of driving and overtaking your car by thinking your way smartly. Driving in this game is all about steering your way out from traffic by smart play of driving and passing your car from congested areas where cars are going side by side. In this game you also use break paddle option where you feel for break you just press break paddle.
Game Mode
In this game there are four game mode
---One way
---Two way
---Time Attack
---Speed Rescue 
In every game mode there are two game play stage
---City
---Rainy
GAMEPLAY
- Tilt or Touch to steer
- Touch gas button to accelerate
- Touch brake button to slow down

KEY FEATURES
- 5 different cars to choose from 
- Unlimited play - No fuel or time limits
- Multiple control modes: Break Paddle, Escalator, Left, Right move and horn 
- 2 detailed environments:  rainy and city
- 4 game modes: One-Way, Two-Way, Time Attack and Speed Rescue
- Rich types of traffic including trucks, and cars.
TIPS
- The faster you drive the more scores you get
- Driving in opposite direction in two-way mode gives extra score and cash
