title: Euro Truck Transporter Legend
description:
It is time for exciting and crazy truck driving adventure in this transporter and cargo truck simulation. Become a euro truck hero and truck driver in this exclusive truck driving simulator. Experience driving new cargo transporter truck 4x4 & 6x6 in mountain truck tracks in this delivery truck simulator game and real truck driving games that requires high reflexes while driving loaded grand truck. Use the truck driving tricks and complete dangerous challenges to make all achievements of this classic truck games & truck transport games. Be like a real truck driver and drive big euro & cargo truck in the best delivery truck cargo games and transport games. Start from the bottom and work your way to the top of best hiill truck driver. All you have to do is avoid crashing and stay intact for as long as you can in this trucks games, drive simulator and enjoy truck parking adventure. Truck transport games & cargo truck simulation offers you a great, fun gaming experience that will help you to become the king of the best 4x4 & 6x6 truck driver & cargo transporter.

Improve your delivery truck driving skills on the tricky impossible track with cargo truck simulation.You will need to take some sharp and quick turns while driving your grand truck. Be very careful for the goods in your euro truck trolley. Do not let them fall as some portion of the euro driving track have some real hurdles. It will be very horrible if your classic cargo truck fall from the hilly track. Select your favorite grand truck and classic truck and start discovering the most dangerous and curvy off road tracks of the racing world. Deliver goods and earn money to buy more modern and heavy trucks 4x4. Dare yourself to become a driver of this huge wood transporter. 

Grand truck environment is really amazing featuring cracked mountain tracks, breathtaking natural beauty side views, different barriers and obstacles, sky high mountain peaks, impossible turns, straight and curvy narrow passages for stunt challenges & wooden bridges. Rush like a crazy trucker while riding the beautifully designed real impossible tracks and beat the rival transporters in this breathtaking adventure. 

The gameplay of this big truck racing addictive game is packed with real adventure and excitement. Select your desired monster truck 4x4 & 6x6, take your truck to the take away parking, pick up the goods that needs to be transported and begin the monster truck drive. Drive with extreme caution, move your truck in zigzag position to avoid crashes. Your task is to transport luggage safely from starting place to destination in this truck driving 2018. When the luggage reach at destination, then the level is complete. The transport challenge has to be completed in given time. Avoid falling from the hilly track & deadly 4x4 & 6x6 truck crash otherwise level will fail.

Features of Euro Truck Transporter Legend:

	•	Complete range of high speed classic 4x4 & 6x6 trucks
	•	Challenging transport and truck driving simulator 
	•	Realistic and high physics hiill truck controls
	•	Narrow and sharp sky high mountain truck tracks
	•	Extreme Driving on crazy mountains & impossible track
	•	Multiple 3D Camera Views and Angels 
	•	Real experience of driving heavy transporter
	•	Explore the various environments in the truck simulator
	•	Best offroad games and free truck game 2018


Support and Feedback:

Your Feedbacks and Ratings are Important for us to keep “WePlayStudio” busy in creating more fun in the games to engage you, your family and your friends. In case if you find any bug that needed to be addressed just send us an email, we will improve it and reply to your email as soon as possible. Please try our other games by clicking “More from Developer” or by visiting our publisher account.

Improve your delivery truck driving skills on the tricky impossible track with cargo truck simulation.You will need to take some sharp and quick turns while driving your grand truck. Be very careful for the goods in your euro truck trolley. Do not let them fall as some portion of the euro driving track have some real hurdles. It will be very horrible if your classic cargo truck fall from the hilly track. Select your favorite grand truck and classic truck and start discovering the most dangerous and curvy off road tracks of the racing world. Deliver goods and earn money to buy more modern and heavy trucks 4x4. Dare yourself to become a driver of this huge wood transporter.

Grand truck environment is really amazing featuring cracked mountain tracks, breathtaking natural beauty side views, different barriers and obstacles, sky high mountain peaks, impossible turns, straight and curvy narrow passages for stunt challenges & wooden bridges. Rush like a crazy trucker while riding the beautifully designed real impossible tracks and beat the rival transporters in this breathtaking adventure.

The gameplay of this big truck racing addictive game is packed with real adventure and excitement. Select your desired monster truck 4x4 & 6x6, take your truck to the take away parking, pick up the goods that needs to be transported and begin the monster truck drive. Drive with extreme caution, move your truck in zigzag position to avoid crashes. Your task is to transport luggage safely from starting place to destination in this truck driving 2018. When the luggage reach at destination, then the level is complete. The transport challenge has to be completed in given time. Avoid falling from the hilly track & deadly 4x4 & 6x6 truck crash otherwise level will fail.

Features of Euro Truck Transporter Legend:

• Complete range of high speed classic 4x4 & 6x6 trucks
• Challenging transport and truck driving simulator
• Realistic and high physics hiill truck controls
• Narrow and sharp sky high mountain truck tracks
• Extreme Driving on crazy mountains & impossible track
• Multiple 3D Camera Views and Angels
• Real experience of driving heavy transporter
• Explore the various environments in the truck simulator
• Best offroad games and free truck game 2018


Support and Feedback:

Your Feedbacks and Ratings are Important for us to keep “WePlayStudio” busy in creating more fun in the games to engage you, your family and your friends. In case if you find any bug that needed to be addressed just send us an email, we will improve it and reply to your email as soon as possible. Please try our other games by clicking “More from Developer” or by visiting our publisher account.

Become director of a cat office! Help cats to evolve, tap them to receive more money, upgrade their homes and create your own business.

title: Billion Dollar Winner
description:
Ever dreamed of Being a Billionaire and Changing Your Life overnight？Now you can live the life what you wanted in Billion Dollar Winner! 
Starting out with measly cash and your capitalist state of mind, your billionaire journey begins with a wise decision. Earn money by grasping commercial opportunity, trading the markets and making smart investments. The only goal is Expand Your Asset Before 70 Years Old!

🌟Buy low. Sell high. Get rich!🌟
The market is changing rapidly and full of Opportunities and Risks! The rule is simple—Buy in goods and sell them when then price is suitable. Accumulate your fortune patiently, and sometimes take a risk to make a killing. Pay attention to your health because you may be sent to hospital after health is below a certain value.

🌟Value investing is the only way to big success!>🌟
Warren Buffett once said that Saving Money and Investing Early is the Best way to Develop Good Habits. It’s a good choice to Build a Company when you gain enough money. But please remember that different industries has different quotation during each period, so you should sell the company before falling into decline or you’ll lose money after bankruptcy.
 
🌟Experience the life of rich!🌟
What will you do when you become a rich man? Buy! Buy! Buy! Buy the Whole World! Sit on luxury Cars and Houses, date with beautiful/handsome Lovers in park or cinema, and what is more exciting is Gambling at high stakes in casino. Not like SLOTS & 777 CASINO MACHINES, POKER, BACCARAT, ROULETTE or other casino games, you can bet and win the jackpot with a simple click in BDW！

🌟Be the richest man in the world!🌟
The rank list is a place where you can compare your record with friends and other players around the world. The rich men in the rank list are not just billionaires，maybe they are Trillionaires or even Quadrillionaires! So make it a daily habit and Challenge Yourself to new record every day!

DOWNLOAD NOW! 
BECOME A BILLIONAIRE TYCOON TODAY!

Billion Dollar Winner is 100% free to download and play with no in-app Purchases or Deposits. And you’ll find yourself playing Billion Dollar Winner everywhere you go, even Play Without Wi-Fi! 

Questions? Comments? Chat with our BDW support team!

title: Farming Dead - Idle Zombies
description:
Ever wanted to have zombies, many zombies, and see them infect the world? Well, then let's go farming dead! Farm zombies for fun and profit in this relaxing idle simulation game!

Start from the bottom with a cute zombie and with big dreams of achieving zombie domination. Tap n' swipe to collect viruses, spawn zombies, buy upgrades and repeat. It's simple as that. There are many hilarious zombies to unlock and humorous upgrades to buy.

The more viruses you spend for upgrades the more viruses they produce for you. There's no progress without sacrifice, so you regularly need to sacrifice your zombies to keep gaining even more. Just chop their heads off and see how the production goes up! Hire beautiful babes for mega boosts. Your zombies will love them! Get and feed cute pets and... oh no, poor little pets when they become big and juicy... they will help in infecting the world! To infect humans you will need to extract cells from zombies. Get the dust off the extractor and squeeze as many cells as possible from every zombie. 

GAME FEATURES:

* FARM funny zombies and produce viruses
* SIMPLE tap n' swipe to collect viruses; spend it on awesome upgrades... and profit!
* PRODUCE viruses even when you are offline
* OPEN ZOMBOXES to discover new zombies
* DEFEND your zombies from commando attacks
* REVIVE your killed zombies
* SLICE some hams to feed the zombies; they won't produce viruses on an empty stomach, huh…
* EXTRACT infectious cells from zombies and infect the world of humans
* UNLOCK cute pets... and find out their purpose
* SACRIFICE your zombies and spend it on new upgrades, there's no progress without sacrifice!
* MIX some bloody ingredients like brains, worms, and blood to make delicious cocktails and unlock unseen types of zombies
* PLAY MINI-GAMES to unlock epic zombies
* AMUSE zombies with a charming belly dancer or serve fresh popcorn for profit
* HIRE BEAUTIFUL BABES for mega boosts
* VISIT ZOMBIEWOOD and be rewarded
* SPIN & WIN for exclusive bonuses
* TONS OF ACHIEVEMENTS for you to discover
* EASY TO PLAY for the whole family
* PLAY WITH FRIENDS for virus production boost
* WARS where players compete against each other for rewards and trophies
* DAILY REWARDS: come back every day and collect the reward. At the end of the the calendar you will get a new zombie!

Play Farming Dead now, and get ready for zombastic fun!

title: Kode Keras Cowok 2 - Back to School
description:
Kode Keras Cowok 2 - Back to School adalah season 2 dari lanjutan game Kode Keras Cowok dari Cewek yang viral di Indonesia dengan jumlah lebih dari 1 juta download/install.

Melanjuti kisah dari percintaan Adit di sekolah yang selalu menarik untuk ditunggu. Disini adit kembali ke sekolah pada Semester dua setelah sebelumnya menjalani Semester 1 dan juga liburan sekolah.
Bagaimana juga dengan kisah percintaan Adit dengan Lala dan Rini serta keseruan dengan karakter lain dan juga tentunya dengan karakter-karakter baru baik cowok maupun cewek yang akan membuat cerita lebih seru pada season 2 ini.

Game Visual Novel ini dapat dimainkan baik secara Online maupun Online, sehingga sangat pas untuk dimainkan kapan saja baik sendiri maupun bersama keluarga. Game ini juga tentunya gratis, memberikan keasikan tersendiri dalam memainkan game viral indonesia ini.

title: Superhero BMX Cycle Racing Game 2018
description:
Welcome to superhero BMX bicycle stunts 2018!
First time super heroes are riding on BMX bicycle and become legends offroad BMX rider. Superhero BMX bicycle stunt racing is awesome super league heroes racing game on impossible tracks. Many superheroes like xbatman , xspider-man and incredible monster hulk are performing stunts in this cycle game, not like others xbatman, xironman  , mobike rider games and velo are waiting for their turn. Focus only on cyclometer. No roadrash simple one man show.
Don't be egged on the impossible tracks, prevent yourself from downhill roads. Believe in cynicism do well have well. After a cynical side-effect, the incredible hulk is ready for this cycling game. An amazed cycle racing game that is great fun with superhero BMX! The impossible car racings games are old this time to play the superhero racing drag game.
Superheroes play as carrom games and enjoy downhill hill climb superhero BMX bicycle stunt racing games on the sky-high impossible tracks. Superheroes game is an extreme race game in which player enjoys vehicles as superheroes bus, formula racing game, superhero bike and superheroes buggy stunt racing games in one collection. In this cycling game, the old offroad superheroes bike racing game is a very challenging game among the cycle games. You will drive all superheroes car and bike in BMX frestyle stunt race. You have played many champions fighting but play first time a race between super league champions on the extreme impossible tracks. In an off-road fighting arena, this combat superheroes war was old. Play the best cycle games like angry subway birds to run the flipover stunts and knives the out all stunts. Compose the rules of superheroes survival war between eachother. This is superhero uphill BMX stunt racing game and there is also play superheroes car and formula racing games, superheroes BMX stunt games, superheroes bus games, superheroes ATV games, and flying superheroes racing games very soon from us.

Smooth Superheroes Racing Games gameplay
New unseen excited stunt roads
Amazing Environment
Amazing Sky high Impossible Tracks
Realistic environment
Champions Superheroes Race game
Off-road stunt tracks in the skies
Dream league evaluation
Super league heroes racing game
Superheroes game is an extreme race game

title: Transport US Police Car: Cargo Cruise Ship Driving
description:
If you are a lover of Police Car Transport games or Army Car Transport games then this Transport US Police Car: Cargo Cruise Ship Driving game will give you an amazing experience with multiple transportation vehicles like real cargo ship transport simulator, helicopter transport simulator, police transporter truck, police airplane flight simulator, offroad police jeep, Cruise Ship Simulator. Police Car Transporter game is here with a different set of challenges and adventures. The theme of transporter game is transportation of police cars, police jeeps, police muscle cars, army cargo through police plane simulator, cruise ship driving, heavy truck loader driving and helicopter transport simulator. Those who love playing police cargo plane flight simulator will love the challenge cruise ship simulator for car transportation, bike transportation on cargo truck, cruise ship tracker or on police plane transporter. US Army Transporter and US Police Transporter use the vehicle transport simulator to transport their vehicles, police cars, off road truck, army jeeps, limo car, police van. Master harbor of the sea captain makes car parking captain to transport the army cargo ship.

Muscle car transport game is different from airplane transporter & US police car transporter. In car transportation, you are going to do new cargo duty as sea captain in military jeeps transport and tank transport in heavy cruise ship simulator. It would be difficult task of cargo ship games & cargo plane simulator and transport vehicles in car carrier truck simulator with army transportation in vehicle transport simulator. Make sure you successfully fulfill your level of loading and unloading furious military jeeps, army jeeps, cargo goods, & police bike in this car transportation 2018. Cruise Ship driving games are outstanding to drive huge ships in police car transporter having fun of police boat simulator games. Cruise Ship Cargo and Cruise Ship Simulator with Fly Cargo Plane to deliver the cargo delivery in different cities is totally a different task against the offroad cargo delivery. Offroad police jeep and transport truck driver are masters of driving on the offroad tracks and they are transportation tycoon. Army car transport in vehicle transport simulator of cruise ship transporter of a fly cargo plane.

Transport US Police Car: Cargo Cruise Ship Driving game is all about the US Police Car Transporter and US Army Car Transporter. Load the Police Bikes, Army Jeeps, Police Cars, Army Tanks, Police Limo Cars, Police Van and US Police Car in the Cargo Loader Truck. Drive the cargo truck to the airport and unload the Army Jeeps, Police Cars, Police Bikes, Army Tanks, Police Limo Cars, Police Van and US Police Car. Now your task is to again load all these in Airplane transport and become the airplane car transporter in the plane transport sim game. Fly Cargo plane to the next destination to deliver the cargo delivery. Land the airplane transport on the cargo airport. Unload all the cargo and then deliver them to the Police Cruise ship through cargo truck transport. Drive the cargo truck transport by cargo transport truck driver to the cruise ship simulator in the vehicle transport simulator. Sea Captain is waiting at the master harbor for auto transfer of the police cars to the cruise ship mate through army cargo ship. Police Car Parking Captain is another transport challenge in the car transport games. Drive the Offroad Police Jeep and Fly Cargo Plane in this Police Car Transport game and become the master of police car transporter. Cruise Ship cargo along with transport truck driver in car parking captain of army car transport is best to drive the Crusie Ship Cargo and cargo truck transport. Download this amazing game of Police Car Transport and Enjoy the Cargo Truck Transport.

1- Heavy Cruise Ship Simulator
2- New Police Car Transport
3- Realistic Vehicle Transport Simulator
4- Cargo Truck Transport Sounds and Environment

title: Car Game Crash Racing 2018
description:
Start your real car engine against the hurdles coming in front of you in realistic Race Car Crash track Game. Swipe left or right to avoid hurdles like ballz and the giant ball coming from the front in beaming car crash to destroy your vehicle don’t collide with other highway riders in this car driving simulator Daytona game. improve your beaming drive skills when you keep eye on obstacles and hurdles coming from the front and trying to crash you down in this death racing theme car game. Car hurdle game helps you in making your dreams come true for becoming a real champion and hero of the road race of one of the best car racing limit of hurdles and giant ball in beaming drive car driving simulator. Challenging levels to increase your skills for making you a real and active driver, with every next mission you have limited time and more hurdles coming on your way to block your car and damage it to the extent it may be dead soon survive in this death car racing from beaming drive car crashes.

 Most dangerous and speedy giant ballz are coming in fast speed to destroy your car, you have to survive and save your vehicle from the hurdles coming to you in this crazy car game. Sprawling tracks allows you to move left and right for survival avoiding ball and hurdles on the highway racerroad. You have to break the chain of balls and survive in this amazing realistic featured survival game of car vs ball hurdles smoothly coming to take you down. Take challenges of different survival time and avoid your car crash engine just avoid hitting rolling balls or cannonballs or any hurdle coming on your way in this legends car racing game, every hurdle will try to hit you near speed bump and stop you but you have to survive for long race collection of coins and survival for a better sports car racing fever.

 Fasten your seatbelts and drive this fastest car in the world to experience stunning curly racing and dirt car racing adventures with your luxury SUV, Prado, Sportsgear and other vehicles for speed car racing. Avoid hitting other cars on this car track and try to maintain your fuel for avoiding hitting other cars and giant ballz as you are driving a car in this car game with expensive engines and do not let other cars target you just have to survive for different seconds in every coming level. Be alert and do not hit the sharp turns, obstacles and narrow passages for survival and completion of challenge and level-ups in this hardest car racing game. Upcoming levels are loaded with new vehicles and hurdles of unique designs and interest in this most popular top car racing game. Show your proficiency and high skills in the long race of survival and become a great driver. 


Features of Car Game Crash Racing 2018

Challenging Car Racing Beaming Drive Missions
HD Graphics & High-quality Sound effects
Smooth controls for car driving

unique vehicles with upgrades
Realistic damage of the car


Swipe left and right to enjoy this Car Racing Car Crash Game

title: Racing Truck 3D
description:
Racing truck 3D brings the new experience of truck race. This game offers variety of racing modes. Enter into the world of race and adventure with this extreme truck driving. You will enjoy multiple locations, trucks and simulation type game-play. This game will take you to the next level of driving. Fast speed driving needs more skills and quick reflexes. Feel the thrill and explore new racing modes on your androids. Race through traffic, collect coins and overtake cars for extra bonus. Different camera angles help you to assess the racing laps. You can change gear forward and backward as per need. Control big racing truck with steering wheel, accelerator and brakes. Different background music in each level will keep your interest till the end. 

Features:
•	Realistic Truck Models

title: Heavy Construction Machines 2018
description:
One of the most exciting things about this Heavy Construction Machines 2018 Simulator Game is that you get to drive multiple Heavy excavator construction Machinery all in one construction game. This game is much better then jeep driving, BMX Taxi, mobile bus and all the other games. Challenge your Construction skills with heavy construction machines 3D game because as best constructor worker there is lot of tasks for you to complete. Different construction vehicles are waiting for you to be used in the dirt with each of their own mission and Difficulty level. Among many other free construction games Heavy Construction Machines 2018 offers you the use of multiple extreme speed construction vehicles like heavy loader for construction. You can do construction using Crane, Excavator, Endless Runner Dumper Truck, Snow Excavator, Truck Hauler, Bulldozer, Log Crane Truck, Cement Truck, Forklift Flatbed Crane, Garbage Truck, Cargo Truck and Haul Truck. Here in crane digging you have to work with the pave machine. You belong to the city builder construction projects. That’s why the duty of virtual city construction is on your shoulders. Move your fingers on loader trucker and enjoy the work on construction site.



Have you ever had a chance to operate concrete pump, bulldozer or even a tower crane? Now it's your time to learn to operate heavy construction machines thanks to heavy Construction machine maker to give you such a game to be like a PRO. Start up as an inexperienced contractor taking small contracts from the city. Learn how to drive all the machines using convenient controls and be the best off-road constructor. Driving heavy machinery on the mountain roads is a challenging task due to heavy engine city traffic and rushy roads. Drive this off road excavator and avoid crashes. Convert sand mud, dry cement and brick blocks to tall buildings with heavy construction machines. Bring your construction dreams to reality and construct off-road bridges with a huge excavator using sand mud, dry cement and brick block. Build multiple storey mountain houses and tall buildings with modern construction machinery and licensed construction vehicles. Perform heavy crane works and learn excavator driving and excavator parking skills in this heavy Construction Machines 2018 game.



Features Of Heavy Construction Machines 2018:

•	10 Kinds Of Heavy Construction Vehicles To Enjoy
•	Enjoy Super Immersive Environment And Realistic Sound Effects.
•	Awesome Environments Of Boom Crane Operator
•	Finish All Levels, With Different Objectives And Challenges.

title: Tricky Bike Stunt Rider 3D
description:
Tricky Bike Stunt Rider 3D is easy to pick up but hard to master which will keep you in the zone for hours.
 The best physic based multiplayer challenging mission bike stunt game is here! You can't stop play this game 3d environment with perfect physics and enhance graphics. This is the best Moto bike stunt racing game. 

Play this addictive stunt game and perform your stunt riding skills to prove that you are the real trail bike racer. Enjoy impressive graphics and realistic control, which provide you best stunt bike gaming experience. This game is filled with free style action and stunts. Prepare to enjoy your hours of game-play with this tricky trail bike stunt simulator. 
Race, jump and crash your way and other mad rivals through the amazing frontier tracks as you master the skills and the physics of motocross in this high speed racing adventure. Prepare to enjoy fast moto racing. Your goal in the game, successfully complete several levels, consisting of challenging and dangerous tracks and jumps. Realistic and eye-catching graphics to will provide you with the best motorcycle game experience.

Each level is more challenging and exciting than the other. And perform some high stunts! Race, jump and crash your dangerous way and other rivals through the amazing frontier tracks as you master the skills and the physics of bike in this high speed racing adventure. Control the balance of your bikes and reach the finish line without crashing. This is a physics-based motorbike racing game. Unlock more levels and bikes and explore the world map.With such an easy controls play this game, but you need to really master the game to collect all the points!

How to Play:-
• Select your bike in garage.
• Touch or press the gas (right up) button to accelerate to speed up the bike. 
• Press brake (right down) button to slow down brake or reduce the speed or to stop the bike. 
• Tap the left arrow button to back flip. 
• Tap the right arrow button to forward flip. 

Tricky Bike Stunt Rider 3D Game Features:-

🏁 Easy controls 
🏁 Fun sounds and music
🏁 Great motorcycles models
🏁 Unique motorcycles to unlock
🏁 Fun surprises in each level
🏁 Realistic stunt ramps and stunts
🏁 Ultra Smooth and intelligent control
🏁 Multiple Realistic physics based dirt bikes
🏁 Unique, rough and dangerous stunts
🏁 Beautiful 3D graphics and amazing environment
🏁 Challenging stunts gameplay

title: City Smash Police Escape
description:
Crazy smashing challenges every where in City Smash Police Escape. it is crazy game where smashing city is the crazy objective. You need to avoid Police and try to smash what ever you can. Smash what you can on the way as city of dirt is waiting. avoid cops cars in order not to loose health. 

SMASH EVERYTHING 
Well, almost. Whichever route you take through an ever-changing world of dirt tracks and dusty logging towns you can crash and bash your way through smashable scenery in the most intense display of destruction you can have ever. 

SMASH THE POLLS & LEADERBOARD 
What crazy road race would be complete without a TV chopper hovering overhead? The further you get and the more you smash, the bigger the TV ratings and the more cash you earn. Play against your Facebook and Google+ friends to see who can become the most famous Bandit on network TV. 

Smash city Police escape is an intense action racing game which pits your driving skills against felons desperate to outrun you in wild chases. 

- Pursue and takedown high speed felons 
- Escape criminal attacks in heart-stopping chases 
- Stunning 3D graphics 
- Large, beautiful, driveable city 
- Physics based chaos and mayhem 

Do not give a chance to Cops car to hit you other wise you are no longer have the same health. 

Always give your feedback in order for TNG Games Studio to update the game and develop new features for City Smasher.

title: Gunship Battle Thrilling Strike Army Helicopter
description:
Become a helicopter dogfight expert by diving into Gunship Battle Thrilling Strike Army Helicopter, a helicopter game that promises you an extreme adventure and shooting experience. 
Launch a fierce air attack at the battlefield by using your apache helicopter fighting abilities. This helicopter flying and fighting game allows you to shoot down all enemies in this intense air battle and emerge as the victor!

This is a warship battle and navy battleship attack packed with gun battle, ship battle, plane battle and airstrike where you have to destroy submarine and warship and fight as a war commando. 

In this game, you will have to stay very alert at the battle arena, aware of any approaching enemy warships and helicopters. Steer your apache helicopter towards the enemy gunships on the battlefield and launch an air attack to stop 
them in their tracks. There will be multiple fighter helicopters to select from to launch your air attack, so choose carefully and wisely. Do not under estimate the enemy battle techniques as they are very well equipped and would come 
at you with full force and fuego.

Destroy the enemy gunship choppers and convoys to break their defence system by using the heavy machine guns and ballistic missiles,or enemies' missiles are fired to hit you! The fare, you will have to undertake it.
Try to demolish the enemy's militia and military bases in this deadliest and marvelous combat experience. There are many different types of helicopter available for you, 
such as black hawk, Rambo, Apache, Ami-1942, Caro-47, H-34 Chicksaw, BBW - 1942, H-13 Sioux, UH-1D Huey, Ang - 1942, UH-1B Huey Gunship, AH-1 Cobra. You can drive them to canter on the  ground, also you can pilot them in the sky.
we are waiting for your revenant,and for your gunship revenant.


Game Features:
- Smooth apache helicopter game play
- Multiple levels with increasing difficulty
- A wide range of gunship helicopters to choose from 
- Touch enemy battle attacks
- Crazy & Fantastic 3D graphics
- Realistic helicopter flying experience

title: City School Bus Driving
description:
City School bus game is full of thrill and adventure to pick up and drop passengers to their destination. Bring back the city school child from different picnic point to their city bus stops/terminals. Drive the famous, big yellow or blue School Bus to transport the students of famous City! The summer holidays are finally over and you’re preparing to get back to work. Take the kiddies to high school on this luxury yellow school coach. Amazing high school bus driving is a wonderful and enjoyable riding simulation. Show your astounding stunts profession on hard track and winning wonderful laps of your harsh driving. Experience the realistic consequences of driving a bulky vehicle through a crowded, urban city!
 In bus driving your job is to transport children around an attractive and realistic city places. In this City School Bus Simulator game 4x4 bus driver mission is pick up the children from one place and drop the children to the other place carefully and complete your task. You must drive fast and follow the right direction, Try to follow the traffic rules. This game is same like “Tourist Simulator” or “ Bus” games.
City School Bus Driving Game is the outstanding idea because we have to go out for city station when we feel exhausted. The hill is now full of transport issues. It's better to go out and enjoy City School Bus Driving. This fun school bus parking sim is a best driving game of 2018.
 Features 

•Exciting & Addictive game play
• Extreme bus driving challenge to save bus and tourists in twisty paths
•Amazing Huge city Environment to explore
• Awesome driving controls of buses.
•Realistic School bus Driving Physics

•Different camera angles that give you more control

title: Football 2018 Games
description:
Football 2018 Games is a World Cup Game is a Real Graphics Football game. football games
Get ready for better skills, exciting fun, more comfortable controls, new players, and improved gaming experience as you play the Football league match. Be the fanatical player of your team and crush your opponents in the field.Fulfill your fantasy to play realistic football matches in this football league game 2018. Choose between different teams like Americans, Brazil, France, Germany, China, Mexico, Japan, Australia and Italy etc. Improve your timings to kick the football as it touchdowns to the ground and make it to the goal post. Play with blockbuster characters which are superstars in this football league game.

Shoot an authentic shot which ends into the opponent,s goal post. Earn the golden leg by scoring the most goals in a world cup matches. Play in real locations stadiums with realistic environments. This play world football league game is designed to improve your abilities in real life football game. Improvise your skills in this champion of football world cup game and be the master in the football game and make it to the top ranks among the other players. Choose your squad wisely and according to the game plans and needs. Show some hardcore skills to get the game going.

Cheer up the crowd by showing your impressive skills and tackle your opponents, giving astonishing passes to your team mates. Play exhibition matches and earn respect among other players and other teams and the crowd. Play and win the matches and make it the champions league. You can play in this Futsal football game at any position like quarterback, defense, Front, attack.

Be the real life football player and feel like a real football player when he enters into the ground and play real life match. Keep this football goal master game on the fire by showing your moves in dodging, and hitting some smooth shots. Start the game from the center of the stadium , make your way to the opponent's goal post, and kick the football in for score.Choose between different players from over all the world and go to match against other players from other leagues real arenas around the world.

title: Fly Drone Aventura
description:
Free Fly Drone Aventura ☣
Atrévete a pilotar un Drone esquivando todos los obstáculos que aparecerán en tu camino.

            ✘Bombas
            ✘ Rocas
            ✘ Abujeros negros
            ✘ Metales

Todos ellos aparecerán en tu camino, controla tu Drone y llega hasta el final.


Durante el camino no solo tendrás impedimentos, también encontraras:

             ✔ Laser
             ✔ Monedas
             ✔ Imanes

Cuando te aparezca el láser intenta hacerte con él y Aprovéchalo para destruir todos los elementos negativos que se interpongan en tu camino, a la vez la velocidad de tu Drone incrementara con la obtención del láser.
¿Serás capaz de dominarlo?

Recoge tantas monedas como puedas, la recompensa será gratificante ya que podrás cambiarlas por distintos Drones que encontraras en el garaje.
Solo los mejores serán capaces de desbloquearlo todos.
 ¿Serás tú uno de ellos?

Los imanes te ayudarán a conseguir monedas, aunque no puedas pasar por encima de ellas, intenta hacerte con los imanes siempre que aparezcan y aprovecha este plus que te darán.

Compite con tus amigos para ver quien tiene mas habilidad y consigue mantener el Drone en buen estado más tiempo.

¿Serás tú él mejor?

Selain livery bussid arjuna xhd ataupun SHD serta HD dari berbabagi bus simulator Indonesia seperti livery bussid pandawa 87, livery bussid arjuna xhd ataupun livery bussid sinar jaya serta livery bussid sugeng rahayu, livery bussid yang mempunyai tema bola pun kian digemari. Terdapat juga livery jetbus 3 shd, pasang segera livery jetbus shd.

Livery bussid bola yang berformat livery skin bus simulator Indonesia atau livery bussid HD, livery bussid SHD atau livery bussid arjuna xhd ( livery bussid XHD ) berhasil dikumpulkan dengan mempunyai template livery yang menawarkan ivery bussid Jernih serta befromat PNG dan JPG, livery bussid ini akan selalu diupdate sehinggan livery bussid update ini dengan tema livery bussid bola akan segera anda miliki.

Segera pasang livery bussid ini baik menggunakan bus SHD ( LIVERY BUSSID SHD ), HD ( Livery bussid HD ) ataupun dengan Extra High Deck bus XHD ( Livery bussid arjuna xhd ). title: Uphill Tuk Tuk Rickshaw Driving
description:
Uphill Tuk Tuk Rickshaw driver is a rickshaw driving game that has parking, pick and drop service uphill with top speed driving.

Let’s play Uphill Tuk Tuk Auto Rickshaw Driving simulator game with experience of picking and dropping passengers from current destination to final destination. The Uphill Tuk Tuk Auto Rickshaw Driving game provides new auto rickshaw driver taxi service to passengers and tourists. . Driving an Uphill Tuk tuk Rickshaw and transporting passengers on different hill stations is fun yet challenging. This game gives you the opportunity to practice to race through a traffic and difficult track to perfect your driving skills.
The amazing Uphill TUK TUK Rickshaw Driver gives you the chance to drive something else then the regular cars, truck, taxi, bikes, buses etc. This is the best Indian tuk tuk rickshaw taxi like never before. Try to get the TUK TUK rickshaw to drift or just drive as fast as you like, but be careful not to roll this three wheeled taxi on its side.

You will enjoy this new and latest Uphill Tuk Tuk Auto Rickshaw Driving 3d. To make Uphill Auto Rickshaw Traffic Racer interesting the time limit is added to pick and drop passengers. Choose real tuk tuk auto rickshaw from the garage of auto rickshaw vehicle, Start driving auto rickshaw, follow the direction from the map, stop auto rickshaw on station picks passengers then drop them on their destinations safely in time in modern auto tuk tuk rickshaw 3d simulation. Uphill Tuk tuk auto rickshaw driving 3D is really fun to drive the rickshaw loaded with passengers. Moreover while driving uphill auto rickshaw game pick and drop passengers you will see the mesmerizing surroundings around the uphill  and get opportunity to interact with peoples. In the uphill auto rickshaw games 3d simulator you also need the pro-parking skills to park your auto rickshaw on the right place of bus station because if you do not park your rickshaw on right place the passengers will not enter in your tuk tuk rickshaw. 
This tuk tuk game comprises of 15 different and challenging levels with real traffic conditions. Start your passenger three wheeler auto rickshaw and drive on uphill, look for the passengers for your uphill tuk tuk auto rickshaw driver. Complete given task to complete the level of an auto rickshaw driving game. Uphill Auto rickshaw driving game gives you the chance of money collection upon level completion, used this money to update rickshaws waiting in the garage to drive. Drive tuk tuk rickshaw in the city is fun and adventurous simulator game. In auto rickshaw new game 2018 drive carefully and provide best transportation services to local passengers as pro tuk tuk rickshaw games. 
Features of Uphill Auto Rickshaw Tuk Tuk Driver:

Indian Tuk Tuk Auto Rickshaw Driving Game Features:
• Challenging levels for ultimate fun
• Amazing realistic controls
• Be a tuk tuk driver and drive tuk tuk at uphill parking spot
• Superb rickshaw drive and the best parking game
• Astonishing rickshaw driving experience in this tuk tuk Simulator
• Smooth controls with breaks and acceleration paddle 
• HD 3D graphics to enjoy amazing driving experience
• Advanced vehicle physics & breathtaking challenges
• Brand new environment in this latest rickshaw passenger transporter

We are also looking for your feedback, suggestion or recommendation. Feel free to rate and review the game, share with others so we can continue to bring you the best experiences and updates

title: Factory to Market
description:
Factory to market is a simulation game that allows you to build various factories that will produce a variety of resources. You can then use the resources to create other, more advanced resources, or Make money by selling your resources on a dynamically changing, global market.

"Buy when the market price is low, sell when the price is high, and make millions!"

As the market is open to all players, the prices are constantly changing due to the supply and demand of the resources. You'll have to keep a close eye on which resources you should be buying, and which ones you should be selling.

title: Crane Simulator
descriptionHTML:
Cranes are commonly employed in the transport industry for the loading and unloading of freight, in the construction industry for the movement of materials, and in the manufacturing industry for the assembling of heavy equipment.

In this crane simulator game, you’ll experience operating deck crane, mobile crane and tower crane to do different jobs in different place. Moreover, you also have chance to drive heavy truck, which you’ll drive and work together with cranes to transport containers.

★★Different cranes have different features★★

★Deck Crane is located on the ships and boats, which is used for cargo operations or boat unloading and retrieval where no shore unloading facilities are available.

★Mobile Crane is a hydraulic-powered crane with a telescoping boom mounted on truck-type carriers which are designed to easily transport to a site and use with different types of load and cargo with little or no setup or assembly.

★Tower Crane is a modern form of balance crane that consist of the same basic parts. Fixed to the ground on a concrete slab and sometimes attached to the sides of structures, tower cranes often give the best combination of height and lifting capacity and are used at the construction site. The base is then attached to the mast which gives the crane its height. Further, the mast is attached to the slewing unit (gear and motor) that allows the crane to rotate 360 degree. On top of the slewing unit there are three main parts which are: the long horizontal jib (working arm), shorter counter-jib, and the operator's cab.

CRANE SIMUALOR FEATURES
☀Career Mode operate the deck crane located on the ship to load/unload containers between the cargo ship and the dock; operate the mobile crane to load/unload containers on the heavy truck;
☀Truck Mode drive the heavy truck to transport containers between the port and different freight yards; to earn money, you have to transport the containers to the designated freight yards on time or you can’t pay for the gas;
☀Casual Mode: you’ll be a tower crane operator who is working in a sewage plant; your job is operating a tower crane to install pipelines; so that the harmless treated wastewater can pumped into the ocean;

-Different cranes (deck crane, 7 mobile cranes, tower crane) to operate;
- Detailed and realistic environment;
-Fantastic 3D graphics;
-Different camera views;
-Realistic physics and gameplay;
-Easy controls like tilt, buttons or steering wheel;
-Truck simulation;
-Crane simulation;
- Spin & Win;
-Digital Goods: currency packs, remove ads, unlock all cranes, unlock levels;

NOTE: Crane Simulator is a free bike game and supported by Ad.
summary: Crane simulator is a latest mobile, tower and deck crane simulation game in 2018
recentChanges:
-Fixed bugs;
-New NPC traffics;
-Optimized gameplay.
-Added navigation system;

title: Mystic Messenger 神祕信使
description:
隨手下載的App傳來了陌生人的訊息，
在「他」的引導下妳踏進了某個神秘公寓……
此時App突然自動連結到一個談話正熱鬧的聊天室！
毫無頭緒的妳，將透過參與聊天室對話/簡訊/通話功能與聊天室成員們互動。
妳或許會與其中的某人成為朋友？戀人？甚至發覺不為人知的重大祕密？！
並協助成員們以e-mail聯絡賓客，達成聊天室存在的目的──舉辦一場慈善派對！！
隨著生動有趣的聊天對話，妳將展開為期11天、浪漫又刺激的冒險……

title: Idle Car Empire - A Business Tycoon Game
description:
Idle Car Empire is a business simulator where you manage an international car company and become a wealthy tycoon. You design automobiles, research parts and build up your factories all over the world. You take care of the upper management, define prices and sell cars for a fortune. Make smart decisions and then just idle and wait for the money to pour in when you are away.

There's a great variety of car types from hatchbacks over SUVs to elegant sportscars and lots of rims, decals and colors to chose from. Keep track of your achievements with a wide array of statistics and graphs showing your company's progress.

**Requires NO internet connection!**

You can also take part in multi-race championships and actually drive your cars yourself to win big money prizes!

Features:
-8 different types of cars
-75 parts to chose from and research
-Visual customization with a variety of decals, rims and colors
-11 countries with specific demands and attributes to build a factory in
-Randomly-generated managers with unique abilities
-Racing with 7-day championships and premium rewards
-Random events with multiple choice options
-Statistics and historical information on your company and all your cars
-Comprehensive tutorial and help system

Evil Grog Games - https://www.evilgrog.com

title: Kievan Rus’ – Age of Colonization
descriptionHTML:
Kievan Rus’ – the Age of Colonization is an exciting geopolitical strategy people play in the whole world. The game doesn’t require Internet connection.
Become a ruler of one of the largest countries in Europe. Are you ready to battle with the Roman Empire, powerful France and England, aggressive barbarians? There are more than 40 medieval countries in the game.

Main features:
● Build an army and a fleet;
● Take on espionage missions and diversions;
● Attack other countries to annex them or to take their resources;
● Defend your territory from other countries;
● Enter into peace agreements;
● Produce food, resources and military equipment;
● Sell the excess products to other countries, buy products you need;
● List of historically accurate events;
● Ordain laws;
● Organize international meetings, promote your suggestions for voting;
● Choose an official religion of your country;
● Increase the amount of produced goods thanks to researches;
● Appoint the commander of the fleet, land army, the commander in chief, chief for collecting tribute, building and trade;
● Fight separatism on conquered territories.

We are constantly working on improving the gameplay and interesting updates are coming soon.
summary: Simple geopolitical strategy

title: World Beast War: Destroy the World in an Idle RPG
description:
Rampage through a destroyed world and create the ultimate team of beasts! World Beast War is an idle RPG where your monsters are created, combined, evolved and sent to battle in a war to reclaim the Earth.

Beasts rage and battle across the screen, including classic monsters like King Gorilla, Lizard God and more! Tap your beast to send it into battle or drag it onto another to combine them into a new, unique monster. Collect monsters and their lost articles to upgrade your beasts and defeat stronger foes.

Idle RPG mechanics let your beasts battle and level up even when you’re away, and auto-battle features allow you to manage the team while the monsters fight. Pixel graphics create a retro gaming atmosphere with all new gameplay and clicker game mechanics.

Beast battles and apocalyptic action await in World Beast War! Download now!

FEATURES:

Monster Game
- Battle monsters throughout the ruined city
- Combine beasts into new, powerful monsters
- Level up your beasts by feeding them tasty meat (just don’t ask where it comes from)
- Collect monsters, including rare mutant beasts with special powers!

Idle RPG
- Level up your beasts even when you’re not playing
- Destroy the city with your beasts – you choose the formation, they do the smashing!
- Idle clicker mechanics use simple drag-and-drop tools to create and upgrade your team of beasts

Monster Simulator
- Beasts from film and game history unite, including:
- Lizard God
- King Gorilla
- Rampaging beasts
- And more!

Destroy the World
- Rampage through an apocalyptic world
- Battle monsters and defeat your foes
- Beat em up and take back the Earth

Battle monsters, collect beasts and upgrade your team in an idle game of epic proportions. Download World Beast War today!

title: Weird Aquarium
description:
Story
One day, while out for a walk, you find a strange tree.
As it turns out, it's a magical tree that attracts mysterious creatures.

Game Overview
In Weird Aquarium, players can collect dozens of bizarre creatures.
You might even be able to get new characters by making your Aquarium beautiful!
The creatures are in 3D and have a wide range of actions, making them endlessly fun to look at.
Incredibly easy to play! You can be as hands-off as you like!

Gameplay
You have the ability to get Energy from the weird creatures.
You can use that Energy to buy Items for your Aquarium.
As you buy more Items, more and more creatures will visit, drawn in by the beauty of your Aquarium.

title: Car Crash Test VAZ 2104
description:
Before you, a new simulator of destruction of cars Car Crash Test VAZ 2104. In this simulator is presented a new car VAZ 2104. Choose the car you like in the garage and do with it whatever you want. Do not only test the machine but also test the dummy. In the simulator Car Crash Test VAZ 2104, a choice of modes of driving and crash accidents. You can choose a crash test and after it you will know what were the chances of surviving the crash test of the dummy, whether the car survived and many other things. Break up the brick walls at high speed and destroy the 3D VAZ 2104 machine, break the machines completely and try to leave the dummy intact. Arrange the car for a crash test and other tests or just have fun driving. Customize the VAZ 2104 and other cars, make them more comfortable for you and your race. Change colors, wheels and much more, so that you like the car more. Pass all the tests of the VAZ 2104 crash test with a dummy.

 We often update our simulators, and almost always respond to your feedback and comments, and if you have any suggestions, we will be happy to see them, our games are based on your feedback and suggestions. Thanks to you in the simulator Car Crash Test VAZ 2104 introduced a new system of damage to machines. For those with whom the game is possible to slow down - reduce the quality of graphics in the settings of the game ("Settings" -> "Graphic").


 The main provisions of the game:

 - various locations
 - 3 high-quality 3D models of cars and VAZ 2104
 - Various settings for customizing the machine (the color of the car, etc., the wheels and casting, the body repair, the convergence, the air suspension)
 - a large number of settings for managing the style of driving a car
 - Different modes of crash-test and driving cars
 - live ragdoll crash test dummy
 - realistic graphics and damage to machines (depending on the phone model - "Settings" -> "Graphic")
 - a new system of machine destruction


 For your suggestions, ideas and criticism, you can write either in the comments to our simulator, or on the mail: insanegameprod@gmail.com

title: Truck Simulator 3D: Factory Parking
description:
Welcome to Truck Simulator 3D: Factory Parking!
In this Factory Parking edition of Truck Simulator 3D you’ll learn how to park your truck and trailer at different locations on the factory terrain. Driving on the factory terrain with your truck and trailer is not easy, you have to look out for other trucks and drivers for example. In 18 challenging levels you’ll face realistic situations which u have to face as a real truck driver. You have to make difficult manoeuvres for example. To finish a level you first have to attach the trailer, to do that follow the red arrows. After you’ve attached the trailer, you have to park your truck and trailer, to do that follow the yellow arrows.

Truck Simulator 3D: Factory Parking features:
- Factory environment
- 18 levels
- Google Play Games
- Easy truck driving controls

When you enjoyed Truck Simulator 3D: Factory Parking please support us by following us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/JansenGames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/JansenGames

Detailed info about fever & its symptoms. This app also gives you information about blood pressure. Maximum & Minimum blood pressure values is also available in app.

title: Tower blocks - Tower Stack Builder
description:
Do you love classic game ?
This game made for you : Tower blocks - Tower Stack Builder
Build the highest skyscraper which is belong to you. 
Tower blocks - Tower Stack Builder is a classic tower block stacking game. 
Construct your own skyscraper that reaches to the sky. 
Tower blocks - Tower Stack Builder is one of the best mobile games. 
Keep on stacking blocks to build your massive tower.
An old school type mobile game which can never get old. 
All you need to do is stack. 
Keep on stacking blocks and touch sky heights.
Be an architect and drop stack on a proper position and timing.

********************
How to Play

- Tap on the screen to stack a tower block
- Stack as many blocks as possible to construct skyscraper
- The taller the tower is, the higher the score is
- The quicker the tower is built, the higher the score is

Tower Stack Builder New Features 
▲ Lovely graphics & relaxing music
▲ Easy to Play, Fun for ALL AGES
▲ Build tower with friends and top the leaderboard
▲ Interesting gameplay, get addicted from first tap
▲ Tiny game size 
▲ Completely FREE to play

Discover the fun of one-tap gameplay and test your reflex and puzzle skills in Tower Stack!

title: NASA Crawler Transporter : Space Flight Simulator
description:
Now GamePlay Station (GPS) Team is Introducing Brand New Mega Transporter Truck Simulator Game Crawler Transporter NASA Space Shuttle Simulator "NASA Crawler Transporter Space Flight Simulator" So Become an astronaut with Space Shuttle Flight Landing Simulator Game in 3D and Start Space Racing Simulator : 3D Star Racer!

In this Space Craft Simulator Free Game you can Control realistic space shuttle transporter Called " Crawler Transporter" and Lunch the Different Missile,Spaceships,Space Craft,Space Shuttle and Rockets with New flight simulator and explore the infinity space in this Space Shuttle Flight Landing Simulator Game and Fight for become the Space Racing Simulator : 3D Star Racer.Crawler Transporter is the World Biggest transporter truck.Now  crawler-transporter became the largest self-powered land vehicle in the world. Mega Ship Transporter Truck is also Know  Missile Crawler Transporter and Power train. The crawler-transporters carry vehicles on the Mobile Launcher Platform. 

Game play of NASA Crawler Transporter : Space Flight Simulator

Crawler Transporter- NASA Space Shuttle Simulator:

The crawler-transporters, formally known as the Missile Crawler Transporter, are a pair of tracked vehicles used to transport spacecraft,Space Shuttle ,Space Ship,Missile,Rocket from NASA's Vehicle Assembly Building to Space shuttle Launcher Building for Launching the Space Crafts into Space and this Space Craft Simulator Free Game is totally based on Missile Crawler Transporter and  Space Ship Flight Simulator . 

The Game play of this Missile Crawler Transporter is very unique and Simple .In this Mega Ship Transporter Truck Game,You Can Drive First Ever Mega transporter Truck.As a Space Racing Simulator,Its you Job to Drive the Space Shuttle Simulator Transporter Truck and transport spacecraft,Space Shuttle ,Space Ship,Missile,Rocket from NASA's Vehicle Assembly Building to Space shuttle Launcher Building for Launching the Space Crafts into Space.Its Not Easy to Drive the Mega transporter truck " Crawler Transporter" along the Space Shuttle.So Drive this Mega Vehicle Carefully and Transport the NASA Space Shuttle As a 3D Star Racer.


NASA Crawler Transporter : Space Flight Simulator
Features:

•	Crawler Transporter Model for Space Shuttle Fligh Transporter.
•	Different Space Ship,Space Crafts,Space shuttle,Missile and 
        Rockets Models.
•	Space Shuttle Flight Landing scene.
•	Smooth and easy Controls of Mega transporter truck.
•	HD Graphics.
•	Amazing Sounds and Particles Effects.

Space Shuttle Flight Landing Simulator 3D is a Realistic Space Shuttle Simulator with  Crawler Transporter as a Mega transporter truck for interplanetary and interstellar travel Machine e.g Air Crafts,Space  Crafts,Space Ship. It is the only space simulator available that takes into account relativistic effects during interstellar flight.Besides mega transporter truck Driving you can also see the space shuttle flight in this Simulator Game.

Download this Mega Transporter Truck Driving Game Crawler Transporter - NASA Space Shuttle Simulator Game "NASA Crawler Transporter : Space Flight Simulator"and Enjoy the Space shuttle 3D Flight to become the Space Racing Simulator 3D Star Racer.

The Game play of this Missile Crawler Transporter is very unique and Simple .In this Mega Ship Transporter Truck Game,You Can Drive First Ever Mega transporter Truck.As a Space Racing Simulator,Its you Job to Drive the Space Shuttle Simulator Transporter Truck and transport spacecraft,Space Shuttle ,Space Ship,Missile,Rocket from NASA's Vehicle Assembly Building to Space shuttle Launcher Building for Launching the Space Crafts into Space.Its Not Easy to Drive the Mega transporter truck " Crawler Transporter" along the Space Shuttle.So Drive this Mega Vehicle Carefully and Transport the NASA Space Shuttle As a 3D Star Racer.

• Crawler Transporter Model for Space Shuttle Fligh Transporter.
• Different Space Ship,Space Crafts,Space shuttle,Missile and
Rockets Models.

description:
Play as a super virtual dad in this amazing real life happy family, a free simulator 3D game. Perform like your daily duties like a super virtual dad. Be an important member of this virtual family. Take shower, enjoy lovely breakfast with your virtual wife and kids. Prove yourself worthy to be one of the best virtual dad in real life happy family simulator 3D game. 

Super Dad always plays a major role in real life. Virtual Dad is the head of this happy virtual family. Take a day off from your office work. Help your virtual wife. Be a helping hand to virtual nanny who already took a day off due to sickness. As virtual mom mom is busy in taking care of sick baby. Virtual dad has to prepare food as chef in kitchen in real life. Take pet dog for a city walk, wake up kids and toddlers for school, help wife in grocery, drive her to the city shopping mall and grocery supermarket.  Be an ultimate super dad and happy dad like an important family man. You are an amazing virtual dad in this real life happy family game. Housekeeping job is not an easy task being a virtual dad, start your busy day in this ultimate family fun game.  prove to be a virtual family man of life, your wife is taking care of sick baby and you need to clean the house. Go to car porch and collect garbage and dump it into the backyard. Clean and wash your car at car washing area. This super dad adventure simulator has a beautiful dream house. Lovely bedrooms, baby nursery, a huge dining room and kitchen. Help your soulmate to decorate this amazing house. 

This realistic virtual dad happy family simulator is a realistic game. You are a real man to be a real super dad caring his kids. This family simulator allows you to interact with all the fun adventure and help your lovely wife in her daily life problems.  Have babies and see them grow up. Expect the unexpected. Surprise events will pop up during your routine. Celebrate birthdays with your virtual happy family. Let kids help this happy super dad in cleaning messy house and kitchen piled up with dirty dishes. Prepare kids for school as the school bus is right at the corner. Now help your real life wife with daily routine household chores. Clean up kitchen, collect dirty clothes for laundry, put dishes in dish washer. Use real life vacuum machine to clean up all bedrooms, sitting area dinning lounge. It’s a long time that the garden is not taken care off, cut over grown grass, put some new plants. Hey look your real life neighborhood friend is here for you to meet you, have a friendly gossip with him.

title: President House Construction Simulator
description:
Enjoy the most entertaining and unique President House Construction Simulator game till now. Get ready to drive heavy construction machinery and excavators to build white house for USA President. As the game progress you will find challenging levels of house construct. Be a contractor of this US president house game and build a sophisticated white house. Construction trucks and cranes are given to finish the task in the best possible way. Download and play the most creative game of 2018 with addictive home design feature. 

Design a brand new house for American president as previous was too old.  There are number of steps for construction which you have to follow. They comprise 10 different levels. First of all clear the land from stone and level the surface. Use excavator, bulldozers and loading trucks for house building. After completing this, next task is to load construction material in loader truck and take it to the construction site. Drive carefully and supply all required material on time. Use road roller to plain the surface for US president house construct. Now place pillars on he pointed area using tower crane. Realistic physics used like in our other construction games. Build boundary walls and complete all construction tasks of this house builder simulator. Your job as almost done as an architect, now clear the road and clean the area using road cleaners. Cut gross with cutter and plant trees to add beauty in white house. 

President House Construction Simulator Features:
•	White House Building Simulation for androids
•	Realistic construction site environment and High quality graphics
•	10 exciting levels with challenging tasks
•	Heavy cranes, excavators and truck driving simulator
•	Free to download and easy to play

title: Vampire & Miko 100 Year Promise
description:
This new story includes a truth 100 years ago from the story of ‘100 Years Love with a Vampire’.

A story in which a young Miko and a Vampire meet and part.



“Stay still. I won’t take your life.”

I said this to a girl holding her behind.

Her thin shoulders were shaking.
I’m sorry. But it won’t take long.

Her white neck. Gulp. Red blood under her thin skin is hidden.

I haven’t had a meal for a long time...

*****

[Note: 1]
This story is set up 100 years ago from the story of ‘100 Years Love with a Vampire’. The story includes some stories of the ‘100 Years Love with a Vampire’.

You can enjoy playing just this game, but you can enjoy this story even more after completing ‘100 Years Love with a Vampire’.

[Note: 2]
This story is a translated story from the created story in Japan.
The characters, buildings, name of places etc. were created and they don’t exist.
There is no consideration about time.
Please just enjoy the fantasy and the modern version.

*****

This is a mysterious story of a Vampire in the West and a maiden Miko in the Japanese Shinto shrine.
A Vampire from a foreign country met Japanese Yokai monsters and Yaoyorozu Gods
such as the Tengu and the Fox with 9 tails etc.

*****

Harue (Miko, Shinto shrine maiden)
Due to her great father,
a girl isn’t confident about herself.
Her friends were Yokai monsters when she was little.

Gerald (Vampire)
He is a Vampire which is a monster in the foreign country who happened to come to the Japanese Shinto shrine.
He is a good looking guy (IKEMEN) as well as being kind.
In the story of ‘100 Years Love with a Vampire’, he appeared palm size.
His favorite food is a girl's blood, but he always fails to get it.

title: Car Stunts Accident Crash Simulator: Wreckfast
description:
Welcome to Car Stunts Accidents Crash Simulator, a real car crash simulator game where your duty is cruising fast track real suv and expensive luxury cars on offroad tracks & crazy hurdles. This game is specially designed for not only speed bumps but for high-speed jumps crashes for a speed bump car stunt crash test with different luxury jeeps. Want to add some adventure to your routine car racing? Try this new offroad hill climbing real car crash simulator. Enjoy this offroad car stunt crash drive with deadly tracks and bumpy roads where you have to execute crashing stunts and deadly crashes. Perform Car Stunts like a tricks master and damage your vehicle like a pro crash driver in demolition arena.

This car crash accident simulator game is a mixture of crash style engine, fast paced racing action, demolition derby and demolition war games in Highway offroad Car stunt crash Racing Games. Enjoy the great demolition effects when you hit any car. Cars can be run  over or shot down with a powerful auto-aim. In this 3D car stunt crash accident simulator Highway racing, you can run on streets with your tuned car. In this extreme car crash engine speed simulator customize your vehicle for the mega event. Similar to Brasil crashing racing game, you can apply real tuning to your vehicle that will make you powerful. Drive with insane driving skills on the city tracks and rushy roads with maximum care to avoid crash accidents and police crackdown. 

Car crash engine speed city tracks are loaded with blocking obstacles for most adventurous series of demolition missions, where the car racer is getting demolished. Fasten your seat belts before this adventure starts. Hit the blocking obstacles to enjoy the dangerous vehicle body crash ride. You can find yourself in a deadly crash racing games 3d on roadside or New York domestic tracks when you exceed speed limits. This car stunt crash is bumpy ride bumpy road car accidents same as the car crash driving games for crash dummy at crazy stunt arena. You can review your high speed racing crashes lately after the completion of crashing mission. Boost display is also displayed along with the speedometer. The best accident simulator is in town, join the crash racing competition and win exciting prizes. Download this crazy stunt game and enjoy heavy damage on luxury cars also enjoy bugatti crash. 

Car Stunts Accident Crash Simulator-Wreckfast Features:
-Details realistically crumple and break
-Challenging levels for everyone, now race and start your mission
-Realistic car stunt crash car racing games 3d physics with smooth controls.
-Engine Upgrades,Add Boost To Each Car,Custom Paint and Wheel Changer
-High Quality 3D Graphics and Sound Effects
-Multiple car crash speed simulator cars to choose from. 
-A Large variety of tricks from the simplest to the most complex
-Enjoy the main car engine damage and the car crash accident sim

title: Pocket Wizard GO: Fantastic Beasts
description:
Dive into the hidden wizard world, find and catch fantastic beasts and find out where to find them. A development game for children in augmented reality, with cognitive information about the fantastic creatures of our planet.

In the game Pocket Wizard GO you can feel like a real hunter on fantastic beasts. Track the creatures with the built-in radar and follow the trail. Find all the hidden magic beasts in your city!

You have to look for and catch the disguised fantastic animals in the real world with the help of a radar and a smartphone camera. Move through the streets of the city, parks and squares, even inside buildings and with the help of radar find hidden beasts. You can meet a predator like a griffin or a fire tiger right at home! Or catch a huge saber-toothed or a small magic fox at the entrance! You can also meet the phoenix, pegasus and many others. As soon as you track down the fantastic beast, rather throw a red ball into it, so it will fall into your phone. Collect all the mystical creatures in your collection!

Pocket Wizard GO used technology of augmented reality involves the use of a accelerometer, gyroscope and a camera for search and catching virtual wild pets. Be careful near the roadway, remember safety!
descriptionHTML:
Dive into the hidden wizard world, find and catch fantastic beasts and find out where to find them. A development game for children in augmented reality, with cognitive information about the fantastic creatures of our planet.

In the game Pocket Wizard GO you can feel like a real hunter on fantastic beasts. Track the creatures with the built-in radar and follow the trail. Find all the hidden magic beasts in your city!

You have to look for and catch the disguised fantastic animals in the real world with the help of a radar and a smartphone camera. Move through the streets of the city, parks and squares, even inside buildings and with the help of radar find hidden beasts. You can meet a predator like a griffin or a fire tiger right at home! Or catch a huge saber-toothed or a small magic fox at the entrance! You can also meet the phoenix, pegasus and many others. As soon as you track down the fantastic beast, rather throw a red ball into it, so it will fall into your phone. Collect all the mystical creatures in your collection!

Pocket Wizard GO used technology of augmented reality involves the use of a accelerometer, gyroscope and a camera for search and catching virtual wild pets. Be careful near the roadway, remember safety!
summary: Find and catch fantastic beasts with the camera of your smartphone

title: Dig In: An Excavator Game
description:
As a heavy equipment operator, you’re a key member of the construction site responsible for digging trenches, moving earth, busting up concrete, filling holes, and so much more. It’s your job to complete big tasks with finesse and skill. All eyes are on you as you start out in training and work your way up through increasingly more complicated jobs. 

Think you have basic moving and digging down? Well let’s see how you do at night in a busy city environment with cars, dozers, and other equipment racing by you. Not only are you trying to do the job right and on time, but you must avoid hitting utilities and other vehicles as well. Will you crumble under the pressure, or dig in to get the job done?

It’s not all work. As you build up your reputation and get noticed as a skilled operator, you will be approached with special bonus challenges. Block all the boulders from getting past you as they race downhill. See how quickly you can score some baskets in a game of excavator basketball. How about some larger than life mini-golf? 

Use the same hand-eye coordination and spatial awareness in this game as the real heavy equipment operators out on the jobsite. Perform well enough and you could be directed to real life operator opportunities in your area!

Dig In: An Excavator Game features:
-Choose between Simplified controls or challenging Realistic excavator controls.
-4 different construction environments.
-13 levels with increasingly difficult tasks.
-3 fun and challenging bonus levels.
-Dig trenches, move earth, fill in holes with gravel, and bust up concrete with a hoe ram.
-Beautiful 3D graphics and sound design.
-Links to real life heavy equipment opportunities.
-Badge earning through the Skill Arcade.

Dig In was developed by the International Union of Operating Engineers Local 66 and Simcoach Games to build awareness of the career opportunities in heavy equipment operation and to connect players to real life apprenticeships.

The Western Pennsylvania Operating Engineers Joint Apprenticeship and Training Program offers 4 year apprenticeship courses to train Heavy Equipment Operators and Heavy Equipment Mechanic Technicians. To learn more about this program and other opportunities visit www.wpaoperators.org

Dig In: An Excavator Game is a Simcoach Skill Arcade app. Explore careers, practice basic job skills and earn badges to gain exposure to careers and training opportunities in your area. To learn more about the Skill Arcade check out www.simcoachgames.com.

Privacy Policy: http://www.simcoachgames.com/privacy

title: Car Crash Test VAZ 2108
description:
In front of you is a new simulator of destructions of cars Car Crash Test VAZ 2108. In this simulator the new car VAZ 2108 is presented. Choose the car you liked in the garage and do with it whatever you want. Do not only test the machine but also test the dummy. In the simulator Car Crash Test VAZ 2108, a choice of modes of driving and crash accidents. You can choose a crash test and after it you will know what were the chances of surviving the crash test of the dummy, whether the car survived and many other things. Break up the brick walls at high speed and destroy the 3D VAZ 2108 machine, break the machines completely and try to leave the dummy intact. Arrange the car for a crash test and other tests or just have fun driving. Customize the VAZ 2108 and other cars, make them more comfortable for you and your race. Change colors, wheels and much more, so that you like the car more. Pass all the tests of the VAZ 2108 crash test with a dummy.

 We often update our simulators, and almost always respond to your feedback and comments, and if you have any suggestions, we will be happy to see them, our games are based on your feedback and suggestions. Thanks to you in the simulator Car Crash Test VAZ 2108 is presented a new system of machine damage. For those with whom the game is possible to slow down - reduce the quality of graphics in the settings of the game ("Settings" -> "Graphic").


 The main provisions of the game:

 - various locations
 - 3 high-quality 3D models of cars and VAZ 2108
 - Various settings for customizing the machine (the color of the car, etc., the wheels and casting, the body repair, the convergence, the air suspension)
 - a large number of settings for managing the style of driving a car
 - Different modes of crash-test and driving cars
 - live ragdoll crash test dummy
 - realistic graphics and damage to machines (depending on the phone model - "Settings" -> "Graphic")
 - a new system of machine destruction


 For your suggestions, ideas and criticism, you can write either in the comments to our simulator, or on the mail: insanegameprod@gmail.com

title: Virtual Mother-Happy Family Mom Life 3D Simulator
description:
Virtual mother is ready to perform different tasks in this mom life happy family simulator game. Mom is the boss of this virtual house. Play your role as best virtual mother in mom life free game.

Enter into the virtual world of happy family routine. A virtual mother is always a busy mom. Super mother tasks include preparing breakfast. Helping kids in homework. Preparing for birthday party. Taking care of virtual husband. Looking after the pets. Cleaning home. Going out to supermarket for grocery. House decoration. Help virtual mother in daily house chores. Take care of happy family. Mom life is full of hardships as she raises a happy family in this real hard life simulator game. The completion of every level increases the variety and difficulty of tasks. Virtual mother is up and ready to take on the day. This fun time happy family adventure game is all about raising a good relationship. This virtual mother happy family role playing simulator has a beautiful dream house. Lovely bedrooms, baby nursery, a huge dining room and kitchen. Decorate this amazing dream house with virtual mother in this amazing happy family simulator. 

This virtual mother happy family mom life simulator fun game. Manage all household tasks and take care of kids and virtual husband. This world of virtual reality game. Arrange a baby sitter for small kids and toddlers, go for grocery shopping, perform realistic household activities in this endless mom helping kid’s happy family fun where you have to help pregnant mother in handling realistic tasks for household activities including cleaning messy rooms or performing housekeeping along making breakfast for kids. Virtual mother life is a real demanding. This game is all about micromanagement and multitasking. Mom has taken a day off from job to indulge in this virtual mother life game. Mum is tough to raise a happy family and help virtual dad to take care of daily household jobs. Play new adventures of virtual happy family simulator game. Play this happy family mom life household game with mummy and daddy. Help your brother in studies and let your sister take care of pets. Step into the shoes of a mom’s daily life.

 Virtual Mother-Happy Family Mom Life Simulator allows you to customize house and give a helping hand to your virtual mother in this happy house. This virtual mother needs you to perform tough tasks. Manage household activities like a mother does in real life. Prepare your small kids’ breakfast and lunches, get ready for school, clean the garden and backyard, talk to neighbors, help virtual mother in washing car, feed pets and clean the messy house all over the place. This amazing happy family adventure home improvement and happy family get together will experience performing most exciting mother and babysitting household activities. Handling daily chores for comforting this happy family mom life. Experience life of working mother with a hectic lifestyle. Mother has to manage office work and home as well. Life of a mother is never easy. Have babies and make them play with brother and sister. Expect the unexpected, as surprise events will pop up during your routine mom life. Make your day much more difficult. Help your virtual mom in cleaning messy house and kitchen piled up with dirty dishes.

Virtual Mother-Happy Family Mom Life Simulator Features:

• Take care of your virtual family.
• Smooth and easy controls.
• Cook Meals like a professional chef
• Decorate your dream house.
• Realistic life simulations and animations.
• Awesome graphics to interact.
