title: Motorbike Taxi Driver
description:
Become a Motorbike Taxi Rider. Download and Play the latest very exciting simulation game Motorbike Taxi Rider!

Motorbike Taxi Driver is a taxi game where you will be picking up passenger and dropping them using a realistic Sports Bike. bike. You will earn cash on every successful taxi mission. 

Drive through the city streets, picking up passengers and dropping them off safely at their destination. Get on board and ride the Sports Bike to complete all the routes/missions. Amazing new traffic system will let you enjoy driving like never before. 

The Bike will not be easy to ride as you need to control it in the crowded city with traffic and also you need to avoid the pedestrians. In your yellow/red motor taxi, you can drive faster than in the bus simulator. Therefore you need to be careful. Duty driving is not that easy. Life in the city is crazy, watch out for the people and the traffic.

Motorbike Taxi Driver Game Features:

🏍️ Exciting taxi driving missions and level progression
🏍️ Smooth controls for challenging gameplay
🏍️ Realistic vehicle physics, high quality graphics
🏍️ Versatile camera featuring various angles for 360 degree visibility
🏍️ Marvelous graphics of realistic city environment

title: Rate My Landing
description: Rate My Landing Game offers the user several challenging levels in which to land an airplane, from a basic calm wind, good weather day to more extreme conditions involving strong crosswinds and low cloud ceilings.  The instrumentation is very close to what pilots actually see in the cockpit and is very unique amongst landing game applications that are available for mobile phones.  The user will be given the opportunity to master the same flying abilities that all airline pilots around the world possess.  Every landing is graded from one to five stars.  Four stars or greater are required in order to progress to the next level.

title: Burger Truck Chicago - Fast Food Cooking Game
description:
Chicago hungers for your delicious burgers!

Ride your hamburger food truck all around the Windy City and serve awesome, juicy and perfect cheeseburgers to many, many hungry customers!

Choose ingredients for creative burger recipes that will make your truck a must-stop mobile restaurant everywhere you park it in Chicago!

Start grinding your beef, picking the most melt-friendly cheeses and baking those soft and savory burger bread bums: your exciting food truck ride across Chicago is about to start!

HIGHLIGHTS

🍔MANAGE your own burger food truck and cook tasty fast food in lots of exciting and challenging levels! Rip through burning time-management challenges, show you’re great at multitasking and turn your burger truck into a fabulous business! Play offline anytime you want, no wi-fi required after downloading the game!

🍔COOK awesome burgers with various ingredients! Perfectly juicy patties, various delicious cheeses and vegetables - cook like a food truck chef and make your clients get hooked on your incredible sandwiches!

🍔TAKE your burger truck to the most bustling places all across Chicago and serve your specialty dish to all kinds of customers throughout Chi-Town!

🍔UPGRADE your kitchen-on-wheels with chef-worthy appliances to prepare your fabulous cheeseburgers quicker and serve even more customers. Never underestimate the incredible burger-searing power of brand new grill!

🍔WIN awesome and exciting daily rewards by spinning the roulette and get more coins and gems to keep spicing up your fast-food business!

🍔DASH to make your burger food truck famous for its swift service and delicious patties and turn your mobile restaurant into a very profitable business!


It’s up to you and your burger food truck to achieve that much-fabled perfect burger recipe, and you have all of Chicago at your disposal to help you taste test your creations!

Lettuce, tomatoes, spices, mushrooms, onion rings and, why not, even fries! There’s so much more to burgers than bread, cheese and meat, so start exploring the infinitely delicious possibilities!

Fry some cheddar-topped chips and grill burger patties to lure in herds of hungry burger fans at Chicago’s most buzzing venues!

Chicagoans will be lining up in front of your burger food truck in no time!

Become a food truck chef and start to turn your mobile restaurant into a great fast food business now!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

description:
Now Game Play Station (GPS) team is Presenting New Concept of Bowling Game " Car Bowling Master-Realistic Car Driver Stunt " not Ordinary Like other Bowling Game 3D FREE Games. So Get ready for Bowling Championship and buckle up seat belt of car To perform the Impossible Cars Stunts and Strike the bowls with Car to enjoy the simple bowling Game "Ten Pin Bowling".

Ten-pin bowling or Nine-pin bowling is a sport in which a player (called a "bowler") rolls a bowling ball down a wood-structure or synthetic (polyurethane) lane and towards ten pins positioned at the end of the lane. The objective is to score the highest pin ball by knocking down as many pins as possible. Three finger holes are drilled into a traditional bowling ball, But in this Car Bowling Master Game Traditional Bowling ball is replace with Realistic Car and You Can Do Stunts During Playing this Ten pin Bowling Game. 

Professional ten-pin bowling tournaments are held in numerous countries, this sport Game is commonly played as a hobby by millions of people around the world.

title: Impossible Climb Stunt Driving: Tricky Car Tracks
description:
Welcome to new driving simulation and stunt racing game in which you can perform insane stunts while climbing mountains and cliffs. Drive 4x4 cars between hills and avoid falling from tricky hill tracks by overcoming challenging obstacles. Race sports cars to Jump off from cliffs and do amazing stunt driving to become the stunt master of off-road driving vehicles. Drive 4x4 vehicles to climb hills and mountains while avoiding road obstacles. For expert drivers, it is a dare to play the new car stunt driving game in extreme stunt car zone of 2018.

This tricky hill racing tracks game is for those who don't give up easily. Experience the thrilling adventure by driving your tricky car through narrow roads to dodge treacherous obstacles. There are challenging jumping boards, mid-air ramps and crushing hurdles on the impossible mountain tracks. The risky road is sky high where crazy race is going on over the cliff and hard tracks of ramps. Fly over the ramps to make impossible jumps and reach the checkpoints within a time limit. Don't lose control of your stunt car over the hard-driving tracks, apply brakes and avoid fast speed while taking turns on the sharp turns otherwise your car will fall down from extreme heights.

So it's time to fasten your sports car seat belts while driving through tough road obstacles course. This insane impossible tracks simulator tracks game of 2018 is for those who love racing through road traps without any fear. The impossible obstacles are made to push, crush and destroy your car on dangerous and curvy narrow tracks. Complete these impossible climb stunts by racing your 4x4 car on zigzag mountain racing tracks that are built over the beautiful city in the endless blue sky.

Features for Impossible Climb Stunt Driving: Tricky Car Tracks:
- Free to play car stunt driving game of 2018
- Revive whenever your car is destroyed
- Collect checkpoints to complete missions
- Most exciting car stunt game
- Multiple super Grand luxuries cars
- New Impossible Tricky Tracks Simulator game
- Drive the cars on deadly roads

title: Ultimate Truck Driving Simulator 2018
description: We are looking for new drivers! We have a cargo which must be delivered to our customers in time and we are lacking a person who would do the job. However, we are looking for a real pro! Do you have what it takes? You will be driving truck loaded up with cargo and your job will be to transport it to the given point. You will be earning some money which you can later on spend on new trucks, unlocking more maps, or purchasing interesting performance upgrades. The thing is, this job is not for everyone. It rains pretty heavily and terrain is extremely difficult. If you love challenges, you should definitely try this game out! Have fun.

title: Cat Simulator : Kitten
description:
You are a small tiny and cute kitten and today is the day your owner wants to wash you but you don't like water. Which kitten likes water? 

Choose your favourite kitty from different cats. Wreck the mansion and escape the appartment or just play around freely in this open world.

Get ready for a real crazy cat adventure and cause as much destruction as you like with your favorite cat, and three different game play modes! Hundreds of fun interactions in great environments for hours of solid good fun.

Check out the accessories - hats, helmets, moustaches, glasses and loads more then take a photo and share it on Facebook or Twitter with your friends.

GAME:

Use the joypad to move around and swipe the screen to get a 360 degree view of your pet.
Knock stuff around.
Prepare for catlateral damage in the cat simulator in their wild, fun lives.
New: play in HD or SD quality mode.
Click on the doggy in the bottom left of the screen to load.
Time Trial mode added!
Extra cat games levels added all the time.
What do they get up to in their secret time?
Neko Tastic!!
Super fun Cat Simulator!
Awesome super fun cat games!

FEATURES

★ Free to play
★ Play as a cute cat
★ Explore the garden, school and several other buildings in an open world play ground
★ Realistic high quality graphics
★ Interaction with tons of objects in the game
★ Rack up points by knocking over various objects
★ Ride a skateboard 
★ Easy controls and smooth performance
★ Cat store to unlock different cats and hats for your cat
★ Three gameplay modes

title: Oddly Satisfying Game! Try Not To Get Satisfied
description:
Enjoy mindfulness for kids with these amazing series of oddly satisfying & super relaxing viral trends that will help you relaxing and satisfy you in a way you could never imagine. Getting kids to calm down can b one of the toughest part of the day for any parent. This game bring a strange mindfulness to everyone  with antistress relaxation toys and the most satisfying part is doing those activities with your volume on. Calm yourself with oddly satisfying ASMR sounds in some of the ultimate source of satisfaction activities. Have fun with squishy collection with amazing pressing poking squishing activities along with the hydraulic press experiment, fidget spinners and jelly cutting and a lot more viral trends!

ASMR Slime activites:
Poke, press and stretch this amazing toy in your favorite glitter & crunchy colors for an oddly satisfying experience, also enjoy the funny slime fails & slime coloring and try not to get satisfied.

ASMR soap Cutting:
Relax with the most satisfying soap cubes activity using a knife for soap carving first and then swiping the knife to drop satisfying cubes. Enjoy rainbow unicorn colored soap hacks for extra fun.

Put your mind at ease & experiment with this squishy stress ball by pressing it for some brain calming effect and enjoy squishy balls cut open and enjoy. Enjoy the biggest collection of squishies in amazing colors.

The biggest collection of these spinny fidgets are here in your favorite designs including paper spinner & ninja star fidget spinner with glow in the dark light effects. Spin and enjoy the ASMR sounds.

Experiment hydraulic press with different amazing objects like dynamites, squishes, balls, glasses and so much more for an amazing experience.

1000 Degree glowing Knife:
Experimenting 1000 degree glowing knife will be really fun with oddly satisfying crayon melting in front of your eyes. Enjoy 1000 degree knife vs slime and different objects!

Soft Jelly Wire Mesh Cutting:
How can you miss cutting your jiggly jelly with the wire mesh during a collection of ASMR activities.

Satisfying Window Cleaning:
Clean the window, relax and enjoy amazing sceneries behind this satisfying cleaning.

title: Flower Tycoon: Grow Blooms in your Greenhouse
description:
Flower Tycoon is a flower shop simulator where you can grow your own plants in the house, try your talent as a florist, seller, and designer. When the visitors come to your store sell them the bouquets and earn money. 
        Put on the role of a decorator purchasing the new items. Create a cozy shop atmosphere and gain trust, love, and devotion of your customers making your shop bloom.

The gameplay:

Romantic rose, cute chamomile, amazing elegant calla, or maybe bright and jolly sunflower?
      The variety of flowers you can grow in this game is really stunning. First you have to select the plant seeds, pot and the water supply for your future crop and care about it until it blooms. Be attentive, don’t forget to water the young plants, don’t let them dry up and perish.
When they finally bloom at the house you can open your own store.

       Hurry up to the door when the customers come to your shop knocking. When the visitors will make a choice, the grown blooms will appear nearby, help them to choose and buy what they need for the occasion they say. Look at the green blossoms you have, combine the flowers, assemble the masterpieces wrapping the plants in bouquets. Accept or reject suggested prices and sell what you grew, gain more money and reputation as a florist and designer among to wedding salons, kindergartens or even agencies.

The gameplay progress:

Upgrade your growing house when you have enough money for this: Now you can afford buying more inventory: pots, furniture, and accessories. 
Work like a decorator  of your store and attract more visitors. 
Close deals with customers giving them greater discounts, enrich the interior, and turn your store  into popular and reputable place.

What you do in the game:

*Grow the plants in the house
*Open your own store and work as a florist
*Assemble the blossoms wrapping them and selling to the customers
*Sell bouquets of roses and other flowers to different places
*Buy more pots for your greenery
*Upgrade the inventory, buy furniture, and become a designer and decorator of your own flower shop.


Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/flowertycoon/

When the visitors will make a choice, the grown blooms will appear nearby, help them to choose and buy what they need for the occasion they say. Look at the green blossoms you have, combine the flowers, assemble the masterpieces wrapping the plants in bouquets. Accept or reject suggested prices and sell what you grew, gain more money and reputation as a florist and designer among to wedding salons, kindergartens or even agencies.

The gameplay progress:

Upgrade your growing house when you have enough money for this: Now you can afford buying more inventory: pots, furniture, and accessories.
Work like a decorator of your store and attract more visitors.
Close deals with customers giving them greater discounts, enrich the interior, and turn your store into popular and reputable place.

What you do in the game:

*Grow the plants in the house
*Open your own store and work as a florist
*Assemble the blossoms wrapping them and selling to the customers
*Sell bouquets of roses and other flowers to different places
*Buy more pots for your greenery
*Upgrade the inventory, buy furniture, and become a designer and decorator of your own flower shop.


Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/flowertycoon/
summary: Grow beautiful blooms in your orangery and sell amazing flowers in your store
recentChanges:
Animation added.
Minor bug fixes.
Customer mood is now available in trade pop-up.
Have Fun!

title: Taxi Game 2019 : Taxicab Driving Simulator
description:
Looking for a taxi game ? Your search ends here the Taxi Game 2019 :  Taxicab Driving Simulator is a 3d taxi game that gives you feel of a real city taxi driving game experience , this taxi simulator is have real controls like break , gas , reverse front . Take care of your fuel and passenger to be a perfect taxi driver in this Taxi Game 2019 : Taxicab Driving Simulator. You can submit your good score on our leader board and check your ranking on this leader board.
You might be surprised how the city lives - people are walking, cars are crossing. Get in your taxi, start the engine and become a city traffic racer. Drive your cab through the big city traffic, pick up passengers and drive them safely to their destinations. But be careful! Duty driving is not easy. Life in the city is crazy, watch out for the people and the traffic.
In this taxi game you will get chance to upgrade and design you cab so that you can also become a stylish and a furious taxi driver in this the Taxi Game 2019 :  Taxicab Driving Simulator.
In this taxi simulator you have got some additional advantages for your taxi driver unlike other taxi driving games you can hit other cars and passengers to earn bonus isn’t it cool for a taxi driver in a taxi driving game. You can drive you taxi simulator around the big city, suburbs, construction sites, parks and even the beach. It's crazy how the city lives - people are walking, cars are crossing. Get in your taxi, fasten your seat belts and become a city traffic racer but remember this is a taxi simulator only.
Install this taxi driving game now for free !!!

This is the first episode of House Flip Empire where you can start building your own finance empire by buying lands, building on them and renting to different people and purpuses.

title: Halloween Slacking
description:
Yay, Halloween is here! and that means apple bobbing, pumpkin carving, scaring the neighbours and lots of free candies! Sarah want to go out and party with her friends but her parents have ordered her to take her bratty little brother out for "Trick or Treat". What a chore! Can Sarah keep her brother entertained whilst doing some tricks or treating of her own?

Use your fingers to help Sarah slack off whilst taking her brother out for "Trick or Treat". But if have a signal her brother throws a tantrum, close activities to keep him out of trouble!

title: Tricky Bike Stunt Racing
description:
Are you ready for the motto bike racing having real life physics bike racer? This is a unique motto bike 3D simulation stunt game. 

Tricky bike stunt racing is top bike racing game include bike stunt actions and bike tricks. Prepare yourself for ride through a variety of up and down tracks and trails while driving realistic bike physics in curvy and upside down tracks bike stunt arena. Enjoy the tricky bike drive while racing on deviate rush tracks avoids hurdles and obstacles and perform stunts, flips and tricks of bike stunt racing. Perform insane stunts and pull wheelies up and down to remain safe to complete all the bike stunt tracks. 

Display your bike stunt rider skills as you have best motorcycle or dirt bikes in one of the best free bike stunt games available over Play Store. In tricky stunt bike racing, you will really enjoy riding different bikes in the different environments including hilly, grassy, city and sea type. Empower others by showing your real stunt bike riding skills and become the champion of tricky bike stunt racing.

In free stunt bike race game, you need to remain on tracks or trails to collect cash on the basis of level completion. Fun free bike stunt racing games have cash to unlock more motorcycle for riders. Multiple bikes are available in store for purchase. Do not get addicted to mid air flips as stunt trick champion, and prove yourself bike stunt hero of tricky stunt bike race. 

Game Features:

Addictive bike stunt action
15 Different levels
Realistic bike physic
Stunning and smooth graphics
Challenging gameplay
Detail 3d environments

■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□■□

セールスマンになりきり、お客様に商品を売ろう！


就職先でまさかの訪問販売アルバイト？
無料のちょっと変わった訪問販売シミュレーションで暇つぶししよう！
子供から大人まで簡単に楽しめる育成・経営ゲームです

【セールスマニュアル】
商品の魅力をアピールして、お客様のテンションを上げよう！

「ミニゲーム風・セールスシミュレーション」
１．まずは商品に合う良い感じのキャッチコピーを作ろう！

２．商品を実際に使うとどうなるかをお客様に伝えよう！

３．購入者たちのアンケート結果を伝えてさらにアピール！

４．最後は追いワードでお客様に精神攻撃！

セールス・トークを磨いて立派なセールスマンになろう！

【粗品仕入れ】
・セールス開始時に粗品を渡して、お客様のテンションを上げよう

【セールス強化】
・小物を新しいものに変えて身なりを整えよう

【パンフレットDEビンゴ】
・ゲームをやりこむとオリジナルショート漫画が読める！

【こんな商品をセールス！】
・水素水浄水器・・・ろ過した水道水に空気中の水素を加えることのできる浄水器、効果は未知数
・英語教材・・・聞き流すだけで喋れると噂の英語教材、あとは雰囲気とジェスチャーで･･･
・金運ブレスレット・・・金運がアップするパワーストーンを繋げたブレスレット、札束のお風呂に入れるらしい
・藁人形・・・藁を編んで作られた人形、呪詛が込められているらしい。悪用厳禁！
・意識高そうな本・・・大学生がカフェでノートPCを開きながら読んでいそうな本。それっぽいことが書いてある
・筋トレマシン・・・リビングでも手軽に筋トレができるマシン、一日15分で理想の身体が手に入るとか
・布団圧縮機・・・専用の袋に入れて使えば布団などのかさばるものを強力圧縮する機械
・安倍晴明のお札・・・伝説的な陰陽師の力が込められたと言われている護符
・馬・・・動物で古くから家畜として飼われてきた動物、知性が高く人の感情を理解できる
・ウォシュレット・・・温水洗浄をしてくれる便座、非常に快適で座るとすごくリラックスできる
・マジックハンド・・・高い場所など手の届きづらい時に使用できる道具、人によっては便利かもしれない
・お味噌汁セット・・・お湯を注ぐだけで食べられる即席タイプのお味噌汁セット、心がホッとする味
・お歳暮セット・・・贈答用の高級ハムの詰め合わせセット、お歳暮やお中元にピッタリ
・竹ホウキ・・・竹の小枝を束ね、幹を柄にした古くから使われている箒、庭や地面を掃くときに使う
・足ツボマット・・・足裏のツボを刺激する突起物の付いたマット、血行が良くなって健康になるらしい
・芝刈り機・・・庭の芝や雑草などを刈り取る為の機械、刃物が付いているので注意が必要
・万能電気鍋・・・揚げものから煮物、炒め物までカバーできるIH対応の鍋、圧力にも対応しているらしい
・殺虫剤・・・害虫を駆除するための強力な薬剤スプレー、毒性が強く法規制により生産が中止された
　そのほかにも色々な商品を販売できます

title: RAFT Original Survival Game
description:
Discover! Create! Survive!
Your home is an endless ocean. Your neighbors – ruthless sharks, sea creatures and relentless nature. The only refuge is a raft. Improve it, craft everything you need to escape from the ocean trap, survive by all means!

🐋 Our survival on the raft advantages

🌎 Real-life survival simulator
Check your health, hunger and thirst indicators, struggle sharks attacks. Meet the challenges and try to survive, it’s all up to you!

⚓ Resources hunting
Use a hook and catch necessary resources wreckage, chests and barrels from the ocean. They will help you to survive!

🔨 Build and upgrade your raft
Expand, develop and protect your raft. If you need more place, build a first floor!

📜 Lot’s of crafting recipes
Fish, cook and collect drinking water. Craft building materials, clothes, weapons, chests and other necessary things to survive!

🚣 Solve the puzzle of an endless ocean
What happened in this apocalyptic world Why are people destined to live in the ocean. Training and quest system help you to find answers and escape.

🌗 Great plans
We carefully examine all proposals according our favorite game improving. We’ll add dynamic Day-Night Cycle and weather condition, exciting plot, underwater world and other interesting events in the future updates!

Find out more advantages of the app

🌊 VARIABLE WORLDS OF RAFT SURVIVAL
Each of survival adventure games has its own world with unique difficulties and challenges. Our survivor simulator generates unlimited numbers of worlds. Explore Pacific islands, reefs, and bottomless ocean trenches in raft games free!
No two worlds are alike you can generate completely new and randomized world at any time in the survival free.

🌊 CLOSE TO REAL-LIFE EXPERIENCE
Raft survival free is a 3D game designed to give survival games free lovers the closest to real life gameplay. That’s why Day-Night Cycle was added. Survivor app has treacherous weather conditions that allow to enjoy sunny days and beware of stormy ones. If you’d like to get new skills in survive games, try raft games!

🌊 YOUR LIFE IS IN YOUR HANDS
Raft building games offer the chance to craft new weapons and equipments. Search for shipwreck parts and improve your raft in survival escape. Craft a spear and protect yourself from murderous sharks that follow you everywhere.

Bearing in mind all these qualities of build and survive games, you’d not forget about your health status in the harsh conditions. Fishing and hunting is the only way to succeed and not to starve to death in raft survival in the ocean.

RAFT Original Survival Game features
• 3D interface of raft free
• Realistic experience of survival base building games
• Complex and amazing challenges of survivor games free

Let your brain work at high speed and do everything within your power to win in one of the survival apps! If you want to go on raft craft survival games and turn it into an adventure of a lifetime, then play RAFT Original Survival Game.

Join our social networking site and take part in expecting updates discussions and offer your ideas to improve the game!
Make screenshots, record videos, share your achievements with other players!

title: Pocket Animals GO
description:
Game encyclopedia for children about wild animals of mixed forests.
The animals are intelligent and arranged a conspiracy - they escaped from their masters and now walk around the city. They are frightened and well hidden, it will not be easy to find them.

Scientists urgently developed a special application Pocket Animals GO with a built-in radar for searching and detecting wild beasts. Become a volunteer and help catch all the animals!

Move through the streets of your city and carefully follow the radar, he will indicate when the target will be near. You can find such animals as a ferocious bear or a rapacious wolf right on the roadway, in the bushes you can find a cowardly rabbit and you can meet a fluffy squirrel or prickly hedgehog in your house.

Once the radar detects the beast, it will appear on the screen of your mobile phone and you will be able to catch it with the help of a red ball. Read a funny and cognitive description and collect them all in your collection.

This game used technology of augmented reality involves the use of a accelerometer, gyroscope and a camera for search and catching virtual wild pets. Be careful near the roadway, remember safety!

title: Seattle Pie Truck - Fast Food Cooking Game
description:
Seattle has a serious pie craving!

Ride across the Emerald City in your pie food truck and seize the opportunity to turn your mobile pie restaurant into a thriving mobile business!

Bake fabulous and absolutely delicious pies with your very own special recipes and bring delight to every hungry customer! Cook fast and manage your time well so all of them get a taste of your baked treats!

Get your pie shop rolling in Seattle and become a food truck chef!

HIGHLIGHTS

🥧MANAGE your own pie food truck and cook tasty fast food in lots of exciting and challenging levels! Rip through burning time-management challenges, show you’re great at multitasking and turn your pie food truck into a fabulous business!

🥧COOK awesome and diverse pies using various ingredients! Pumpkin, sweet icings, fruit, cheese...get creative with pie cuisine and bake unique pies and tarte-like dishes to your loyal customers! 

🥧TAKE your pie truck to the most bustling places all across Seattle and serve your baked and crunchy treats to all kinds of customers throughout the Emerald City!

🥧UPGRADE your kitchen-on-wheels with chef-worthy appliances to prepare your fabulous pies quicker and serve even more customers. Never underestimate the incredible crisping power of a high-tech oven!

🥧WIN awesome and exciting daily rewards by spinning the roulette and get more coins and gems to keep spicing up your pie fast-food business!

🥧DASH to make your pie food truck famous for its swift service and delicious dishes and turn your mobile restaurant into a very profitable business!

Make your dream of becoming a food truck chef come true!

Start baking your one-of-a-kind pie recipes and dazzle customers all over Seattle like only an expert pie maker can!

Get Seattleites hooked on your incredible variety of baked slices of perfection and spread unforgettable flavour experiences all over the city!

Get inspired by the steady progress of your food truck business and surprise yourself with what your pie-baking talents can achieve!

Put your pie food truck on the road now!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

title: Mushroom Growing Kit Simulator - White Button
description:
Mushroom growing kit simulator for white button mushrooms is an interesting educational simulation app and game to become a professional Mushroom grower! Yes, learn and do it. It is easy to prepare a new mushroom (agaricus bisporus) production kit and start it again. 
Use what you learn here in this game in the real-life. You can even start your own greenhouse or try mushroom growing in your house. 
Just start with the tips you need for a successful production here and learn them. 
This magic game is not like any other mushroom growing games!

In this game: 
- The temperature of the culture medium is critical: the low or high temperatures are both harmful to the mushrooms, so with the temperature controller provide the ideal production air for the growing fungi 

- Do not worry about the humidity in the room where your kit is located, as a humidity production device is provided humidity for you, and try to produce it with the necessary moisture 

 - Each plant needs water, but the mushrooms should always have wet soil, do not forget the irrigation, the mushrooms are sensitive in a small amount, so much in irrigation. Do not overdo it 

 - You need to have enough fungicide, supplement and poisons to grow successfully, and you have access to them 

 - It is better not to touch the newly grown mushrooms, but if the mushrooms are grown, you can touch them to pick 

 - Maybe you want to know how much the mushrooms you have produced are worth, yes, you can get the growth and price information by touching them and know even their weight  

- Now it is time to sell the product, get sell your mushrooms and get coins in exchange; coins are used to purchase the necessary equipment for production.  

- The real kits of mushroom production and the mushrooms they produce are different, but here your kit is strengthened and it produces many mushrooms. Growing funghi needs care and a lot of time, but it is a joyful job be sure to experience it.

- You can also see the mushroom guide inside the mushroom growing app.

- You can experience the mushroom garden and mushroom farm with this small kit.

- Identify grown mushrooms to pick from kit, also you can identify damaged white button fungi to trash them

- Mushrooms cannot extract nutrients from the sun as green plants do, so they do not need light. However, mushrooms do not necessarily need a dark environment to white button mushroom grow. The advantage of growing mushrooms in the dark is that darkness preserves the moisture that mushroom spores need to reproduce, mushroom's place is dark for you.

title: Nenuco Happy Doctor
description:
Nenuco Happy Doctor, cura a Nenuco con Realidad Aumentada, ¡nunca antes fue tan divertido jugar a médicos! 

Si ya tienes tu juguete Nenuco Happy Doctor, descárgate la APP gratuita en tu tablet o smartphone para disfrutar del mejor juego de médicos con Realidad Aumentada. La APP es segura y adecuada para los más pequeños, una vez descargada no necesita conexión a internet.

Nenuco y los accesorios interactúan con la APP para hacer mucho más divertido el juego. ¡Descubre los +10 juegos con Realidad Aumentada para curar a Nenuco! Primero añade a Nenuco al listado de pacientes y completa su Historial. Tendrás que hacerle una buena revisión para ver que todo esté bien.

¿Has mirado bien si tiene alguna infección?, coge las pinzas y quítale todos los virus, la aplicación te dirá todos los pasos para curar a Nenuco.

¿Nenuco se ha caído? ¡Corre a URGENCIAS, hay que operar! Con la realidad aumentada podrás ver si tiene algún hueso roto y ponérselo bien de nuevo. Al terminar no olvides vendar.

Amplía tu consulta y añade a tus muñecos favoritos con las pegatinas interactivas. La APP las reconoce y podrás jugar con ellos también.

No olvides visitar la Farmacia para preparar el jarabe y hacer tus propias medicinas, ¡podrás curar a todos tus pacientes!

Descubre todo esto y mucho más con la APP de Nenuco hAPPy Doctor, un juego educativo además de divertido, y con el que podrás conectar tu muñeco Nenuco hAPPy Doctor para disfrutar de la mejor experiencia de juego interactivo con realidad aumentada.

Valores pedagógicos:

- Desarrolla la creatividad y la imaginación.

- Estimula la atención y la concentración.

- Favorece el aprendizaje de nuevas tecnologías.

Cámara: Cámara frontal 2 MP.

Procesador: ARMv7 CPU quad core.

Cámara: Cámara frontal 3 MP.

Memoria: 2Gb ram.

title: Emergency Heart Surgery ER - Doctor Simulator Game
description:
Welcome to the little kids emergency heart surgery ER doctor simulator game.

Enjoy and feel like a pro doctor in this free surgical cardio transplant game. Show your expertise as a real heart surgeon and best cardiovascular ER emergency doctor.  Treat patients with multiple heart surgery and transplant. Work like a real ER open heart surgeon in emergency room of this crazy hospital.  Perform all kinds of heart surgery. Treat patients with open heart surgery transplant, stent placement and cardiac bypass surgery with CAD. Some patients need pacemaker for controlling the heartbeat. As an expert ER emergency doctor in this heart surgery hospital perform virtual open-cardio operation. Show your expertise in real time open heart surgery  and transplant for patients with with coronary artery disease. 

Execute critical bypass operations to give your patient a healthy heart. Replace old heart with new one in ER emergency hospital. As a heart surgery expert, fix the cardio valves. In this cardio hospital, most patients are diagnosed with chest pain. Perform cardio function tests. Order angiography and angioplasty. Place stent to open cardio artery for normal blood circulation and clear the clots. Become an expert heart surgery professional doctor in this emergency ERT crazy hospital. Treat patients with coming with pain and make them happy and healthy with right treatment. Before you operate heart surgery, make sure to diagnose and keep track of patient’s health record. keep monitoring the major organs functions like brain activity, eye movement, liver, lungs and kidneys while the patient is on the operation table of this heart surgery ER emergency hospital. Don’t let any of the organs go into the frozen state. As this will make cardio function and surgery critical. As the best heart surgery doctor you have to be alert.

How to perform heart Surgery?

Patients comes with heart problems. Take them to ER emergency doctor room. Doctor take vitals prior to treatment. Before heart surgery, instruct emergency doctor to prepare operation room. Place all your heart surgery tools like scalpel, electric shock, injection, dropper, cooling shower, tweezers, electrical monitors, BP apparatus and other gadgets. Mark to perform deep cut to open chest. Reach for the heart. Be accurate and don’t damage Now place marker to perform a deep cut onto the chest to cut open and reach the heart. You have to be accurate and careful not to damage stomach, kidneys, ribcage or lungs. Use sharp cutting knife tool to reach out for the damaged open area. Keep monitoring the vitals of your patients. After opening the chest examine patient’s blocked veins and arteries. Slice the open heart to cut into two pieces, check open heart valves to make sure that there are no clogged arteries or blood clots, inject antiseptics to wash off the clots.

This free open-heart surgery ER emergency doctor game will let you be a virtual heart surgery specialist. Be the best kids doctor of this emergency doctor surgery hospital. This heart surgery transplant game is an educational crazy ER hospital game where you can do open chest operation.

Heart Surgery ER Emergency Doctor – Kids Surgery Game Features:

•	Realistic heart operation.
•	Best Medical ER room tools.
•	Multiple operation with best animation.
•	Challenging levels.
•	Perform all types of ER surgery.
•	Virtual treatments at the hospital.

title: Real Taxi Simulator 2018
description:
Welcome to the new generation of taxi driving simulator game - Real Taxi Simulator 2018 !
Start your day behind the wheel of a yellow taxicab! This is no ordinary driving game; compete with other drivers for customers! Use your skills to navigate tight, urban streets and crowded roads to reach destinations under the time limit. 
Compete for parking spots and avoid crashing into other vehicles while sharing the road with trucks, jeeps, and motorbikes! 

Smooth controls will complement the game’s smooth and vibrant urban graphics. Try the throttle and versatile camera to help you drive and park like a pro! Enjoy realistic city audio as you cruise on the highway and over beautiful bridges. 

Race your car through the big city traffic, pick up passengers and drive them safely to their destinations.
In your taxi cab you can drive faster than in the bus simulator so be careful! Duty driving is not that easy. Life in the city is crazy, watch out for the people and the traffic.

You can driving around the big city, suburbs, construction sites, parks and even the beach. It's crazy how the city lives - people are walking, cars are crossing. Get in your taxi, fasten your seat belts and become a city traffic racer.

Pick up passengers in a timely manner--but make sure to keep them satisfied by maneuvering around traffic as fast and safely as possible! 

If you want to be a top-rated cabbie, pick up the pace!

Real Taxi Simulator 2018 features:
- Exciting taxi driving missions and level progression
- Customizable controls (tilt, steer, or buttons) to match your cabs driving style
- Versatile camera featuring various angles for 360 degree visibility
- Marvelous graphics of realistic city environment 
- Smooth controls for challenging gameplay

title: Incredible Real truck Drive Cargo Supply
description:
Hello truck driver! let you become a Daring trucker and maintain your truck trailer. Take your driver seat belt up and keep trucking across multiple california cities. Grip your hands on grand euro truck steering wheel, polished your Test drive skills to build your logistic delivery empire. Trucks booking , maintian trucked ,  car loading container car towing. Haul your trucker path to become an expert uphill cargo truck transport with  Incredible Real truck Drive Cargo Supply. luxuries Time to fulfil your job task hockup the super great truck simulator to cargo pickup and take it to the another factory. 

Burnout the offroad trucker at outlaws daily drive and be careful while driving cpec super truck drive with in city traffic crash truck trailer maintain.  Don’t hit the rogue truck driving simulator with the other american grand truck or any other indian lorry on the offroad driving school. Prove yourself as real trucker legend, 
Take different car concierge driving route of California cities to accomplish job task by transport different delivery logistics. Go through different checkpoints for Fuel filling and increase stamina of truck glory car concierge. Earn cash rewards on every job fulfillment and Utilize your cash to fix the Damage bar. Go for Help option against Cash to default set the route and enjoy the future cargo truck transport. 

Driving euro truck has always been a tough task to do, especially when it comes to travel on a highway .  Incredible Real truck Drive Cargo Supply is all new In Truck Driving simulator. Start your incredible Truck adventure today on Highway Roads and offroad Tracks. You got to load logistics in your pick-up truck and unload at given points by driving cargo trailer. If you're a truck simulator fan don't hesitate to start your Cargo Wood Transporter adventure today!

Get ready for the extreme in truck driving car transporter games for cargo delivery. Grab the chance to become real trucker and show everyone that you are the king of the highway truck drivers. Hop into the trailer truck and drive the heavy duty vehicles on dangerous offroad, bumpy tracks, over the bridges and in city traffic. Select different vehicles such as trailers, oil tanker trucks, 18 wheeler grand trailers and cargo transporters. Fulfill transportation duties now in  Incredible Real truck Drive Cargo Supply game & earn money to upgrade and unlock all the amazing trailers and modern trucks.

Let you become a real offroad trucker! Featuring Euro Truck Driver of customizations, this truck simulator delivers an exciting driving experience that will make you feel like driving real trucks. Travel across many countries from california, visit incredible places like Santa Barbara,Los Angeles,Las Vegas,Grand Canyon,Arizona,and more! Play the  Incredible Real truck Drive Cargo Supply career mode of this truck simulator, make money, purchase new trucks and upgrades, explore the trucking world! Challenge your friends with the online multiplayer mode, show off your customized truck! Become the King of The Road by playing Euro Truck Driver!

It is a free top game of driving truck, heavy duty truck and other kind of transporting goods truck games lorry from different hilly and dangerous area. 

Games Features:

🚚More than 20 realistic cities

🚚Detailed weather conditions and day/night mode
🚚Realistic fuel consumption and fatigue system

🚚Immersive Engine sounds

title: Arms Dealer - War Tycoon Game
description:
Welcome to Arms Dealer - War Tycoon Game

You're here to become an Arms Dealer boss. Sounds cool, right? You've seen them in movies and heard about them in the news, now it's your turn.

Buy government contracts for guns, ammo, supplies, and vehicles and cash in big. It's a fine line between legal and illegal with gun trafficking. You'll be dealing on the black market to buy and sell weapons for the government. It's risky business. And be careful because not every contract is a good deal. Some will leave you losing money.

As you become a bigger arms dealer, you are going to have to upgrade your inventory and supplies capability. You'll outgrow your supply capabilities and won't be able to store all the inventory needed to fill contracts. As you manage more contracts and more weapons you'll find out that it's not easy, if you lose the contract you'll be out your money.

Being a gun dealer isn't easy, you'll be tested to see how well you manage your hustle. Feel like a boss and you execute bigger and bigger contracts. As a big-time arms dealer, you're be doing multimillion-dollar contracts racking in millions for yourself.

Your goal is to become the biggest arms dealer in the world! Do you have what it takes? If you do, get started now and prove it!

title: MediBot Inc. Virus Plague - Pandemic Game
description:
Year 2148: the end of the world is near.
Humanity is at risk of extinction, viruses to survive are mutating, making our vaccines ineffective. Millions of people are already dead.

To contain the pandemic, United Nations  founded a new secret clinic: MediBot Inc. This clinic is specialized in producing compound vaccines using genetic engineering that can neutralize multiple unknown viruses at the same time. 

Now, within each hospital, doctors and scientists are able to do a medical diagnosis more effectively,  fight the spread of the pandemic and treat diseases .

If the strategy of using MediBot Inc. will manage to contain the pandemic, the apocalypse can be avoided ...

GAME FEATURES - MediBot Inc. (Virus Plague - Pandemic Game)
- innovative gameplay that allows the player to simulate the role of a doctor, analyzing the clues available in each dossier. The doctor will need to understand which vaccine administer to patients to stop the epidemic 
- unlimited unknown virus generation to guarantee endless fun
- biomedical strategy simulator and high strategy medic investigation games with clues about pathogen behavior, symptoms of existing viruses, symptoms in patients
- different difficulty levels.  At advanced levels, virus inside the pandemic game can evolve from more pathogens and create a real plague infection

Are you ready to save the universe from unknown diseases and stop the pandemic before it becomes the new biomedical plague or is the end of the world inevitable?
Good luck with your medical diagnosis!

title: Chinese California Truck - Fast Food Cooking Game
description:
Chinese food fans all around California now have a new favorite asian cuisine restaurant: your Chinese food truck!

Serve your delicious eastern dishes aboard your mobile Chinese eatery and be fast to keep your customers satisfied like an expert asia food truck chef!

Thousands of hungry clients are excited to have your Chinese food truck in their Californian towns, chopsticks in hand to try your incredibly exotic dishes.

So time to hit the road and get cooking!

HIGHLIGHTS


🍚MANAGE your own Chinese food truck and cook tasty fast food in lots of exciting and challenging levels! Rip through burning time-management challenges, show you’re great at multitasking and turn your Asian food truck into a fabulous business!

🍚COOK awesome chinese staple dishes using various ingredients! Noodles, chili chicken, hot and sour soup, spring rolls, dim sums, mapo and much more! Grind exotic spices and blend them with asian cuisine mainstays like tofu, pickles, shitake and rice to make fascinating dishes!

🍚TAKE your chinese truck to the most bustling places all across California and serve your eastern specialty delights to all kinds of customers throughout the Golden State!

🍚UPGRADE your kitchen-on-wheels with chef-worthy appliances to prepare your fabulous Chinese food quicker and serve even more customers. Never underestimate the incredible crisping power of a high-tech frier!

🍚WIN awesome and exciting daily rewards by spinning the roulette and get more coins and gems to keep spicing up your Chinese fast-food business!

🍚DASH to make your Chinese food truck famous for its swift service and delicious dishes and turn your mobile restaurant into a very profitable business!

Do you have your panda apron on yet?

Clients are already showing up in droves at food courts, events and parks all over California to get a taste of your unique brand of Asian cuisine!

Forget about gnocchi: people are really interested in your Manchuria-style noodles and soups! Get them hooked in those and every other Chinese dish you cook so well and manage your time like a seasoned food truck chef so everyone gets a taste of your talent in the kitchen!

Californians are waiting all across the state: get on your truck and cook for them all now!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

title: Dig In: A Dozer Game
description:
Dig in and operate your bulldozer to get the job done right. As a heavy equipment operator, it’s your job to move earth, dig trenches, scrape dirt, fill in holes, and avoid causing damage on the job site. Experience the earth shaking power of dozer operation once you drop your blade and push mountains of dirt. There’s nothing like moving your bulldozer tracks through the mud to accomplish larger than life tasks on the job site. Complete 9 jobs in a row to perfection to earn the highest rating. Will you crumble under the pressure, or dig in to push through to the finish?

Use the same hand-eye coordination and spatial awareness in this game as the real heavy equipment operators out on the jobsite. Perform well enough and you could be directed to real life operator opportunities in your area!

Dig In: A Dozer Game features:
-Randomly generated levels for enhanced replay-ability.
-Experience increasingly difficult tasks as you progress through the game.
-Dig trenches, move earth, fill in holes, and avoid causing damage.
-Beautiful 3D graphics and sound design.
-Links to real life heavy equipment opportunities.
-Badge earning through the Skill Arcade.

Dig In was developed by the International Union of Operating Engineers Local 66 and Simcoach Games to build awareness of the career opportunities in heavy equipment operation and to connect players to real life apprenticeships.

The Western Pennsylvania Operating Engineers Joint Apprenticeship and Training Program offers 4 year apprenticeship courses to train Heavy Equipment Operators and Heavy Equipment Mechanic Technicians. To learn more about this program and other opportunities visit www.wpaoperators.org

Dig In: A Dozer Game is a Simcoach Skill Arcade app. Explore careers, practice basic job skills and earn badges to gain exposure to careers and training opportunities in your area. To learn more about the Skill Arcade check out www.simcoachgames.com.

Privacy Policy: http://www.simcoachgames.com/privacy
